text.en: This site will be useful for financiers, financial analysts, traders, economists, and anyone interested in market cycles. I create financial statistical websites and dashboards. I work with charts, perform analysis, provide forecasts, and give recommendations. (The site is currently under development)
text.si: Ta spletna stran bo koristna za financerje, finanƒçne analitike, trgovce, ekonomiste in vse, ki jih zanimajo tr≈æni cikli. Ustvarjam finanƒçne statistiƒçne spletne strani in nadzorne plo≈°ƒçe (dashboards). Delam z grafi, izvajam analize, pripravljam napovedi in podajam priporoƒçila. (Spletna stran je trenutno v razvoju)

text.en:
Global M2 represents the total M2 money supply in the global economy ‚Äî a broad measure of liquidity that includes:
‚úî cash in circulation
‚úî demand deposits
‚úî savings deposits
‚úî other highly liquid financial instruments

These aggregates measure how much money is available in the economy for spending, investment, and lending.

üîπ Important: Global M2 is a macroeconomic indicator, not an on-chain blockchain metric. It is based on reports from major central banks (USA, Eurozone, China, Japan, etc.) and reflects global fiat currency liquidity.

How Global M2 affects the market and Bitcoin price

Relationship between Global M2 and BTC:
‚úî Numerous studies and charts show that growth in global money supply often coincides with rising Bitcoin prices ‚Äî although the relationship is not always direct or immediate.
‚úî Many analysts have observed that periods of M2 expansion historically aligned with BTC bull phases.
‚úî Global liquidity tends to impact risk assets (stocks, crypto) more strongly than conservative assets.
‚úî Some analysts suggest a time lag (~12 weeks) between Global M2 growth and BTC price movements.
‚úî Certain analytical models have found a statistical relationship between money supply growth and BTC (e.g., during 2015‚Äì2025).

Why Global M2 matters:
üá∫üá∏ Global M2 reflects cash and deposits that can potentially flow into financial markets.
When Global M2 increases ‚Üí available liquidity rises, part of which may:
‚úî flow into risk assets
‚úî support demand for BTC as an alternative asset
‚úî increase pressure on fiat currencies through inflation (theoretically)

This is why analysts closely monitor Global M2 as a macro indicator of liquidity and risk appetite.
text.si:
Globalni M2 predstavlja skupno denarno maso M2 v svetovnem gospodarstvu ‚Äî ≈°irok kazalnik likvidnosti, ki vkljuƒçuje:
‚úî gotovino v obtoku
‚úî depozite na vpogled
‚úî varƒçevalne vloge
‚úî druga visoko likvidna sredstva

Ti agregati merijo, koliko denarja je na voljo v gospodarstvu za potro≈°njo, nalo≈æbe in kreditiranje.

üîπ Pomembno: Globalni M2 je makroekonomski kazalnik, ne on-chain metrika verige blokov. Temelji na poroƒçilih centralnih bank veƒçjih dr≈æav (ZDA, evroobmoƒçje, Kitajska, Japonska itd.) in odra≈æa globalno likvidnost fiat valut.

Kako Globalni M2 vpliva na trg in ceno Bitcoina

Povezava med Globalnim M2 in BTC:
‚úî ≈†tevilne ≈°tudije in grafi ka≈æejo, da rast globalne denarne mase pogosto sovpada z rastjo cene Bitcoina ‚Äî ƒçeprav povezava ni vedno neposredna ali takoj≈°nja.
‚úî Analitiki opa≈æajo, da so se obdobja ≈°irjenja M2 zgodovinsko ujemala z bikovskimi fazami BTC.
‚úî Globalna likvidnost pogosto bolj vpliva na tvegana sredstva (delnice, kripto) kot na konzervativne nalo≈æbe.
‚úî Obstajajo predpostavke o ƒçasovnem zamiku (~12 tednov) med rastjo Globalnega M2 in gibanjem cene BTC.
‚úî Nekateri analitiƒçni modeli so odkrili statistiƒçno povezavo med rastjo denarne mase in BTC (npr. v obdobju 2015‚Äì2025).

Zakaj je Globalni M2 pomemben:
üá∫üá∏ Globalni M2 predstavlja gotovino in depozite, ki se lahko potencialno prelijejo na finanƒçne trge.
ƒåe Globalni M2 raste ‚Üí razpolo≈æljiva likvidnost se poveƒçuje, del te pa lahko:
‚úî preide v tvegana sredstva
‚úî podpira povpra≈°evanje po BTC kot alternativnem sredstvu
‚úî poveƒça pritisk na fiat valute prek inflacije (teoretiƒçno)

Zato analitiki spremljajo Globalni M2 kot makroekonomski kazalnik likvidnosti in nagnjenosti k tveganju.

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 02.01.2026.

Global M2 money supply continues to expand, though growth rates remain moderate.
M2 growth has been observed in the United States, the Eurozone, and other major economies.

Despite rising M2, Bitcoin price movements have at times diverged from a direct correlation (for example, during summer 2025, a divergence between BTC and Global M2 was observed).

This suggests that while global liquidity remains high, its impact on BTC price is indirect ‚Äî transmitted through demand, investor sentiment, and capital flows.

Global M2 impact outlook:

Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks): moderate and indirect influence ‚Äî Global M2 should not be viewed as a short-term price trigger.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months): continued monetary expansion may support BTC through increased risk appetite and capital availability.

Long-term (12+ months): Global M2 remains a key macro factor ‚Äî rising liquidity supports capital-intensive assets such as Bitcoin.
extra.si:
ANALIZA na dan 02.01.2026.

Globalna denarna masa M2 se ≈°e naprej poveƒçuje, vendar z zmernimi stopnjami rasti.
Rast M2 je bila zaznana v ZDA, evroobmoƒçju in drugih veƒçjih gospodarstvih.

Kljub rasti M2 je gibanje cene Bitcoina obƒçasno odstopalo od neposredne korelacije (na primer poleti 2025 je bila opa≈æena divergenca med BTC in Globalnim M2).

To pomeni, da globalna likvidnost ostaja visoka, vendar njen vpliv na ceno BTC poteka posredno ‚Äî prek povpra≈°evanja, razpolo≈æenja vlagateljev in kapitalskih tokov.

Napoved vpliva Globalnega M2 na Bitcoin:

Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne): zmeren in posreden vpliv ‚Äî Globalni M2 ni kratkoroƒçni spro≈æilec cene.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev): nadaljnja denarna ekspanzija lahko ustvari ugodno okolje za BTC zaradi veƒçje nagnjenosti k tveganju in razpolo≈æljivosti kapitala.

Dolgoroƒçno (12+ mesecev): Globalni M2 ostaja pomemben makro dejavnik ‚Äî rast likvidnosti podpira kapitalsko intenzivna sredstva, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.

title.en: TREAST Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level
title.ru: TREAST Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level
title.si: TREAST Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level

text.en: Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level. Analysis 5.01.2026. TREAST value is approximately 4,227,801 million dollars (~4,227 trillion USD) ‚Äî slightly higher than previous weeks. fred.stlouisfed.org This means that at the end of 2025, the Fed held a significant volume of Treasury securities on its balance sheet and did not sharply reduce its holdings in recent weeks. How to interpret TREAST dynamics Fed balance sheet and base liquidity The Fed's balance sheet includes many assets (Treasuries, mortgage-backed securities, etc.). At the end of 2025, it slightly increased compared to previous data, indicating support for monetary liquidity at current levels. If TREAST is stable or slowly growing, this means the Fed is not aggressively reducing liquidity and not selling large bond packages. Impact on markets and Bitcoin price Direct impact on liquidity TREAST is not a traded asset, it is the balance sheet volume of Fed assets reflecting US monetary policy. It does not directly affect Bitcoin price but is an important indicator of liquidity in the global financial system. How TREAST affects markets Fed balance growth or stability (TREAST growth/plateau) Liquidity support, potentially softer financial conditions May contribute to increased risk appetite among investors. High-risk assets (tech sector stocks, cryptocurrencies) receive indirect support. Fed balance reduction (sharp TREAST decrease) Liquidity squeeze, rising rates Pressure on risk assets and market liquidity decline. TREAST forecast Short-term perspective (1‚Äì4 weeks) Based on recent weeks' data: TREAST remains relatively stable with slight growth, this may signal a passive or moderate monetary stance by the Fed, without sharp QT. Short-term this means absence of strong liquidity pressure on markets and relatively favorable background for risk assets. Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì3 months) In medium-term perspective, the following scenarios are possible: If balance remains stable or grows, this indicates broad monetary liquidity, which historically supports weaker dollar conditions and can be favorable for growing markets and Bitcoin. If signals of increased Fed bond sales appear, this may create moderate liquidity pressure, especially if inflation expectations rise and Fed intensifies QT. Long-term perspective (6‚Äì24 months) Long-term TREAST direction largely depends on Fed monetary policy in response to inflation, economic data, and recession risks. If Fed returns to softer policy or resumes purchases (QE), TREAST may grow. This would mean increased dollar liquidity, which historically supports risk assets including Bitcoin. If Fed continues QT and reduces balance, TREAST will decline, potentially indicating tighter financing conditions and reduced appetite for risky assets. How this may affect Bitcoin Bitcoin is not directly dependent on TREAST but reacts to changes in global liquidity and monetary policy: Increased liquidity (TREAST growth/plateau) ‚Äî potentially positive signal for Bitcoin, stocks, and crypto market. TREAST reduction / intensified QT ‚Äî may reduce risk appetite and negatively affect Bitcoin. These influences manifest through global financial conditions and investor risk appetite, not through direct transaction mechanisms. Conclusion Current TREAST level on 5.01.2026 indicates holding significant Treasury volume on Fed balance with moderate growth. This reflects relatively neutral-supportive monetary stance without aggressive QT. Short-term forecast: stable background, possible moderate support for risk assets including Bitcoin. Medium-term forecast: if balance remains stable, this will support current markets; start of significant QT will create pressure. Long-term forecast: depends on Fed monetary policy: balance expansion creates favorable conditions for risk assets, balance reduction limits risk appetite.
text.si: Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level. Analiza 5.01.2026. Vrednost TREAST je pribli≈æno 4.227.801 milijonov dolarjev (~4.227 bilijonov USD) ‚Äî rahlo vi≈°ja od preteklih tednov. fred.stlouisfed.org To pomeni, da je konec leta 2025 Fed na svoji bilanci dr≈æal znaten obseg ameri≈°kih dr≈æavnih obveznic in v zadnjih tednih dejansko ni ostro zmanj≈°al svojih nalo≈æb. Kako interpretirati dinamiko TREAST Bilanca Feda in osnovna likvidnost Bilanca Feda vkljuƒçuje ≈°tevilne aktive (Treasuries, hipotekarske vrednostne papirje itd.). Konec leta 2025 se je rahlo poveƒçala v primerjavi s preteklimi podatki, kar ka≈æe na podporo monetarne likvidnosti na trenutnih nivojih. ƒåe je TREAST stabilen ali poƒçasi nara≈°ƒça, to pomeni, da Fed ne agresivno zmanj≈°uje likvidnosti in ne prodaja velikih paketov obveznic. Vpliv na trge in ceno Bitcoina Neposreden vpliv na likvidnost TREAST ni trgovski aktiv, temveƒç je obseg aktivov na bilanci Feda, ki odra≈æa monetarno politiko ZDA. Neposredno ne vpliva na ceno Bitcoina, vendar je pomemben indikator likvidnosti v globalnem finanƒçnem sistemu. Kako TREAST vpliva na trge Rast ali stabilnost bilance Feda (rast/plato TREAST) Podpora likvidnosti, potencialno mehkej≈°i finanƒçni pogoji Lahko prispeva k poveƒçanju apetita po tveganju med vlagatelji. Aktivi z visokim tveganjem (delnice tehnolo≈°kega sektorja, kriptovalute) dobijo posredno podporo. Zmanj≈°anje bilance Feda (ostro zmanj≈°anje TREAST) Stiskanje likvidnosti, dvig obrestnih mer Pritisk na riziƒçne aktive in upad likvidnosti na trgih. Napoved TREAST Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì4 tedne) Na podlagi trenutnih podatkov zadnjih tednov: TREAST ostaja relativno stabilen z rahlim rastjo, kar lahko signalizira pasivno ali zmerno monetarno dr≈æo Feda brez ostrih QT. Kratkoroƒçno to pomeni odsotnost moƒçnega pritiska likvidnosti na trge in relativno ugoden ozadje za riziƒçne aktive. Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì3 mesece) V srednjeroƒçni perspektivi so mo≈æni naslednji scenariji: ƒåe bilanca ostane stabilna ali raste, to ka≈æe na ≈°iroko monetarno likvidnost, ki zgodovinsko podpira ≈°ibkej≈°e dolarjeve pogoje in je lahko ugodna za rastoƒçe trge in Bitcoin. ƒåe se bodo pojavili signali poveƒçanih prodaj obveznic Feda, lahko to ustvari zmeren pritisk na likvidnost, ≈°e posebej ƒçe bodo inflacijske napovedi rasle in Fed intenzivira QT. Dolgooroƒçna perspektiva (6‚Äì24 mesecev) Dolgooroƒçna smer TREAST v veliki meri dependira od monetarne politike Feda v odziv na inflacijo, ekonomske podatke in tveganja recesije. ƒåe se bo Fed vrnil k mehkej≈°i politiki ali obnovil nakupe (QE), se lahko TREAST poveƒça. To bo pomenilo poveƒçano dolarjevo likvidnost, ki zgodovinsko podpira riziƒçne aktive, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom. ƒåe bo Fed nadaljeval QT in zmanj≈°eval bilanco, se bo TREAST zmanj≈°eval, kar lahko ka≈æe na stro≈æje pogoje financiranja in potencialno zmanj≈°anje apetita po riziƒçnih aktivih. Kako to lahko vpliva na Bitcoin Bitcoin ni neposredno odvisen od TREAST, vendar reagira na spremembe v globalni likvidnosti in monetarni politiki: Poveƒçana likvidnost (rast/plato TREAST) ‚Äî potencialno pozitiven signal za Bitcoin, delnice in kripto trg. Zmanj≈°anje TREAST / intenziviranje QT ‚Äî lahko zmanj≈°a apetit po tveganju in negativno vpliva na Bitcoin. Ti vplivi se ka≈æejo prek globalnih finanƒçnih pogojev in apetita vlagateljev po tveganju, ne prek neposrednih mehanizmov poslov. Zakljuƒçek Trenutna raven TREAST na 5.01.2026 ka≈æe na zadr≈æevanje znatnega obsega Treasuries na bilanci Feda z zmerno rastjo. To odra≈æa relativno nevtralno-podporno monetarno dr≈æo brez agresivnega QT. Kratkoroƒçna napoved: stabilen ozadje, mo≈æna zmerna podpora riziƒçnim aktivom, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom. Srednjeroƒçna napoved: ƒçe bo bilanca ostala stabilna, bo to podprlo trenutne trge; zaƒçetek znatnega QT bo ustvaril pritisk. Dolgooroƒçna napoved: odvisna od monetarne politike Feda: ≈°iritev bilance ustvarja ugodne pogoje za riziƒçne aktive, zmanj≈°anje bilance omejuje apetit po tveganju.

extra.en: TREAST is a ticker in the FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data) database corresponding to the indicator: "Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level" In simple terms, this is the volume of US Treasury bonds on the Federal Reserve's balance sheet, recorded as of Wednesday each week. This is one of the key components of the Fed's balance sheet and a direct indicator of: quantitative easing (QE), quantitative tightening (QT), overall dollar liquidity in the financial system. Economic meaning of the indicator When the Fed buys Treasury bonds: TREAST indicator grows, reserves enter the banking system, liquidity increases. When the Fed reduces bond volume: TREAST falls, liquidity is withdrawn, financial conditions tighten. Thus, TREAST shows how actively the Fed expands or contracts monetary conditions through the government debt market. How TREAST affects financial markets TREAST growth = increased liquidity, reduced interest rate pressure, increased risk appetite. Usually supports: stock indices, tech stocks, cryptocurrencies, commodities. TREAST decline = reduced liquidity, higher borrowing costs, investors move to safe-haven assets. Usually pressures: growth stocks, high-risk assets, Bitcoin and altcoins. Impact on Bitcoin price Bitcoin is not directly linked to the Fed's balance sheet but is extremely sensitive to dollar liquidity. Historical logic: Fed balance expansion ‚Üí growth of available capital ‚Üí part of liquidity flows to BTC, balance reduction ‚Üí liquidity shortage ‚Üí pressure on BTC price. In many cycles, TREAST dynamics led Bitcoin movement by several weeks or months, especially during monetary regime changes. How TREAST is used in forecasts and trading 1. Macro market regime indicator TREAST growth ‚Äî bullish macro background, TREAST decline ‚Äî defensive regime. Traders use it as a filter: in growing TREAST prefer long positions, in declining ‚Äî caution or hedging. 2. Fed policy change indicator TREAST decline slowdown or stabilization often signals: QT ending, possible pause, preparation for policy easing. Markets usually react in advance, even before official Fed statements. 3. Combination with other liquidity indicators TREAST is rarely used alone. It is analyzed together with: total Fed balance (WALCL), Reverse Repo (RRP), Treasury General Account (TGA), Global M2. Signal coincidence strengthens medium-term trend probability. Indicator limitations weekly data, not suitable for intraday trading; market impact manifests with time lag; short-term BTC movements may completely ignore TREAST due to news or speculative demand
extra.si: TREAST je ticker v bazi FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data), ki ustreza kazalniku: ‚ÄûAssets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level‚Äú Preprosto reƒçeno, to je obseg ameri≈°kih dr≈æavnih obveznic (U.S. Treasuries) na bilanci Federalne rezerve, zabele≈æen po stanju na sredo vsakega tedna. To je ena kljuƒçnih komponent bilance Feda in neposreden indikator: kvantitativnega spro≈°ƒçanja (QE), kvantitativnega zaostrovanja (QT), splo≈°ne dolarjeve likvidnosti v finanƒçnem sistemu. Ekonomski pomen kazalnika Ko Fed kupuje dr≈æavne obveznice: kazalnik TREAST raste, v banƒçni sistem vstopijo rezerve, likvidnost se poveƒça. Ko Fed zmanj≈°uje obseg obveznic: TREAST pada, likvidnost se umika, finanƒçni pogoji se zaostrujejo. Tako TREAST ka≈æe, kako aktivno Fed prek trga dr≈æavnega dolga ≈°iri ali stiska monetarne pogoje. Kako TREAST vpliva na finanƒçne trge. Rast TREAST = poveƒçana likvidnost, zmanj≈°an pritisk obrestnih mer, poveƒçan apetit po tveganju. Obiƒçajno podpira: delni≈°ke indekse, tehnolo≈°ke delnice, kriptovalute, surovine. Padec TREAST = zmanj≈°ana likvidnost, vi≈°ji stro≈°ki zadol≈æevanja, vlagatelji be≈æijo v varne aktiv. Obiƒçajno pritiska na: delnice rasti, visoko tvegane aktiv, Bitcoin in altcoine. Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina Bitcoin ni neposredno povezan z bilanco Feda, vendar je izjemno obƒçutljiv na dolarjevo likvidnost. Zgodovinska logika: ≈°iritev bilance Feda ‚Üí rast razpolo≈æljivega kapitala ‚Üí del likvidnosti teƒçe v BTC, zmanj≈°anje bilance ‚Üí pomanjkanje likvidnosti ‚Üí pritisk na ceno BTC. V mnogih ciklih je dinamika TREAST vodila gibanje Bitcoina za veƒç tednov ali mesecev, ≈°e posebej v obdobjih spremembe monetarnega re≈æima. Kako se TREAST uporablja v napovedih in trgovanju 1. Makro indikator re≈æima trga rast TREAST ‚Äî bikovski makro ozadje, padec TREAST ‚Äî defenzivni re≈æim. Trgovci ga uporabljajo kot filter: v rastoƒçem TREAST prednost dolgim pozicijam, v padajoƒçem ‚Äî previdnost ali zavarovanje. 2. Indikator spremembe politike Feda Upoƒçasnitev padca TREAST ali stabilizacija pogosto signalizira: konec QT, mo≈æno pavzo, pripravo na omilitev politike. Trgi obiƒçajno reagirajo vnaprej, ≈°e pred uradnimi izjavami Feda. 3. Kombinacija z drugimi indikatorji likvidnosti. TREAST se redko uporablja sam. Analizira se skupaj z: skupno bilanco Feda (WALCL), Reverse Repo (RRP), Treasury General Account (TGA), Global M2. Sovpadanje signalov krepi verjetnost srednjeroƒçnega trenda. Omejitve kazalnika to so tedenski podatki, neprimerni za intradnevno trgovanje; vpliv na trge se ka≈æe z ƒçasovnim zamikom; kratkoroƒçna gibanja BTC lahko TREAST popolnoma spregledajo zaradi novic ali spekulativnega povpra≈°evanja

title.en: WALCL Assets: Total Assets of the Federal Reserve (including the SOMA portfolio)
title.ru: WALCL Assets: Total Assets of the Federal Reserve (including the SOMA portfolio)
title.si: WALCL Assets: Total Assets of the Federal Reserve (including the SOMA portfolio)

text.en:
1. Current WALCL state (approximately today)
Latest release data shows Fed balance remains at historically high levels around ~8.2‚Äì8.3 trillion USD (exact figure depends on fresh weekly FRED/H.4.1 data).
Recent weekly changes show moderate growth or stabilization after contraction periods typical for 2023‚Äì2024.
Fed hasn't activated significant asset sales recently ‚Äî this means net liquidity remains high.
Overall current WALCL shows no sharp contraction but also no accelerated growth.

2. Practical WALCL trend forecast
Short-term perspective (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Expected trend: stability or moderate growth
Fed balance tends toward plateau/slow growth as Fed current meetings haven't given clear signals for aggressive QT.
Break in balance reduction indicates monetary conditions not tightening sharply.
Next weeks balance likely to either fluctuate at current levels or slightly increase via reinvestment of maturities.
Practical conclusion: short-term balance won't become driver for sharp market moves but creates neutral-positive backdrop for risk assets.

Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì6 months)
Expected trend: moderate growth or sideways movement with periods of slight expansion
If macroeconomic data remains unstable and inflation risks persist, Fed more likely to restrain tightening and may shift to soft actions if economic conditions worsen.
This perspective possible scenarios where Fed returns to partial QE or extends current policy supporting balance growth.
However rate hike risks or liquidity pressure remain so balance growth scale will be moderate.
Practical conclusion: medium-term Fed balance likely to show smooth growth or stabilization at high levels.

Long-term perspective (6‚Äì24+ months)
Expected trend: plateau with growth tendency
Over longer quarters horizon Fed may react to economic activity cycles, inflation and financial risks.
If global economy shows recession signs or growth slowdown ‚Äî balance may increase as Fed acts as 'liquidity provider'.
If global economy strengthens and inflation sustainably controlled ‚Äî balance may partially correct down but not to pre-pandemic levels.
Thus long-term scenario more likely represents plateau with moderate expansion periods rather than sharp contraction.
Practical conclusion: long-term base scenario ‚Äî balance remains significant with possible expansion phases.

3. WALCL impact on markets
Markets overall
Fed balance growth or stabilization supports overall financial liquidity ‚Äî positive backdrop for risky assets as higher liquidity reduces capital cost and increases risk appetite.
Balance reduction (if resumed) leads to tightening conditions, yield growth and pressure on stocks, corporate debt and high-risk assets.
Currently balance shows no significant contraction indicating macro backdrop remains supportive of risk assets.

4. WALCL impact on Bitcoin price
Bitcoin not directly dependent on Fed balance but through global liquidity mechanism WALCL reaction clearly traceable:
Positive signals
WALCL stability or growth ‚Üí more generous liquidity ‚Üí capital tends to move to 'risk instruments' like digital assets.
Combined with spot ETF inflows and other flows this contributes to Bitcoin demand increase.
Historically periods when Fed balance stopped sharp contraction or started expanding accompanied Bitcoin price growth.
Negative signals
If WALCL started declining sharply and continuously ‚Äî this would mean liquidity withdrawal ‚Üí pressure on risk assets including Bitcoin.
Such tightening in past coincided with crypto market corrections.
Current WALCL signal not bearish but rather neutral-bullish.

5. Practical Bitcoin forecast
Short-term
Bitcoin presumably fluctuates in current range with moderate upward tendency if Fed balance continues holding current levels or slightly expanding.
Absence of sharp liquidity contraction reduces strong correction risk.
Medium-term
With moderate balance growth and continued institutional investor interest cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin may gradually strengthen.
Key resistance levels will determine dynamics but fundamental backdrop remains favorable.
Long-term
If global liquidity remains broad and Fed inclined to easing policy if economic conditions worsen ‚Äî this creates sustainably favorable backdrop for Bitcoin.
Bitcoin may continue upward cycles with correction periods within market phases.
Summary
WALCL currently remains on high but stable base reflecting cautious Fed monetary policy positioning.
Short-term forecast suggests balance stabilization or moderate growth supporting positive backdrop for risk assets.
Medium-term forecast ‚Äî balance likely to expand or remain high, positive for markets and Bitcoin.
Long-term forecast ‚Äî balance remains significant with possible growth phases creating fundamentally favorable context for Bitcoin growth ceteris paribus.
text.si:
1. Trenutno stanje WALCL (pribli≈æno danes)
Podatki zadnje objave ka≈æejo, da ravnote≈æje Fed ostaja na zgodovinsko visoki ravni okoli ~8,2‚Äì8,3 bilijona USD (natanƒçna ≈°tevilka je odvisna od sve≈æih tedenskih podatkov FRED/H.4.1).
Zadnje tedenske spremembe ka≈æejo zmerno rast ali stabilizacijo ravnote≈æja po obdobjih krƒçenja, ki so bili znaƒçilni za 2023‚Äì2024.
Fed v zadnjih mesecih ni aktiviral pomembnih prodaj sredstev ‚Äî to pomeni, da neto likvidnost ostaja visoka.
Na splo≈°no trenutni WALCL ne ka≈æe ostrega krƒçenja, a tudi ne pospe≈°ene rasti.

2. Praktiƒçna napoved trenda WALCL
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì4 tedne)
Priƒçakovani trend: stabilnost ali zmerna rast
Ravnote≈æje Fed se nagiba k platoju/poƒçasni rasti, saj Fed na trenutnih sestankih ni dal jasnih signalov za agresivno QT.
Prekinitev krƒçenja ravnote≈æja ka≈æe, da se monetarni pogoji ne zaostrojo ostro.
V prihodnjih tednih se bo ravnote≈æje verjetno nihalo na trenutnih nivojih ali rahlo poveƒçalo zaradi reinvestiranja zapadlostih.
Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek: kratkoroƒçno ravnote≈æje ne bo gonilec ostrih tr≈ænih gibanj, a ustvarja nevtralno-pozitiven ozadje za riziƒçne sredstva.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Priƒçakovani trend: zmerna rast ali stransko gibanje z obdobji rahlega ≈°irjenja
ƒåe bodo makroekonomski podatki nestabilni in inflacijske tveganja vztrajala, bo Fed verjetneje zadr≈æeval zaostritev in se morda premaknil k mehkim ukrepom ob poslab≈°anju ekonomskih razmer.
V tej perspektivi mo≈æni scenariji, ko se bo Fed vrnil k delnemu QE ali podalj≈°al trenutno politiko, kar bo podprlo rast ravnote≈æja.
Vendar tveganja rasti obrestnih mer ali pritiska na likvidnost ostajajo, zato bo obseg rasti ravnote≈æja zmeren.
Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek: v srednjermu obdobju bo ravnote≈æje Fed verjetno kazalo gladko rast ali stabilizacijo na visokih nivojih.

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Priƒçakovani trend: plato z nagnjenostjo k rasti
Na obzorju veƒç ƒçetrtletij se lahko Fed odzove na cikle ekonomske aktivnosti, inflacije in finanƒçnih tveganj.
ƒåe bo svetovno gospodarstvo pokazalo znake recesije ali upoƒçasnitve rasti ‚Äî se lahko ravnote≈æje poveƒça, saj bo Fed nastopil kot 'dobavitelj likvidnosti'.
ƒåe se bo svetovno gospodarstvo okrepilo in inflacija vzdr≈æno nadzorovana ‚Äî se lahko ravnote≈æje delno popravi navzdol, a ne na predpandemiƒçne nivoje.
Torej dolgoroƒçni scenarij verjetneje predstavlja plato z obdobji zmernega ≈°irjenja, ne ostrega krƒçenja.
Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek: dolgoroƒçni osnovni scenarij ‚Äî ravnote≈æje ostane pomembno z mo≈ænimi fazami poveƒçanja.

3. Vpliv WALCL na trge
Trgi na splo≈°no
Rast ali stabilizacija ravnote≈æja Fed podpira skupno finanƒçno likvidnost ‚Äî pozitiven ozadje za riziƒçna sredstva, saj vi≈°ja likvidnost zmanj≈°uje stro≈°ke kapitala in poveƒçuje apetit po tveganju.
Krƒçenje ravnote≈æja (ƒçe se nadaljuje) vodi k zaostrenim pogojem, rasti donosnosti in pritisku na delnice, korporativne dolgove in visoko riziƒçna sredstva.
Trenutno ravnote≈æje ne ka≈æe pomembnega krƒçenja, kar ka≈æe, da makro-ozadje ostaja podporno riziƒçnim sredstvom.

4. Vpliv WALCL na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin ni neposredno odvisen od ravnote≈æja Fed, a prek mehanizma globalne likvidnosti je reakcija na WALCL jasno sledljiva:
Pozitivni signali
Stabilnost ali rast WALCL ‚Üí bolj radodarna likvidnost ‚Üí kapitali se nagibajo k selitvi v 'instrumente tveganja', kot so digitalna sredstva.
V kombinaciji z vtokom sredstev v spot ETF in drugimi tokovi to prispeva k poveƒçanju povpra≈°evanja po Bitcoinu.
Zgodovinsko obdobja, ko je ravnote≈æje Fed prenehalo ostro krƒçiti ali zaƒçelo ≈°iriti, spremljala rast cene Bitcoina.
Negativni signali
ƒåe bi WALCL zaƒçel ostro in neprekinjeno padati ‚Äî to bi pomenilo umik likvidnosti ‚Üí pritisk na riziƒçna sredstva, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
Tak≈°no krƒçenje je v preteklosti sovpadalo s korekcijami na kripto-trgu.
Trenutni signal WALCL ni medvedji, temveƒç prej nevtralno-bikovsk.

5. Praktiƒçna napoved za Bitcoin
Kratkoroƒçno
Predpostavljamo, da bo Bitcoin nihal v trenutnem razponu z zmerno nagnjenostjo k rasti, ƒçe bo ravnote≈æje Fed nadaljevalo dr≈æanje trenutnih nivojev ali rahlo ≈°irjenje.
Odsotnost ostrega krƒçenja likvidnosti zmanj≈°uje tveganje moƒçne korekcije.
Srednjeroƒçno
Ob zmerni rasti ravnote≈æja in nadaljnjem zanimanju institucionalnih vlagateljev za kriptovalute se lahko Bitcoin postopoma krepi.
Kljuƒçni nivoji odpora bodo doloƒçali dinamiko, a fundamentalno ozadje ostaja ugodno.
Dolgoroƒçno
ƒåe bo globalna likvidnost ostala ≈°iroka in Fed nagnjen k omilitvi politike ob poslab≈°anju ekonomskih razmer ‚Äî to ustvarja vzdr≈æno ugodno ozadje za Bitcoin.
Bitcoin lahko nadaljuje vzpon ciklov z obdobji korekcij znotraj tr≈ænih faz.
Povzetek
WALCL trenutno ostaja na visoki, a stabilni osnovi, kar odra≈æa previden polo≈æaj monetarne politike Fed.
Kratkoroƒçna napoved predpostavlja stabilizacijo ali zmerno rast ravnote≈æja, kar podpira pozitivno ozadje za riziƒçna sredstva.
Srednjeroƒçna napoved ‚Äî ravnote≈æje bo verjetno raslo ali ostajalo visoko, kar je pozitivno za trge in Bitcoin.
Dolgoroƒçna napoved ‚Äî ravnote≈æje bo ostalo pomembno z mo≈ænimi fazami rasti, kar ustvarja fundamentalno ugoden kontekst za rast Bitcoina ob enakih drugih pogojih.

extra.en:
WALCL ‚Äî FRED St. Louis Fed data series code and key line in Federal Reserve System (US Fed) balance sheet. Full name:
"Assets: Total Assets of the Federal Reserve (including the SOMA portfolio) (WALCL)"
This means:
Fed overall balance ‚Äî total value of all assets Fed holds on balance sheet,
includes U.S. Treasury Securities, mortgage-backed securities MBS, and other assets,
denominated in dollars.
Simply: WALCL reflects current Fed balance size.
Data updated weekly in H.4.1 report.

Why WALCL important
Fed balance ‚Äî fundamental indicator of US monetary policy. Through buying/selling assets (Treasuries, MBS etc.) Fed regulates liquidity, interest rates and financial conditions in economy.
WALCL change reflects:
quantitative easing (QE) ‚Äî balance growth,
quantitative tightening (QT) ‚Äî balance contraction.

Fundamental WALCL impact logic
1. Liquidity in financial system
WALCL directly reflects dollar liquidity level in economy:
balance growth means dollars added to system ‚Äî through Treasury and mortgage paper purchases,
balance contraction means liquidity withdrawal (through sales or non-reinvestment).
Liquidity level impacts all financial markets.

WALCL impact on markets and Bitcoin price
Liquidity connection
Fed balance doesn't directly affect Bitcoin price but through liquidity and risk appetite mechanism:
High or growing balance (WALCL):
increases capital availability,
eases pressure on rates and dollar,
stimulates investments in risk assets,
often accompanies stocks, commodities and cryptoassets growth including Bitcoin.
Balance reduction (QT):
withdraws liquidity,
increases borrowing costs,
increases safe asset attractiveness,
may limit growth or cause corrections in risk assets.
Thus WALCL ‚Äî macro indicator of market base backdrop reflecting global monetary conditions.

Interconnection with other market indicators
With Fed balance indicators
WALCL closely correlates with:
TREAST ‚Äî Treasury volume on balance,
MBS holdings ‚Äî mortgage papers,
Reverse Repo (RRP) ‚Äî reflects banking system reserve excess.
WALCL changes through QE/QT impact interest rates, currency rates and capital allocation.
With market indexes and assets
WALCL often linked with dynamics:
stock indexes (S&P 500, Nasdaq),
gold and commodities,
currency rates (USD index),
cryptocurrency markets (BTC, ETH).
BALCL growth often coincides with risk-on phases, contraction with liquidity shortage periods.
With Bitcoin dynamics
Meta-analytics and institutional traders note Fed balance indicators may precede major market cycles:
expansion phases ‚Äî favorable for BTC,
contraction phases ‚Äî correction or sideways movement risk.
This works through systemic liquidity demand rather than direct causal links.

Practical WALCL use in forecasts and trading
1. As market regime filter
WALCL often used as macro filter for market backdrop determination:
growing balance ‚Üí more favorable risk asset conditions,
contracting balance ‚Üí caution, trend decline risk.

2. As confirming indicator
WALCL used in combination with:
market price,
trading volumes,
volatility,
other economic data (rates, CPI, GDP, USD role),
BTC on-chain indicators.
If balance rises simultaneously with BTC price growth and volume increase ‚Äî confirms trend sustainability.

3. In risk assessment and capital allocation models
Institutional investors use WALCL for:
liquidity cycle assessment,
capital allocation phase determination,
positional risk adjustment,
cash flow analysis into risk assets.
WALCL rarely used as single trading signal but serves context for market movement interpretation.

Usage limitations
WALCL updated weekly with lag ‚Äî not suitable for intraday trading.
Indicator reflects only US Fed balance ‚Äî but markets global.
Market reaction to balance change may have delay (weeks to months).
WALCL doesn't indicate price direction, shows monetary conditions.
Summary
WALCL ‚Äî fundamental macro indicator reflecting US monetary conditions through Fed balance. Doesn't show asset prices directly but through liquidity, capital cost and risk appetite impacts global markets including stocks, currencies, commodities and cryptocurrencies.
extra.si:
WALCL ‚Äî koda serije podatkov na spletni strani Federalne rezervne banke St. Louis (FRED) in kljuƒçna vrstica v bilanci Federalnega rezervnega sistema (Fed ZDA). Polno ime:
"Assets: Total Assets of the Federal Reserve (including the SOMA portfolio) (WALCL)"
To pomeni:
ravnote≈æje Fed na splo≈°no ‚Äî skupna vrednost vseh sredstev, ki jih Fed dr≈æi v bilanci,
vkljuƒçuje ameri≈°ke dr≈æavne obveznice, vrednostne papirje s hipoteko MBS in druga sredstva,
izra≈æeno v dolarjih.
Preprosteje: WALCL odra≈æa trenutno velikost ravnote≈æja Fed.
Podatki se posodabljajo tedensko v poroƒçilu H.4.1.

Zakaj je WALCL pomemben
Ravnote≈æje Fed ‚Äî temeljni indikator monetarne politike ZDA. Prek nakupa/prodaje sredstev (Treasuries, MBS itd.) Fed ureja likvidnost, obrestne mere in finanƒçne pogoje v gospodarstvu.
Sprememba WALCL odra≈æa:
kvantitativno omilitvijo (QE) ‚Äî rast ravnote≈æja,
kvantitativno zaostritev (QT) ‚Äî krƒçenje ravnote≈æja.

Temeljna logika vpliva WALCL
1. Likvidnost v finanƒçnem sistemu
WALCL neposredno odra≈æa nivo dolarske likvidnosti v gospodarstvu:
rast ravnote≈æja pomeni dodajanje dolarjev v sistem ‚Äî prek nakupa Treasuryjev in hipotekarnih papirjev,
krƒçenje ravnote≈æja pomeni umik likvidnosti (prek prodaj ali ne-reinvestiranja).
Nivo likvidnosti vpliva na vse finanƒçne trge.

Vpliv WALCL na trge in ceno Bitcoina
Povezava prek likvidnosti
Ravnote≈æje Fed ne vpliva neposredno na ceno Bitcoina, a prek mehanizma likvidnosti in apetita po tveganju:
Visoko ali rastoƒçe ravnote≈æje (WALCL):
poveƒçuje razpolo≈æljivost kapitala,
olaj≈°ava pritisk na mere in dolar,
spodbuja investicije v riziƒçna sredstva,
pogosto spremlja rast delnic, surovin in kripto-sredstev, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
Zmanj≈°anje ravnote≈æja (QT):
umika likvidnost,
poveƒçuje stro≈°ke zadol≈æevanja,
poveƒçuje privlaƒçnost varnih sredstev,
 lahko omejuje rast ali povzroƒça korekcije v riziƒçnih sredstvih.
Torej WALCL ‚Äî makro-indikator osnovnega ozadja trga, ki odra≈æa globalne monetarne pogoje.

Medpovezanost z drugimi tr≈ænimi indikatorji
Z indikatorji ravnote≈æja Fed
WALCL tesno korelira z:
TREAST ‚Äî volumen Treasuryjev v bilanci,
MBS holdings ‚Äî hipotekarni papirji,
Reverse Repo (RRP) ‚Äî odra≈æa prese≈æek rezerv banƒçnega sistema.
Spremembe WALCL prek QE/QT vplivajo na obrestne mere, devizne teƒçaje in alokacijo kapitala.
Z tr≈ænimi indeksi in sredstvi
WALCL pogosto povezujejo z dinamiko:
indeksov delnic (S&P 500, Nasdaq),
zlata in surovin,
deviznih teƒçajev (USD indeks),
kripto-trgov (BTC, ETH).
Rast BALCL pogosto sovpada z fazami rasti tveganja, krƒçenje z obdobji pomanjkanja likvidnosti.
Z dinamiko Bitcoina
Meta-analitiki in institucionalni trgovci opa≈æajo, da lahko indikatorji ravnote≈æja Fed predhodijo velike tr≈æne cikle:
faze ≈°irjenja ‚Äî ugodne za BTC,
faze krƒçenja ‚Äî tveganje korekcije ali stranskega gibanja.
To deluje prek sistemske potrbosti po likvidnosti, ne prek neposrednih vzroƒçno-poslediƒçnih povezav.

Praktiƒçna uporaba WALCL v napovedih in trgovanju
1. Kot filter tr≈ænega re≈æima
WALCL pogosto uporabljajo kot makro-filter za doloƒçitev tr≈ænega ozadja:
rastoƒçe ravnote≈æje ‚Üí bolj ugodni pogoji za riziƒçna sredstva,
krƒçeƒçe se ravnote≈æje ‚Üí previdnost, tveganje padca trenda.

2. Kot potrdilni indikator
WALCL uporabljajo v kombinaciji z:
tr≈æno ceno,
trgovalnimi volumeni,
nihajoƒçnostjo,
drugimi ekonomskimi podatki (mere, CPI, BDP, vloga USD),
on-chain indikatorji BTC.
ƒåe se ravnote≈æje hkrati z rastjo cene BTC in volumena poveƒça ‚Äî to potrjuje vzdr≈ænost trenda.

3. V modelih ocenjevanja tveganj in alokacije kapitala
In≈°titucijske nalo≈æbe uporabljajo WALCL za:
oceno ciklov likvidnosti,
doloƒçitev faz alokacije kapitala,
prilagajanje pozicijskega tveganja,
analizo tokov denarja v riziƒçna sredstva.
WALCL redko uporabljajo kot edini trgovalni signal, a slu≈æi kot kontekst za interpretacijo tr≈ænih gibanj.

Omejitve uporabe
WALCL se posodablja tedensko z zakasnitvijo ‚Äî ni primeren za intradnevno trgovanje.
Indikator odra≈æa le ravnote≈æje Fed ZDA ‚Äî a trgi so globalni.
Reakcija trga na spremembo ravnote≈æja lahko ima zakasnitev (tedni do mesecev).
WALCL ne ka≈æe smeri cene, ka≈æe monetarne pogoje.
Povzetek
WALCL ‚Äî temeljni makro-indikator, ki odra≈æa monetarne pogoje ZDA prek ravnote≈æja Fed. Neposredno ne ka≈æe cen sredstev, a prek likvidnosti, stro≈°kov kapitala in apetita po tveganju vpliva na globalne trge, vkljuƒçno z delnicami, valutami, surovinami in kriptovalutami.

text.en:
Current situation (as of today)
As of early January 2026:
‚Ä¢ Fed Funds Rate remains in 5.25‚Äì5.50% range, recent FOMC meetings confirmed current level unchanged.
‚Ä¢ Economic data (inflation, employment) remain moderate without clear signals for aggressive rate hike or immediate cut.
‚Ä¢ Market expectations (CME FedWatch) indicate high probability of rate holding current level next months with gradual shift toward cuts mid-year if inflation sustainably declines.
In short: rate currently fixed at high level, market expects no sharp changes next weeks.

2. USINTR trend forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
‚Ä¢ Fed Funds Rate almost certainly unchanged at next meetings.
‚Ä¢ Market already priced current rate level so next weeks main impact through market expectations not actual rate changes.
Expected trend: rate holds, possible minimal expectation fluctuations but no substantial moves.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
‚Ä¢ If inflation continues declining toward Fed targets (~2%) and economic data strengthens, Fed may start gradual rate cuts second half of period.
‚Ä¢ However if inflation data stays above targets or economic activity accelerates, rate may hold longer than expected.
Expected trend: likely gradual rate decline medium-term but highly data-dependent on inflation and employment.

Long-term (6‚Äì24+ months)
‚Ä¢ Long-term rate direction determined by economic cycles and inflation trends.
‚Ä¢ With sustained inflation and economic growth rate may hold high or even slightly increase.
‚Ä¢ If economy slows and inflation sustainably low, Fed may shift to rate cut phase supporting growth.
Expected trend: relatively high rate level with possible gradual decline responding to macroeconomic conditions.

3. Market impacts
Equities
‚Ä¢ High rate restrains equity valuations raising capital cost and lowering discounted present value of future earnings.
‚Ä¢ Rate stability reduces sudden shock risk but doesn't create strong drivers for aggressive market growth.
Conclusion: short-term neutral/slightly restraining for stocks; medium-term growth potential if rate cut expectations build.

Bonds
‚Ä¢ High rate makes yields more attractive stabilizing bond market.
Conclusion: bonds compete with risk assets for capital.

Dollar
‚Ä¢ High rate supports dollar ‚Äî investors seek higher yield.
Conclusion: dollar strength may pressure non-USD denominated assets.

4. How Fed Funds Rate affects Bitcoin price
Bitcoin has no direct Fed Funds Rate link but strong indirect impact through:
Risk appetite
‚Ä¢ High rate = expensive capital = reduced desire to invest in high-volatility assets.
‚Ä¢ Low rate = cheap capital = increased interest in risk assets including Bitcoin.
Liquidity availability
‚Ä¢ High rates reduce available capital.
‚Ä¢ Rate cuts increase available liquidity creating demand for illiquid/alternative asset classes.
Risk-free rate
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin pays no interest so high rate environment makes it less attractive vs fixed-income assets.

5. Practical rate impact forecast for Bitcoin
Short-term
‚Ä¢ With rate unchanged, Bitcoin more dependent on technical dynamics, volumes, on-chain data and market sentiment.
‚Ä¢ Future rate cut expectations may serve positive backdrop but actual moves determined by local trading levels and capital flows.
BTC forecast: range-bound dynamics with moderate upside bias.

Medium-term
‚Ä¢ If market expectations solidify around rate cuts second half period, this strengthens capital inflow to risk assets including Bitcoin.
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin as high-volatility asset may benefit from liquidity support.
BTC forecast: moderate uptrend if rate cut cycle begins.

Long-term
‚Ä¢ Long-term rate direction ‚Äî cyclical macroeconomic backdrop indicator.
‚Ä¢ If rate sustainably high multiple quarters potentially restrains significant crypto capital inflow.
‚Ä¢ If rate declines in long-term cycle creates favorable macro backdrop for Bitcoin.
BTC forecast: moderate growth cycles with gradually easing monetary policy.

6. Practical trading conclusions
‚Ä¢ Fed Funds Rate ‚Äî key macro factor impacting liquidity and risk appetite not short-term trading tool.
‚Ä¢ Rate behavior affects risk asset price/speed through expectations, liquidity and capital availability.
‚Ä¢ Use Fed Funds Rate effectively combined with CPI, PCE, employment, bond market and yield curve data.
Summary
‚Ä¢ Current: rate fixed high level ‚Äî short-term neutral backdrop.
‚Ä¢ Medium-term: rate cut probability shift ‚Äî positive signal for risk assets and Bitcoin.
‚Ä¢ Long-term: rate reflects economic cycles; cuts positive for markets/BTC, prolonged high rates may restrain growth.
text.si:
Trenutna situacija (na dana≈°nji dan)
Na zaƒçetku januarja 2026:
‚Ä¢ Obrestna mera zveznih skladov (Fed Funds Rate) ostaja v razponu 5,25‚Äì5,50%, zadnje seje FOMC so potrdile trenutno raven brez sprememb.
‚Ä¢ Ekonomski podatki (inflacija, zaposlenost) ostajajo zmerni brez jasnih signalov za agresivno dvigovanje ali takoj≈°nje zni≈æanje mere.
‚Ä¢ Tr≈æna priƒçakovanja (CME FedWatch) ka≈æejo visoko verjetnost ohranjanja mere na trenutni ravni naslednje mesece z postopnim premikom k zni≈æanju sredi leta, ƒçe se inflacija vzdr≈æno zni≈æuje.
Kratek povzetek: mera trenutno fiksirana na visoki ravni, trg ne priƒçakuje ostrih sprememb naslednji tedni.

2. Napoved trenda USINTR
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
‚Ä¢ Fed Funds Rate bo skoraj zagotovo ostala nespremenjena na naslednjih sejah.
‚Ä¢ Trg je ≈æe upo≈°teval trenutno raven mere, zato bodo naslednji tedni glavni vpliv skozi tr≈æna priƒçakovanja, ne dejanske spremembe mere.
Priƒçakovani trend: mera ostane, mo≈æni minimalni nihaji priƒçakovanj, a brez bistvenih gibanj.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
‚Ä¢ ƒåe se bo inflacija nadaljevala zni≈æevati proti ciljem Fed (~2%) in se bodo ekonomski podatki okrepili, lahko Fed zaƒçne z gladkim zni≈æevanjem mere v drugi polovici obdobja.
‚Ä¢ Vendar ƒçe bodo inflacijski podatki ostali nad cilji ali se bo ekonomska aktivnost okrepila, lahko mera ostane na prej≈°nji ravni dlje kot priƒçakovano.
Priƒçakovani trend: verjetno gladko zni≈æanje mere srednjeroƒçno, a moƒçno odvisno od podatkov o inflaciji in zaposlenosti.

Dolgoroƒçno (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
‚Ä¢ Dolgoroƒçna smer mere bo doloƒçena s ekonomskimi cikli in inflacijskimi trendi.
‚Ä¢ Ob vzdr≈æni inflaciji in gospodarski rasti lahko mera ostane visoka ali celo rahlo naraste.
‚Ä¢ ƒåe se bo gospodarstvo upoƒçasnilo in inflacija vzdr≈æno nizka, lahko Fed preide v fazo zni≈æevanja mer za podporo rasti.
Priƒçakovani trend: relativno visoka raven mere z mo≈ænim postopnim zni≈æevanjem v odziv na makroekonomske razmere.

3. Kako to vpliva na trge
Delnice
‚Ä¢ Visoka mera omejuje vrednotenje delnic, saj zvi≈°uje stro≈°ke kapitala in zni≈æuje diskontirano sedanjo vrednost prihodnjih dobiƒçkov.
‚Ä¢ Stabilnost mere zmanj≈°uje tveganje nenadnih ≈°okov, a ne ustvarja moƒçnih gonilcev za agresivno rast trga.
Zakljuƒçek: kratkoroƒçno nevtralno/lahko zadr≈æevalno za delnice; srednjeroƒçno potencial rasti ob priƒçakovanju zni≈æanja mere.

Obveznice
‚Ä¢ Visoka mera naredi donose bolj privlaƒçne za vlagatelje, kar stabilizira obvezni≈°ki trg.
Zakljuƒçek: obveznice tekmujejo z riziƒçnimi sredstvi za kapital.

Dolar
‚Ä¢ Visoka mera podpira dolar ‚Äî vlagatelji i≈°ƒçejo vi≈°je donose.
Zakljuƒçek: krepitev dolarja lahko pritiska na sredstva v drugi valuti.

4. Kako Fed Funds Rate vpliva na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin nima neposredne povezave z mero Fed Funds, a ima moƒçan posreden vpliv skozi:
Apetit po tveganju
‚Ä¢ Visoka mera = drag kapital = zmanj≈°an interes za visoko nihajoƒça sredstva.
‚Ä¢ Nizka mera = poceni kapital = poveƒçan interes za riziƒçna sredstva vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
Razpolo≈æljivost likvidnosti
‚Ä¢ Visoke mere zmanj≈°ajo razpolo≈æljivi kapital.
‚Ä¢ Zni≈æanje mere poveƒça razpolo≈æljivo likvidnost, kar ustvarja povpra≈°evanje po nelikvidnih in alternativnih razredih sredstev.
Mera brez tveganja
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin ne plaƒçuje obresti, zato je v visokomernem okolju manj privlaƒçen v primerjavi s fiksno donosnimi sredstvi.

5. Praktiƒçna napoved vpliva mere na Bitcoin
Kratkoroƒçno
‚Ä¢ Ker mera trenutno ne spremeni, bo Bitcoin bolj odvisen od tehniƒçne dinamike, volumnov, on-chain podatkov in tr≈ænega sentimenta.
‚Ä¢ Priƒçakovanja prihodnjega zni≈æanja mere lahko slu≈æijo kot pozitivno ozadje, a dejanska gibanja bodo doloƒçena s lokalnimi trgovalnimi nivoji in tokovi kapitala.
Napoved za BTC: razponsko gibanje z zmernim vzponom.

Srednjeroƒçno
‚Ä¢ ƒåe se bodo tr≈æna priƒçakovanja utrdila okoli zni≈æanja mere v drugi polovici obdobja, bo to okrepilo priliv kapitala v riziƒçna sredstva vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin kot visoko nihajoƒçe sredstvo lahko izkoristi podporo likvidnosti.
Napoved za BTC: zmeren vzpon ob prehodu v ciklus zni≈æevanja mere.

Dolgoroƒçno
‚Ä¢ Dolgoroƒçna smer mere je cikliƒçni indikator makroekonomskega ozadja.
‚Ä¢ ƒåe mera ostane vzdr≈æno visoka veƒç ƒçetrtletij, lahko omeji pomemben priliv kapitala v kripto.
‚Ä¢ ƒåe se mera dolgoroƒçno zni≈æuje, ustvarja ugodno makro-ozadje za Bitcoin.
Napoved za BTC: zmerni cikli rasti ob postopni omilitvi monetarne politike.

6. Praktiƒçni trgovalni zakljuƒçki
‚Ä¢ Fed Funds Rate je kljuƒçni makro-faktor, ki vpliva na likvidnost in apetit po tveganju, ne orodje za kratke posle.
‚Ä¢ Ved√™nje mere vpliva na ceno/hitrost gibanja riziƒçnih sredstev skozi priƒçakovanja, likvidnost in razpolo≈æljivost kapitala.
‚Ä¢ Uporabljajte Fed Funds Rate uƒçinkovito v kombinaciji s CPI, PCE, zaposlitvijo, obvezni≈°kim trgom in krivuljo donosnosti.
Povzetek
‚Ä¢ Trenutno: mera fiksirana na visoki ravni ‚Äî kratkoroƒçno nevtralno ozadje.
‚Ä¢ Srednjeroƒçno: verjetnost prehoda k zni≈æanju mere ‚Äî pozitiven signal za riziƒçna sredstva in Bitcoin.
‚Ä¢ Dolgoroƒçno: mera bo odra≈æala ekonomske cikle; zni≈æanje pozitivno za trge in BTC, dolgotrajno visoka mera lahko zadr≈æuje rast.

extra.en:
What is USINTR (Fed Funds Rate)
USINTR ‚Äî designation for US Federal Funds Rate published by St. Louis Fed (FRED). Target level for short-term interest rate at which US banks lend excess reserves overnight.
Rate set by Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) ‚Äî main US monetary policy tool.

Practical market significance
Fed Funds Rate ‚Äî money price very short interval but impacts entire financial market:
Borrowing cost
Fed Funds affects loan, deposit, corporate debt, mortgage rates etc.
Liquidity conditions
Rate hikes tighten monetary conditions, cuts loosen.
Market expectations and risk assets
Rate changes shape market expectations about future inflation pace, economic growth and profitability.
Fed policy signals
Rate decisions main channel through which Fed manages overall economy.

How rate affects markets
Equities
Rate hikes typically reduce risk asset attractiveness, increase equity future earnings discounting, high-valuation companies often decline.
Rate cuts make equities more attractive as capital cost decreases.
Currencies
Rate hikes increase USD asset yields ‚Üí strengthen dollar.
Rate cuts weaken dollar.
Bonds
Directly impacts yield curve.
Rate hikes lead to higher yields, falling bond prices.
Rate cuts ‚Äî reverse dynamics.

How rate affects Bitcoin price
No direct Fed Funds Rate-Bitcoin mechanism but connection realized through macroeconomic conditions:
Capital cost
Higher rate increases credit risk, raises capital cost, reduces liquidity availability.
Bitcoin as risky asset may exit growth phase entering correction in such conditions.
Capital inflow to dollar alternatives
Low rates encourage yield search outside traditional credit markets ‚Äî crypto spot/derivatives get additional capital flow.
Low rate periods investors more frequently consider BTC as alternative.
Holding cost
BTC generates no interest/dividend yield so high rate environment makes it less attractive vs interest-bearing instruments.
Risk asset correlation
Bitcoin often correlates with equity markets and risk assets.
Rate hikes may strengthen equity-crypto correlation during broad corrections.

Interconnections with other factors
With liquidity (WALCL, Reverse Repo, RRP)
Fed Funds Rate main monetary policy signal.
Combined with Fed balance (WALCL) determines overall monetary policy stance softness/tightness.
Example: rate frozen high + balance remains high ‚Üí less negative risk asset consequences than high rate + balance contraction combination.
With inflation data
Fed adjusts Fed Funds Rate responding to inflation trends.
Inflation acceleration often leads to rate hikes pressuring risk assets.

Practical Fed Funds Rate usage
1. Macro filter
Analysts use rate as primary macro indicator setting market tone:
Hiking trend ‚Üí caution on risk assets.
Cutting trend ‚Üí favorable risk asset backdrop.
2. Expectations and forecasts
Market forms expectations around future FOMC decisions through:
rate futures curve (Fed Funds Futures),
CME FedWatch indexes,
rate change probability models.
3. Position management
Traders consider rate in portfolio management:
hedging risk,
Bitcoin correlation with broader markets,
monetary policy-linked risk management.

Analytical interpretations
If rate hikes
Typically leads to:
liquidity reduction,
pressure intensification on risky assets,
dollar strengthening,
higher yields in traditional segments.
Bitcoin often corrects with other risk assets in such environment.
If rate stable/cuts
Means:
monetary policy easing,
capital availability,
stimulus for risk/alternative asset investments.
Bitcoin often shows relative outperformance in such phase.

USINTR trend forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Rate more reflects market expectations and FOMC interpreted signals. If inflation/employment data remain moderate, rate may stay unchanged giving neutral-supportive market/crypto backdrop.
If data indicates inflation acceleration, rate may be repriced higher pressuring risk assets.
Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
Rate likely remains inflation-fighting oriented staying current level some time until substantial data pushes FOMC to adjustments.
Such period typically characterized by risk repricing and slow market adaptation.
Long-term (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term movements depend on economic cycle:
if economy slows rate may decline ‚Äî creates favorable risk asset backdrop,
if inflation accelerates again rate stays high/rises ‚Äî pressures Bitcoin/equities.

Practical conclusion
Fed Funds Rate ‚Äî key market backdrop driver.
Substantially impacts capital availability, investor risk appetite, financial asset cost.
Bitcoin reacts more indirectly through liquidity changes, risk asset correlations and market risk perception shifts.
Fed Funds Rate used in forecasts as macro trend filter not short-term signal.
extra.si:
Kaj je USINTR (Fed Funds Rate)
USINTR je oznaka za ameri≈°ko stopnjo federalnih skladov (Federal Funds Rate), ki jo objavlja Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis (FRED). To je ciljna raven kratkoroƒçne obrestne mere, po kateri si ameri≈°ke banke izposojajo odveƒçne rezerve med seboj ƒçez noƒç (overnight).
Stopnjo doloƒça Federalni odbor za odprti trg (FOMC) in je glavno orodje ameri≈°ke denarne politike.

Praktiƒçni pomen za trge
Fed Funds Rate je cena denarja v zelo kratkem ƒçasovnem okviru, vendar njen vpliv zajema celoten finanƒçni trg:
Stro≈°ki zadol≈æevanja
Fed Funds vpliva na obrestne mere za posojila, depozite, podjetni≈°ki dolg, hipoteke itd.
Pogoji likvidnosti
Zvi≈°anje stopnje zaostri denarne pogoje, zni≈æanje jih sprosti.
Tr≈æna priƒçakovanja in tvegana sredstva
Spremembe stopnje oblikujejo tr≈æna priƒçakovanja o prihodnjih stopnjah inflacije, stopnjah gospodarske rasti in dobiƒçkonosnosti.
Signali o politiki Fed (Zvezne rezerve)
Odloƒçitve o stopnji so glavni kanal, prek katerega Fed upravlja celotno gospodarstvo.

Kako stopnja vpliva na trge
Delnice
Rast stopnje obiƒçajno zmanj≈°a privlaƒçnost tveganih sredstev, dele≈æ diskontiranja prihodnjih dobiƒçkov delnic se poveƒça, vrednost podjetij z visoko vrednostjo pogosto pade.
Zni≈æanje stopnje naredi delnice bolj privlaƒçne, saj se stro≈°ki kapitala zmanj≈°ajo.
Valute
Rast stopnje poveƒça donosnost dolarskih sredstev ‚Üí okrep√≠ dolar.
Zni≈æanje stopnje oslabi dolar.
Obveznice
Neposredno vpliva na krivuljo donosov.
Zvi≈°anje stopnje vodi do rasti donosov, padanja cene obveznic.
Zni≈æanje stopnje - obratna dinamika.

Kako stopnja vpliva na ceno Bitcoina
Neposredne mehanizme med Fed Funds Rate in Bitcoinom ni, vendar se povezava uresniƒçi prek makroekonomskih pogojev:
Stro≈°ki kapitala
Povi≈°ana stopnja poveƒça kreditno tveganje, podra≈æi kapital, zmanj≈°a razpolo≈æljivost likvidnosti.
Bitcoin kot tvegano sredstvo lahko v tak≈°nih razmerah zapusti fazo rasti in preide v korekcijo.
Dotok kapitala v alternative dolarju
Nizke stopnje spodbujajo iskanje donosnosti zunaj tradicionalnega kreditnega trga ‚Äì spot in izvedeni finanƒçni instrumenti kripto prejmejo dodaten dotok kapitala.
V obdobjih nizkih stopenj vlagatelji pogosteje obravnavajo BTC kot alternativo.
Stro≈°ki dr≈æanja
BTC ne ustvarja donosnosti v obliki obresti ali kuponov, zato se lahko v obdobju visoke stopnje zdi manj privlaƒçen v primerjavi z obrestnimi instrumenti.
Korelacija s tveganimi sredstvi
Bitcoin je pogosto v korelaciji z delni≈°kim trgom in tveganimi sredstvi.
Rast stopnje lahko v obdobju ≈°iroke korekcije okrepi korelacijo med delnicami in kriptovalutami.

Povezave z drugimi dejavniki
Z likvidnostjo (WALCL, Reverse Repo, RRP)
Fed Funds Rate je glavni signal denarne politike.
Skupaj z bilanco Fed (WALCL) doloƒça splo≈°no usmerjenost glede mehkosti/strogosti denarne politike.
Na primer: stopnja je zamrznjena na visoki ravni + bilanca ostaja visoka ‚Üí posledice za tvegana sredstva so manj negativne kot pri kombinaciji visoke stopnje in zmanj≈°anja bilance.
Z inflacijskimi podatki
Fed prilagaja Fed Funds Rate glede na inflacijske trende.
Rast inflacije pogosto vodi do rasti stopnje, kar obiƒçajno povzroƒçi pritisk na tvegana sredstva.

Praktiƒçna uporaba Fed Funds Rate
1. Makro filter
Analitiki uporabljajo stopnjo kot glavni makro kazalnik, ki daje ton trgu:
Trend nara≈°ƒçanja ‚Üí previdnost glede tveganih sredstev.
Trend zni≈æevanja ‚Üí ugodno ozadje za tvegana sredstva.
2. Priƒçakovanja in napovedi
Trg oblikuje priƒçakovanja glede prihodnjih odloƒçitev FOMC. Ta priƒçakovanja so pogosto vkljuƒçena v napovedi prek:
krivuljo terminskih pogodb na stopnje (Fed Funds Futures),
indekse CME FedWatch,
modele verjetnosti spremembe stopnje.
3. Upravljanje pozicij
Trgovci upo≈°tevajo stopnjo pri upravljanju portfelja:
zavarovanje tveganja (hedging),
korelacija Bitcoina s ≈°ir≈°imi trgi,
vezava obvladovanja tveganja na denarno politiko.

Analitiƒçne interpretacije
ƒåe se stopnja zvi≈°uje
Obiƒçajno vodi do:
zmanj≈°anja likvidnosti,
okrepljenega pritiska na tvegana sredstva,
okrepitev dolarja,
zvi≈°anja donosov v tradicionalnih segmentih.
V takem okolju se Bitcoin pogosto popravlja skupaj z drugimi tveganimi sredstvi.
ƒåe je stopnja stabilna/se zni≈æuje
To pomeni:
ubla≈æitev denarne politike,
dostopnost kapitala,
spodbude za nalo≈æbe v tvegana, alternativna sredstva.
Bitcoin v tak≈°ni fazi pogosto ka≈æe relativno prednost v rasti.

Napoved trenda USINTR
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
Stopnja pogosteje odra≈æa tr≈æna priƒçakovanja in FOMC tolmaƒçene signale. ƒåe podatki o inflaciji in zaposlenosti ostanejo zmerni, lahko stopnja ostane nespremenjena. To bo dalo nevtralno-podporno ozadje za trge in kripto.
ƒåe bodo podatki, ki ka≈æejo na pospe≈°itev inflacije, se lahko stopnja prerazporedi vi≈°je, kar bo izvajalo pritisk na tvegana sredstva.
Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Stopnja bo verjetno ostala usmerjena v boj proti inflaciji in lahko ostane na trenutni ravni nekaj ƒçasa, dokler pomembni podatki ne potisnejo FOMC k prilagoditvam.
Tak≈°no obdobje je obiƒçajno oznaƒçeno s preoceno tveganja in poƒçasno prilagoditvijo trgov.
Dolgoroƒçno (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Dolgoroƒçna gibanja bodo odvisna od gospodarskega cikla:
ƒçe se gospodarstvo upoƒçasni, se lahko stopnja zni≈æuje ‚Äì to bo ustvarilo ugodno ozadje za tvegana sredstva,
ƒçe se inflacija znova pospe≈°i, bo stopnja ostala visoka ali se zvi≈°ala ‚Äì to bo izvajalo pritisk na Bitcoin in delnice.

Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek
Fed Funds Rate je kljuƒçni gonilnik splo≈°nega tr≈ænega ozadja.
Bistveno vpliva na dostopnost kapitala, apetit po tveganju vlagateljev, vrednost finanƒçnih sredstev.
Bitcoin v veƒçji meri reagira posredno prek spremembe likvidnosti, korelacije s tveganimi sredstvi in spreminjanja tr≈ænega dojemanja tveganja.
Fed Funds Rate se uporablja v napovedih kot makro filter trenda in ne kot kratkoroƒçni signal.

text.en:
Latest data shows TGA remains at moderately high levels after significant increase end of last year. This reflects combination of higher tax receipts, bond placements and slowed Treasury spending.
Several weeks ago TGA growth indicated liquidity withdrawal from banking system. Recent sessions dynamics shifted toward stabilization but account still shows no sustained decline.

Short-term trend (1‚Äì4 weeks)
TGA currently indicates weak liquidity in banking system:
Stable high TGA balance ‚Üí limited liquidity pressuring risk assets.
If Treasury data shows TGA starting to decline ‚Äî signals liquidity injection and market support.
Short-term forecast:
TGA likely remains current levels with slight downward volatility but no confident decline trend. Such backdrop creates moderate pressure on risk assets including Bitcoin.

Medium-term trend (1‚Äì6 months)
Medium-term two scenarios possible:
TGA gradually declines ‚Äî Treasury activates spending, reduces account ‚Üí liquidity returns to banking system. Creates softening backdrop for markets and Bitcoin.
TGA remains high or grows again ‚Äî Treasury continues accumulating funds (debt issuance, low spending) ‚Üí liquidity squeeze.
Current practical signals show no convincing signs of sustained TGA reduction but grounds exist Treasury will start spending accumulated funds if economic dynamics worsen.
Medium-term forecast:
TGA may slightly decline supporting liquidity recovery and risk asset support. However process will be gradual without sharp moves.

Long-term trend (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term TGA reacts to fiscal cycles and economic policy:
Economic conditions worsen or fiscal stimulus needed ‚Üí TGA declines ‚Üí liquidity returns to system.
Economy shows sustained growth and Treasury prefers holding high balance for debt management ‚Üí TGA remains high ‚Üí restraining liquidity.
Gradual TGA decline scenario more likely considering US government tendency use fiscal funds responding to activity slowdown.
Long-term forecast:
TGA gradually declines returning liquidity to banking system supporting risk assets in broader cycle.

Market and Bitcoin price impact
Markets overall
High TGA -> liquidity squeeze -> pressure on stocks, credit and risk assets.
TGA decline -> liquidity expansion -> improved risk appetite, stock market support.
Currently TGA creates neutral-restraining backdrop: markets range-bound without powerful demand drivers.
Bitcoin
Bitcoin sensitive to global dollar liquidity.
Current TGA level:
Limited liquidity creates price growth resistance.
If TGA starts noticeably declining becomes fundamental positive for Bitcoin especially combined with spot ETF capital inflows and improving macro sentiment.
Short-term Bitcoin likely consolidates or corrects, medium-term growth recovery possible with TGA decline, long-term gradual TGA decline supports more sustainable bullish trend.

Practical conclusion
Today: TGA remains high ‚Äî liquidity pressure persists restraining risk asset growth.
Short-term trend: stabilization likely with slight downward bias, moderate impact.
Medium-term trend: moderate TGA decline expected supporting markets and Bitcoin.
Long-term trend: gradual TGA decline, liquidity expansion and risk asset growth support.
TGA currently not powerful growth driver but TGA trend change becomes important market regime shift marker.
