Zadnji podatki ka≈æejo, da TGA ostaja na zmerno visoki ravni po znatnem poveƒçanju konec lanskega leta. To odra≈æa kombinacijo vi≈°jih davƒçnih prihodkov, plasiranja obveznic in upoƒçasnjenih izdatkov Ministrstva za finance.
Pred nekaj tedni je bil opa≈æen rast TGA, kar je pomenilo umik likvidnosti iz banƒçnega sistema. V zadnjih sejah se je dinamika premaknila proti stabilizaciji, a raƒçun ≈°e vedno ne ka≈æe vzdr≈ænega padca.

Kratkoroƒçni trend (1‚Äì4 tedne)
TGA trenutno ka≈æe ≈°ibko likvidnost v banƒçnem sistemu:
Stabilno visoko stanje TGA ‚Üí omejena likvidnost pritiska na riziƒçna sredstva.
ƒåe bodo podatki Ministrstva za finance pokazali, da TGA zaƒçne padati ‚Äî signal injekcije likvidnosti in podpore trgom.
Kratkoroƒçna napoved:
TGA bo verjetno ostal na trenutnih nivojih z rahlo padajoƒço nihajoƒçnostjo, a brez prepriƒçljivega trenda padanja. Tak≈°no ozadje ustvarja zmeren pritisk na riziƒçna sredstva vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.

Srednjeroƒçni trend (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
V srednjermu obzorju mo≈æna dva scenarija:
TGA postopno pada ‚Äî Ministrstvo za finance aktivira izdatke, zmanj≈°a raƒçun ‚Üí likvidnost se vrne v banƒçni sistem. Ustvarja mehƒçanje ozadja za trge in Bitcoin.
TGA ostaja visok ali spet raste ‚Äî Ministrstvo za finance nadaljuje kopiƒçenje sredstev (izdaja dolga, nizki izdatki) ‚Üí stiskanje likvidnosti.
Trenutni praktiƒçni signali ne ka≈æejo prepriƒçljivih znakov vzdr≈ænega zmanj≈°anja TGA, a obstajajo razlogi priƒçakovati, da bo Ministrstvo za finance zaƒçelo porabljati nabrala sredstva ob poslab≈°anju ekonomske dinamike.
Srednjeroƒçna napoved:
TGA se lahko rahlo zmanj≈°a, kar bo podprlo obnovo likvidnosti in podporo riziƒçnim sredstvom. Vendar bo proces postopen brez ostrih gibanj.

Dolgoroƒçni trend (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
V dolgoroƒçni perspektivi bo TGA reagiral na fiskalne cikle in ekonomsko politiko:
Ob poslab≈°anju ekonomskih razmer ali potrebi po fiskalnem spodbudniku TGA pada ‚Üí likvidnost se vrne v sistem.
ƒåe gospodarstvo ka≈æe vzdr≈æno rast in Ministrstvo za finance raje dr≈æi visoko stanje za upravljanje dolga ‚Üí TGA ostaja visok ‚Üí zadr≈æevalna likvidnost.
Scenarij postopnega padca TGA bolj verjeten glede na nagnjenost vlade ZDA k uporabi fiskalnih sredstev ob upoƒçasnitvi aktivnosti.
Dolgoroƒçna napoved:
TGA bo postopno padal vraƒçajoƒç likvidnost v banƒçni sistem podpirajoƒç riziƒçna sredstva v ≈°ir≈°em ciklu.

Vpliv na trge in ceno Bitcoina
Trgi na splo≈°no
Visok TGA -> stiskanje likvidnosti -> pritisk na delnice, kredite in riziƒçna sredstva.
Padec TGA -> ≈°iritev likvidnosti -> izbolj≈°an apetit po tveganju, podpora delni≈°kim trgom.
Trenutno TGA ustvarja nevtralno-zadr≈æevalno ozadje: trgi v razponu brez moƒçnih gonilcev povpra≈°evanja.
Bitcoin
Bitcoin je obƒçutljiv na globalno dollarsko likvidnost.
Na trenutni ravni TGA:
Omejena likvidnost ustvarja odpornost rasti cene.
ƒåe TGA zaƒçne opazno padati, bo to fundamentalno pozitivno za Bitcoin, ≈°e posebej v kombinaciji z dotokom kapitala v spot ETF in izbolj≈°anjem makro-razpolo≈æenja.
Kratkoroƒçno Bitcoin verjetno konsolidira ali korigira, srednjeroƒçno mo≈æna obnova rasti ob padcu TGA, dolgoroƒçno postopen padec TGA bo podpiral bolj vzdr≈æen bikovski trend.

Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek
Danes: TGA ostaja visok ‚Äî pritisk na likvidnost traja omejujoƒç rast riziƒçnih sredstev.
Kratkoroƒçni trend: verjetna stabilizacija z rahlim padajoƒçim naklonom, zmeren vpliv.
Srednjeroƒçni trend: priƒçakuje se zmeren padec TGA s podporo trgom in Bitcoinu.
Dolgoroƒçni trend: postopen padec TGA, ≈°iritev likvidnosti in podpora rasti riziƒçnih sredstev.
TGA trenutno ni moƒçan gonilec rasti, a sprememba trenda TGA bo pomemben marker spremembe tr≈ænega re≈æima.

extra.en:
TGA (Treasury General Account) ‚Äî professional fundamental analysis
What is TGA
Treasury General Account (TGA) ‚Äî main operating account US Treasury holds at Federal Reserve. Through it flow:
tax receipts,
bond issuance/redemption,
government spending.
Essentially TGA ‚Äî liquidity buffer between US Treasury and financial system.

How TGA affects markets
Key logic
TGA fund movements directly impact banking system liquidity hence markets.
TGA growth
Treasury accumulates funds (e.g. bond issuance).
Money leaves banking system ‚Üí liquidity contracts ‚Üí risk asset pressure.
TGA decline
Treasury spends funds (social payments, government spending).
Money returns to banking system ‚Üí liquidity grows ‚Üí risk asset support.
Simply:
TGA grows ‚Äî liquidity squeezes
TGA falls ‚Äî liquidity expands

TGA impact on Bitcoin price
Bitcoin sensitive to global dollar liquidity so TGA impacts indirectly but substantially.
When TGA declines
Dollars enter system.
Risk appetite improves.
Speculative/investment demand increases.
Bitcoin gets support or growth impulse.
When TGA grows
Liquidity withdrawn.
Capital competition intensifies (bonds, dollar).
Bitcoin/other risk assets face pressure or consolidation.
Historically sharp TGA decline phases often coincided with:
stock index growth,
crypto market recovery,
BTC bullish impulse acceleration.

Interconnections with other indicators
TGA analyzed not isolated but with:
WALCL (Fed balance)
Fed balance growth + TGA decline = strong liquidity expansion.
Reverse Repo (RRP)
TGA decline + RRP falling = double liquidity positive.
Bond yields
TGA growth often accompanies yield rises negative for BTC.

TGA use in forecasts and trading
1. Liquidity macro filter
TGA used as dollar inflow/outflow indicator:
falling TGA ‚Üí favorable long risk assets backdrop,
growing TGA ‚Üí caution, capital protection.
2. Market phase timing
Sharp TGA changes help:
determine liquidity expansion phase start,
confirm growth sustainability or correction risk.
3. Bitcoin context
TGA doesn't give entry points but:
strengthens/weakens on-chain metric signals,
helps understand why market 'moves' or 'doesn't move'.

Limitations
Data updated daily but market reactions may lag.
TGA reflects US fiscal flows not global demand entirely.
Not used for short-term trading without other data confirmation.
TGA ‚Äî one of most underrated but powerful dollar liquidity indicators.
TGA decline supports markets/Bitcoin, TGA growth creates pressure.
In forecasts/trading TGA used as macro context strengthening/weakening BTC/other risk asset signals.
extra.si:
TGA (Splo≈°ni raƒçun Ministrstva za finance) ‚Äî profesionalna temeljna analiza
Kaj je TGA
Treasury General Account (TGA) ‚Äî glavni poslovni raƒçun Ministrstva za finance ZDA pri Federalnih rezervah. Skrz njega teƒçejo:
davƒçni prihodki,
plasinjanje in odplaƒçevanje dr≈æavnih obveznic,
drzavni izdatki.
V bistvu TGA ‚Äî likvidnostni pufer med Ministrstvom za finance ZDA in finanƒçnim sistemom.

Kako TGA vpliva na trge
Kljuƒçna logika
Gibanje sredstev po TGA neposredno vpliva na likvidnost banƒçnega sistema, torej na trge.
Rast TGA
Ministrstvo za finance kopiƒçi sredstva (npr. izdaja obveznic).
Denar odteka iz banƒçnega sistema ‚Üí likvidnost se krƒçi ‚Üí pritisk na riziƒçna sredstva.
Padec TGA
Ministrstvo za finance porablja sredstva (socialne izplaƒçila, dr≈æavni izdatki).
Denar se vrne v banƒçni sistem ‚Üí likvidnost raste ‚Üí podpora riziƒçnim sredstvom.
Preprosto:
TGA raste ‚Äî likvidnost se krƒçi
TGA pada ‚Äî likvidnost se ≈°iri

Vpliv TGA na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin je obƒçutljiv na globalno dollarsko likvidnost, zato TGA vpliva posredno, a bistveno.
Ko TGA pada
V sistem vstopijo dolarji.
Izbolj≈°a se apetit po tveganju.
Poveƒça se ≈°pekulativno in investicijsko povpra≈°evanje.
Bitcoin dobi podporo ali impulz rasti.
Ko TGA raste
Likvidnost se umika.
Poveƒça se konkurenca za kapital (obveznice, dolar).
Bitcoin in druga riziƒçna sredstva do≈æivljajo pritisk ali konsolidacijo.
Zgodovinsko so faze ostrega padca TGA pogosto sovpadale z:
rastjo indeksov delnic,
–æ–±novo kripto-trga,
–ø–æ—Åpe≈°evanjem bikovskih impulzov BTC.

Povezave z drugimi kazalniki
TGA se analizira ne izolirano, temveƒç v povezavi z:
WALCL (ravnote≈æje Fed)
Rast ravnote≈æja Fed + padec TGA = moƒçna ≈°iritev likvidnosti.
Reverse Repo (RRP)
ƒåe TGA pada in RRP pada ‚Äî dvojno pozitivno za likvidnost.
Donosi obveznic
Rast TGA pogosto spremlja rast donosov negativno za BTC.

Uporaba TGA v napovedih in trgovanju
1. Makro-filter likvidnosti
TGA se uporablja kot kazalnik dotoka/odtoka dolarjev:
padajoƒçi TGA ‚Üí ugoden kontekst za dolgih pozicij riziƒçnih sredstev,
rastoƒçi TGA ‚Üí previdnost, za≈°ƒçita kapitala.
2. ƒåasovna umestitev tr≈ænih faz
Ostri spremembi TGA pomagajo:
doloƒçiti zaƒçetek faze ≈°iritve likvidnosti,
potrditi vzdr≈ænost rasti ali tveganje korekcije.
3. Kontekst za Bitcoin
TGA ne daje toƒçk vstopa, a:
okrepi/oslabi signale on-chain metrik,
pomaga razumeti zakaj trg 'gre' ali 'ne gre'.

Omejitve
Podatki se posodabljajo dnevno, a tr≈æne reakcije lahko zamujajo.
TGA odra≈æa fiskalne tokove ZDA ne celotnega globalnega povpra≈°evanja.
Ni za kratkoroƒçno trgovanje brez potrditve drugih podatkov.
TGA ‚Äî eden najbolj podcenjenih, a moƒçnih kazalnikov dollarske likvidnosti.
Padec TGA podpira trge in Bitcoin, rast TGA ustvarja pritisk.
V napovedih/trgovanju se TGA uporablja kot makro-kontekst, ki krepi/oslabi signale BTC/drugih riziƒçnih sredstev.

text.en:
RMP (Reserve Management Purchases) ‚Äî aggregate asset purchases indicator by central banks, funds and institutional investors for reserve management. Reflects volumes of currency reserves, government bonds and other assets acquired to maintain financial stability, manage currency positions and mitigate external shocks.
Unlike QE conducted by single central bank for economic stimulus, RMP reflects broad reserve accumulation practice by global reserve holders.
RMP not standard metric like Fed Funds or Fed balance but in macro analysis serves behavioral reaction indicator of major institutional capital holders.

How RMP affects markets
Liquidity impact
Reserve management purchases increase demand for base assets (bonds, currencies) which:
increases liquidity in base asset sector,
reduces supply of these assets on market,
impacts yields, currency rates and spreads.
Collectively RMP contributes fundamental demand strengthening for financial assets and may soften pressure during market uncertainty periods.
Interest rate impact
If major reserve holders accumulate debt instruments (Treasuries, sovereign bonds), increases demand and lowers yields. Low yields stimulate capital moving to risky assets supporting market growth.

How RMP affects Bitcoin price
Bitcoin not direct reserve management target for traditional reserve institutions but RMP impact on BTC manifests through macro liquidity environment:
RMP growth
reflects increased asset demand and depending on context higher liquidity;
contributes yield decline favoring risk appetite;
Bitcoin attracts capital easier especially during yield search and alternative asset periods.
RMP decline or slowdown
may indicate reduced safe asset purchase appetite;
potential liquidity tightening;
pressure on risk assets including Bitcoin.
RMP closely tied to global capital flows. If major reserve holders reallocate portfolios toward stable assets (Treasuries, currency baskets), may limit crypto capital inflow.

Interconnections with other macro indicators
With central bank liquidity
RMP correlates with broader monetary stimulus programs. For example:
during active monetary easing (QE) central banks take most asset demand ‚Äî strengthens overall liquidity absorption.
RMP reflects similar processes in private/government sectors: reserve accumulation leads more stable liquidity environment.
With global rates and yields
Reserve holder purchases may lower sovereign paper yields which:
cheapens capital,
supports higher market risk appetite,
indirectly positive for high-risk assets including Bitcoin.
With capital movements
RMP reflects major institutional investor behavior. When accumulating reserve assets signals confidence or defensive strategies depending on segment.

How RMP used in forecasts and trading
Macro trend filtering
Traders/analysts use RMP for assessing overall global capital flow direction:
RMP growth indicates increased asset demand and liquidity expansion ‚Äî favorable risk asset backdrop.
RMP slowdown/decline may signal caution passing strengthening correction attention.
Yield comparison
RMP analysis with global yield curves helps assess capital direction: safe assets or risk assets.
Sentiment contextual indicator
RMP serves macro orientation for assessing major capital holder sentiment. RMP changes coinciding with other signals (rates, inflation, liquidity) strengthens forecast accuracy.

Practical summary
RMP reflects institutional reserve management purchases impacting liquidity and base asset demand.
Through liquidity/yield mechanisms RMP exerts indirect influence on risk appetite and Bitcoin price.
RMP used as macro analytical context part in forecasts/risk management; confirms global capital direction and investor market confidence degree.
text.si:
RMP (Nakupi upravljanja rezerv) ‚Äî kazalnik skupnih nakupov sredstev s strani centralnih bank, skladov in institucionalnih vlagateljev v okviru upravljanja rezerv. Odra≈æa obsege nakupa valutnih rezerv, dr≈æavnih obveznic in drugih sredstev za ohranjanje finanƒçne stabilnosti, upravljanje valutnih pozicij in bla≈æenje zunanjih ≈°okov.
Za razliko od QE, ki ga izvaja ena centralna banka za spodbujanje gospodarstva, RMP odra≈æa ≈°iroko prakso kopiƒçenja rezerv s strani globalnih imetnikov rezerv.
RMP ni standardni kazalnik kot Fed Funds ali ravnote≈æje Fed, a v makro-analizi slu≈æi kot indikator vedenjske reakcije velikih institucionalnih imetnikov kapitala.

Kako RMP vpliva na trge
Vpliv na likvidnost
Nakupi v okviru upravljanja rezerv poveƒçajo povpra≈°evanje po osnovnih sredstvih (obveznicah, valutah), kar:
poveƒça likvidnost v sektorju osnovnih sredstev,
zni≈æa ponudbo teh sredstev na trgu,
vpliva na donose, devizne teƒçaje in razlike.
Skupaj RMP prispeva k krepitvi fundamentalnega povpra≈°evanja po finanƒçnih sredstvih in lahko bla≈æi pritisk v obdobjih tr≈æne negotovosti.
Vpliv na obrestne mere
ƒåe veliki imetniki rezerv kopiƒçijo dol≈æni≈°ke instrumente (Treasuries, suverene obveznice), poveƒça povpra≈°evanje in zni≈æa donose. Nizki donosi spodbujajo selitev kapitala v riziƒçna sredstva podpirajoƒç rast trgov.

Kako RMP vpliva na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin ni neposredni cilj upravljanja rezerv tradicionalnih rezervnih institucij, a vpliv RMP na BTC se ka≈æe skozi makro-likvidnostno okolje:
Rast RMP
odra≈æa poveƒçano povpra≈°evanje po sredstvih in odvisno od konteksta vi≈°jo likvidnost;
prispeva k padcu donosov in ugodju za apetit po tveganju;
Bitcoin v takih pogojih la≈æje privlaƒçi kapital, ≈°e posebej v obdobjih iskanja donosnosti in alternativnih sredstev.
Padec ali upoƒçasnitev RMP
lahko pomeni zmanj≈°an apetit za nakup varnih sredstev;
potencialno zaostrovanje likvidnosti;
pritisk na riziƒçna sredstva vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
RMP je tesno povezan z globalnimi tokovi kapitala. ƒåe veliki imetniki rezerv prerazporejajo portfelje proti stabilnim sredstvom (Treasuries, valutne ko≈°arice), lahko omeji dotok kapitala v kripto.

Povezave z drugimi makro-kazalniki
Z likvidnostjo centralnih bank
RMP korelira z ≈°ir≈°imi programi monetarnega spodbudnika. Na primer:
ob aktivnem monetarnem omilitvenju (QE) centralne banke prevzamejo veƒçino povpra≈°evanja po sredstvih ‚Äî to krepi splo≈°no absorpcijo likvidnosti.
RMP odra≈æa podobne procese v zasebnem/dr≈æavnem sektorju: kopiƒçenje rezerv vodi v bolj stabilno likvidnostno okolje.
Z globalnimi merami in donosi
Nakupi imetnikov rezerv lahko zni≈æajo donose suverenih papirjev, kar:
pozni≈æa kapital,
podpira vi≈°ji tr≈æni apetit po tveganju,
posredno pozitivno za visoko riziƒçna sredstva vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
Z gibi kapitala
RMP odra≈æa vedenje velikih institucionalnih vlagateljev. Ko kopiƒçijo sredstva za rezerve, signalizira zaupanje ali obrambne strategije odvisno od segmenta.

Kako se RMP uporablja v napovedih in trgovanju
Makro-filtriranje trendov
Trgovci/analitiki uporabljajo RMP za oceno splo≈°ne smeri globalnih tokov kapitala:
Rast RMP ka≈æe na poveƒçano povpra≈°evanje po sredstvih in ≈°iritev likvidnosti ‚Äî ugoden kontekst za riziƒçna sredstva.
Upoƒçasnitev ali padec RMP lahko signalizira previdnost krepitev pozornosti na korekcijah.
Primerjava z donosi
Analiza RMP skupaj z globalnimi krivuljami donosnosti pomaga oceniti smer kapitala: varna sredstva ali riziƒçna sredstva.
Kontekstni indikator razpolo≈æenja
RMP slu≈æi kot makro-orientacija za oceno razpolo≈æenja velikih imetnikov kapitala. Sovpadanje sprememb RMP z drugimi signali (mere, inflacija, likvidnost) krepi natanƒçnost napovedi.

Praktiƒçni povzetek
RMP odra≈æa institucionalne nakupe v okviru upravljanja rezerv vplivajoƒç na likvidnost in povpra≈°evanje po osnovnih sredstvih.
Skozi mehanizme likvidnosti in donosnosti RMP posredno vpliva na apetit po tveganju in ceno Bitcoina.
RMP se uporablja kot del makro-analitiƒçnega konteksta v napovedih/upravljanju tveganj; potrjuje smer globalnih kapitalov in stopnjo zaupanja vlagateljev v trge.

extra.en:
As of today, the US Federal Reserve has effectively launched the RMP program, under which the Fed purchases short-term Treasury securities (T-bills) to maintain adequate reserve levels in the banking system. This program started in December 2025 with approximate purchase volumes of $40 billion per month and will announce monthly plans. Main goal ‚Äî smooth seasonal liquidity fluctuations (e.g., related to tax payments and TGA fund movements), not directly stimulate economy like classic QE.
Markets view RMP as minimally stimulative operation aimed at maintaining money market operational liquidity and stabilizing short-term interest rates, but increasingly interpreted as 'covert easing form'.

RMP trend direction forecast
Short-term perspective (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Program just unfolding, Fed stated fixed monthly purchases. Expected RMP holds current level next weeks as seasonal liquidity needs not completed. Creates money market support reducing stress and sudden rate fluctuation risk.
Trend: sideways holding at current purchase levels, possible moderate reserve growth stabilization.

Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì6 months)
With stable/moderate RMP program expansion expected operation adapts based on actual TGA behavior and overall reserve levels. If banking system liquidity faces seasonal fluctuations, Fed may gradually adjust purchase volumes or increase maintaining ample-reserves system. Even if program not substantially expanding, mere existence reduces involuntary financial conditions tightening risk due reserve shortages.
Trend: moderate expansion or holding at high level.

Long-term perspective (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term RMP trajectory depends on economic conditions:
If inflation/rates remain relatively high, RMP continues technical role holding liquidity within narrow bounds.
If Fed leans toward softer policy responding to economic slowdown, RMP volumes may increase as part of broader operations transition.
Either way RMP likely persists as element of new Fed operational policy supporting ample reserves regime.
Trend: expansion possibility and gradual integration into liquidity policy structure.

How RMP affects markets and Bitcoin price
Financial markets:
T-bill purchases through RMP create banking system liquidity preventing excess reserve squeeze stabilizing money markets and reducing sharp rate spike risk. Reduces short-term interest pressure and positively impacts risk appetite on other markets including equity sector.
Cryptomarket and Bitcoin:
RMP itself not targeting direct risk market support but reserve increase/maintenance reduces sharp liquidity bottleneck probability. Higher systemic liquidity level indirectly contributes capital cost reduction and risk appetite increase historically favorable for BTC/other crypto assets especially when other factors support demand. Some analysts view RMP as mini-QE-like tool potentially supporting Bitcoin through liquidity expansion.

Practical summary
Short-term: RMP stable creating neutral-positive liquidity backdrop reducing short-term speculative spike risk.
Medium-term: maintained or moderately expanded contributing rate volatility reduction and risk appetite increase.
Long-term: may become permanent Fed operational structure part; expandable as needed serving technical ample reserves maintenance tool.
For markets means more predictable liquidity, for Bitcoin ‚Äî reduced systemic shocks and demand support when other drivers also favorable (ETF inflows, institutional demand).
extra.si:
Danes je Zvezna rezerva ZDA dejansko zagnala program RMP, pri katerem Fed kupuje kratkoroƒçne zakladni≈°ke vrednostne papirje (T-bills) za ohranjanje zadostne ravni rezerv v banƒçnem sistemu. Program se je zaƒçel decembra 2025 z ocenjenimi obsegi nakupov okoli 40 milijard USD na mesec in bo objavljal meseƒçne naƒçrte. Glavni cilj ‚Äî izravnava sezonskih nihanj likvidnosti (npr. povezanih z davƒçnimi plaƒçili in premiki sredstev v TGA), ne pa neposredno spodbuditi gospodarstvo kot klasiƒçni QE.
Trgi RMP obravnavajo kot minimalno spodbudno operacijo, usmerjeno v ohranjanje operativne likvidnosti denarnega trga in stabilizacijo kratkoroƒçnih obrestnih mer, vendar ga trg vse pogosteje razume kot 'skrito obliko omilitve'.

Napoved smeri trenda RMP
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì4 tedne)
Program se ≈°ele razgrinja, Fed je napovedal fiksne meseƒçne nakupe. Priƒçakovano bo RMP v prihodnjih tednih ohranil trenutno raven, saj sezonske potrebe po likvidnosti ≈°e niso zakljuƒçene. To ustvarja podporo denarnemu trgu, zmanj≈°uje stres in zmanj≈°uje tveganje nenadnih nihanj mer.
Trend: boƒçno zadr≈æevanje na ravni trenutnih nakupov, mo≈æna zmerna stabilizacija rasti rezerv.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Ob stabilnem ali zmernem ≈°irjenju programa RMP priƒçakujemo, da se bo operacija prilagodila glede na dejansko vedenje TGA in splo≈°no raven rezerv. ƒåe bo likvidnost v banƒçnem sistemu do≈æivela sezonska nihanja, lahko Fed postopoma prilagaja obsege nakupov ali jih poveƒçuje za ohranitev ample-reserves sistema. Tudi ƒçe se program ne bo bistveno ≈°iril, ≈æe obstoj programa zmanj≈°uje tveganje nenamernega zaostrovanja finanƒçnih pogojev zaradi pomanjkanja rezerv.
Trend: zmerno ≈°iritev ali zadr≈æevanje na visoki ravni.

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Dolgoroƒçna pot RMP bo odvisna od ekonomskih razmer:
ƒåe inflacija in mere ostanejo relativno visoke, bo RMP nadaljeval tehniƒçno vlogo zadr≈æevanja likvidnosti v ozkem obmoƒçju.
ƒåe se bo Fed nagibal k mehkej≈°i politiki v odziv na gospodarsko upoƒçasnitev, se lahko obsegi RMP poveƒçajo kot del prehoda na ≈°ir≈°e operacije.
V vsakem primeru bo RMP verjetno ostal element nove operativne politike Fed, podpirajoƒç re≈æim ample reserves.
Trend: mo≈ænost ≈°iritve in postopne integracije v strukturo politike likvidnosti.

Kako RMP vpliva na trge in ceno Bitcoina
Finanƒçni trgi:
Nakupi T-bills prek RMP ustvarjajo likvidnost v banƒçnem sistemu, prepreƒçujejo prekomerno stiskanje rezerv, kar stabilizira denarne trge in zmanj≈°uje tveganje ostrih skokov mer. To zmanj≈°uje pritisk na kratkoroƒçne obresti in pozitivno vpliva na apetit po tveganju na drugih trgih, vkljuƒçno z delni≈°kim sektorjem.
Kripto-trg in Bitcoin:
RMP sam ne cilja neposredne podpore trgom tveganja, vendar poveƒçanje ali ohranitev rezerv zmanj≈°uje verjetnost ostrih ozkih grl v likvidnosti. Vi≈°ja raven sistemske likvidnosti posredno prispeva k zni≈æanju stro≈°kov kapitala in poveƒçanju apetita po tveganju, kar je zgodovinsko ugodno za BTC in druge kripto-aktive, ≈°e posebej v obdobjih, ko drugi dejavniki podpirajo povpra≈°evanje. Nekateri analitiki RMP vidijo kot podoben mini-QE instrumentu, ki lahko podpira Bitcoin prek ≈°iritve likvidnosti.

Praktiƒçni povzetek
Kratkoroƒçno: RMP stabilen, ustvarja nevtralno-pozitivno ozadje za likvidnost, zmanj≈°uje tveganje kratkoroƒçnih ≈°pekulativnih skokov.
Srednjeroƒçno: ohranja se ali zmerno ≈°iri, prispeva k zni≈æanju nihanja mer in poveƒçanju apetita po tveganju.
Dolgoroƒçno: lahko postane del stalne operativne strukture Fed; po potrebi raz≈°irljiv kot tehniƒçni instrument za ohranjanje ample reserves.
Za trge pomeni bolj predvidljivo likvidnost, za Bitcoin pa zmanj≈°anje sistemskih ≈°okov in podporo povpra≈°evanju, ko so drugi gonilci ugodni (pritoki ETF, institucionalno povpra≈°evanje).

text.en:
RWA (Real-World Assets) ‚Äî fundamental analysis
What is RWA
RWA (Real-World Assets) ‚Äî tokenization of real assets on blockchain. Real assets include:
government and corporate bonds,
stocks and funds,
real estate,
commodities,
credit and debt obligations,
money markets (T-Bills, repo instruments).
Tokenization means claim rights or economic interest in asset represented as token transferable, storable, usable in DeFi and CeFi infrastructure.
RWA ‚Äî bridge between traditional finance (TradFi) and crypto market.

How RWA affects financial markets
1. Institutional capital inflow
RWA lowers entry barriers for institutions:
understandable assets,
regulated structure,
blockchain as settlement layer.
Increases trust in crypto infrastructure accelerating TradFi-DeFi integration.
2. Market efficiency growth
Tokenization:
reduces clearing/settlement costs,
increases illiquid asset liquidity,
enables asset fractionalization (fractional ownership).
Strengthens capital turnover increasing overall financial activity.
3. Liquidity redistribution
Part of liquidity previously available only in traditional markets starts working within crypto ecosystem. Changes crypto asset demand structure.

RWA impact on Bitcoin price
Bitcoin not RWA asset but benefits from RWA growth indirectly.
Positive influence channels
RWA growth strengthens trust in blockchain as financial infrastructure.
Institutional participants entering via RWA often use BTC as:
base reserve crypto asset,
hedge against fiat risks,
macro instrument against monetary dilution.
On-chain economy expansion increases overall blockchain usage where BTC remains key market benchmark.
Limitations
During active RWA growth phases capital may flow to tokenized bonds/money markets temporarily reducing speculative BTC demand.
RWA influence on Bitcoin cyclical not linear.

Key interconnections
RWA and interest rates
High rates make tokenized T-Bills/bonds BTC competitor.
Rate declines shift interest toward risk assets including Bitcoin.
RWA and liquidity
RWA strengthens capital circulation within blockchains:
increases overall on-chain activity,
reduces market fragmentation,
strengthens crypto market correlation with global liquidity.
RWA and macro cycles
RWA accelerates macro conditions transmission (rates, QE/QT, fiscal policy) directly into crypto ecosystem.

RWA use in forecasts and trading
1. Macro indicator of institutional interest
TVL/turnover growth in RWA segment signals:
long-term institutional interest,
reduced existential crypto market risks.
2. Bitcoin context
Fast RWA growth during high rates ‚Äî neutral/moderately negative for BTC.
RWA growth amid monetary easing ‚Äî positive for BTC.
3. Market regime assessment
RWA helps determine:
defensive regime (capital in tokenized bonds),
risk regime (flow to BTC/altcoins).

Summary
RWA ‚Äî key crypto market institutionalization direction.
Strengthens trust, liquidity, TradFi connectivity.
For Bitcoin RWA structurally positive factor but with short-term capital competition phases.
RWA used in forecasts as market maturity and macro liquidity regime indicator.

extra.en:
Current RWA state
Today RWA segment in blockchain ecosystem continues slow but steady growth. Main asset ‚Äî tokenization of well-documented assets: short-term government bonds (T-bills), investment funds, commercial real estate, commercial debt instruments. Major DeFi participants strengthen RWA product support, TVL scale in these assets increases, institutional platforms offer regulatory compliance frameworks. RWA growth occurs amid moderate institutional capital demand for low-risk on-chain instruments and diversification attempts outside traditional markets.
Key observation: RWA not dominating DeFi markets yet but forming significant additional liquidity/inflow layer especially in stable income segments (yield-oriented strategies).

Trend direction forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì3 months)
RWA likely continues moderate growth due to:
initial capital transition from traditional money liquidity to on-chain fixed income instruments,
increased interest wave in fractional ownership/compliant structures,
high crypto market volatility stimulating relative stability search.
Next weeks RWA TVL growth may accelerate during Bitcoin weak movements (range trading) when capital seeks yield.
Short-term trend: moderate upward.

Medium-term (3‚Äì12 months)
If medium-term macroeconomic environment remains uncertain (rate volatility, inflation data, long-term rate pressure), RWA accelerates growth as low-risk asset alternative especially if new compliant structures attract large funds/institutions.
RWA growth may:
serve capital caution barometer,
redistribute liquidity from risky assets to relatively stable tokenized assets.
Medium-term trend: steady growth with possible acceleration under adverse macro factors.

Long-term (12‚Äì36 months)
Long-term RWA character depends on key factors:
institutional participation scale,
regulatory framework level/unification,
custody/compliant platform infrastructure development,
capital markets DeFi acceptance level.
If regulated RWA products become standard for large investors may transform liquidity providing more sustainable blockchain ecosystem capital inflow.
Long-term trend: sustained growth with possible acceleration phase as standardization/adoption progresses.

Market and Bitcoin price impact
Financial markets
RWA growth increases capital share working through on-chain channels improving TradFi-crypto market connectivity. Reduces institutional flow barriers, expands liquidity spectrum, reduces market disconnection risk, increases overall financial system resilience.
Bitcoin price
RWA impact on Bitcoin indirect:
Positive effects:
increased total blockchain capital volume raises infrastructure demand where BTC core liquidity,
institutional integration via RWA increases overall crypto ecosystem attractiveness,
RWA TVL growth may accompany capital inflow part potentially redistributed to Bitcoin.
Negative/neutral effects:
RWA growth phases capital may flow from direct BTC investments to RWA-directed fixed income products temporarily reducing BTC pressing demand,
RWA price BTC impact less direct vs Bitcoin fundamentals (network metrics, storage demand, ETF flows, macro liquidity).
Overall RWA growth creates macro backdrop supporting market maturity but not main driver for sharp BTC movements.

Practical summary
Short-term: moderate RWA growth, moderate risk appetite.
Medium-term: steady growth reflecting cautious capital redistribution.
Long-term: sustained RWA growth amid institutionalization/standardization.
RWA growth improves institutional market backdrop, increases DeFi liquidity creates additional fundamental capital realization layer ‚Äî without direct Bitcoin price impact but important through indirect macro/institutional mechanisms.
extra.si:
Trenutno stanje RWA
Danes segment RWA v blockchain-ekosistemu nadaljuje poƒçasno, a vzdr≈æno rast. Glavna aktiva ‚Äî tokenizacija dobro dokumentiranih premo≈æenj: kratkoroƒçne dr≈æavne obveznice (T-bills), investicijski skladi, komercialna nepremiƒçnina, komercialni dol≈æni≈°ki instrumenti. Veliki DeFi udele≈æenci krepijo podporo RWA-produktom, lestvica TVL v teh aktivah nara≈°ƒça, institucionalne platforme ponujajo regulativne skladnosti okvire. Rast RWA poteka sredi zmernega institucionalnega kapitalnega povpra≈°evanja po nizko-tveganih on-chain instrumentih in poskusov diversifikacije zunaj tradicionalnih trgov.
Kljuƒçno opazovanje: RWA ≈°e ne dominira na DeFi trgih, vendar ≈æe oblikuje pomemben dodaten sloj likvidnosti/prilivov, ≈°e posebej v segmentih stabilnih dohodkov (strategije usmerjene v donos).

Napoved smeri trenda
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì3 mesece)
RWA bo verjetno nadaljeval zmerno rast zaradi:
zaƒçetnega prehoda kapitala iz tradicionalne denarne likvidnosti v on-chain instrumente s fiksnim dohodkom,
