WTREGEN je ekonomski kazalnik iz baze podatkov FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data), ki predstavlja:
Liabilities and Capital: Liabilities: Deposits with F.R. Banks, Other Than Reserve Balances: U.S. Treasury, General Account: Week Average.
To je torej povpreƒçna tedenska vrednost depozitov Zakladnice ZDA na raƒçunih Federalnega rezervnega sistema, z izjemo banƒçnih rezervnih bilanc. 
Preprosteje:
Kazalnik, ki prikazuje, koliko sredstev Zakladnica ZDA dr≈æi v depozitih pri Federalni rezervi, z izjemo banƒçnih rezerv. 
V angle≈°kih virih ga pogosto imenujejo Treasury General Account (TGA) ‚Äî povpreƒçna tedenska vrednost depozitov Zakladnice pri Fedu. 
WTREGEN je del poroƒçila Federalne rezerve H.4.1 Factors Affecting Reserve Balances, ki opisuje aktive in obveznosti Feda ter njihov vpliv na likvidnost banƒçnega sistema.

text.en:
10Y‚Äì3M Treasury Yield Spread (T10Y3M) ‚Äî difference between 10-year US Treasury bonds and 3-month Treasury yields. Calculation:
T10Y3M = 10-year Treasury yield ‚àí 3-month Treasury yield
This spread often called yield curve indicator. Reflects market expectations for future economic activity and interest rate policy.
When spread:
positive and wide ‚Üí normal yield curve, economy growth expected,
narrows or negative (inversion) ‚Üí economy slowdown or recession expected.

Market impacts
Equities
Positive T10Y3M signals future economic growth confidence, corporate profits may expand, risk appetite strengthens ‚Äî stocks rise.
Negative or sharply declining T10Y3M linked to economy slowdown expectations ‚Äî often precedes stock index declines, corrections or bear markets.
Bonds
Widening spread usually accompanies 10-year yield increases and normal curve.
T10Y3M inversion signals short-term rates exceed long-term ‚Äî reflects future rate cut expectations and long-term safe asset demand growth.
Risk appetite and liquidity
T10Y3M serves market expectations marker for economic cycle. Inversion indicates risk premiums, uncertainty growth, potential market liquidity deterioration.

Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin technically not tied to Treasuries but indirectly reacts to global risk/liquidity signals:
Normal or expanding curve (positive T10Y3M)
Economy growth and stable market signal may support risk appetite growth historically favorable for Bitcoin as risk asset.
T10Y3M inversion
Often precedes volatility increase period, stock index declines, capital flight to safe assets. Bitcoin as high-volatility asset usually shows risk asset correlation experiencing pressure/corrections.
Important: Bitcoin-T10Y3M correlation indirect through risk psychology, growth/decline expectations, capital availability.

Interconnections with other data
Monetary policy
T10Y3M inversion often arises from central bank short-term rate hikes (Fed) while long-term rates not rising proportionally.
Signals market expectations economic growth slows, future rate cuts expected.
GDP and recession
Historically T10Y3M inversion precedes recessions 6‚Äì24 months.
Makes spread key macro cyclical risk indicator.
Inflation and expectations
Long-term rates reflect inflation expectations. Weakening inflation expectations drop long-term rates compressing spread.
Correlation with other indicators
T10Y3M combined with other data (GDP, unemployment, consumer spending) for accurate economic cycle assessment.

Forecasts and trading usage
Macro forecasts
Analysts use T10Y3M as economic turning points warning signal. Inversion raises downturns/corrections probability in risk assets.
Asset allocation
Institutional investors adjust exposures by spread signal:
widening spread ‚Üí more risk assets,
inversion ‚Üí increase safe asset share.
Risk management
T10Y3M serves macro risk filter:
inversion reduces risk asset positions,
normal curve allows holding/increasing exposures.
Trading
T10Y3M unsuitable for short-term trading, provides market regime context ‚Äî foundation for longer horizon strategies, technical analysis signal filter, risk assessment.

Summary
10Y‚Äì3M Treasury Yield Spread ‚Äî key macro indicator showing economic expectations and risk appetite.
Positive or expanding spread supports market/risk asset growth including Bitcoin through indirect liquidity/sentiment channel.
Spread inversion historically reliable economy slowdown warning creating pressure on equities/crypto assets.
Trading applies index as macro filter not short-term signal.
text.si:
10L‚Äì3M razlika donosnosti zakladnic (T10Y3M) ‚Äî razlika med donosnostmi 10-letnih ameri≈°kih zakladnic in 3-meseƒçnimi zakladni≈°kimi instrumenti. Izraƒçun:
T10Y3M = Donosnost 10-letnih Treasuries ‚àí Donosnost 3-meseƒçnih Treasuries
Ta razlika pogosto imenovana kazalnik krivulje donosnosti. Odra≈æa tr≈æna priƒçakovanja glede prihodnje gospodarske aktivnosti in obrestne politike.
Ko razlika:
pozitivna in ≈°iroka ‚Üí normalna krivulja donosnosti, priƒçakovana gospodarska rast,
se zo≈æa ali postane negativna (inverzija) ‚Üí priƒçakovano gospodarsko upoƒçasnitev ali recesija.

Vpliv na trge
Delnice
Pozitivna T10Y3M signalizira zaupanje v prihodnjo gospodarsko rast, korporativni dobiƒçki se lahko ≈°irijo, apetit po tveganju se krepi ‚Äî delnice rastejo.
Negativna ali ostro padajoƒça T10Y3M povezana s priƒçakovanji gospodarske upoƒçasnitve ‚Äî pogosto predhodno padcu indeksov, korekcijam ali medvedjim trgom.
Obveznice
≈†irjenje razlike obiƒçajno spremlja rast donosnosti 10-letnic in stabilna normalna krivulja.
Inverzija T10Y3M signalizira, da so kratkoroƒçne mere vi≈°je od dolgoroƒçnih ‚Äî odra≈æa priƒçakovanja prihodnjih zni≈æanj mer in rasti povpra≈°evanja po dolgoroƒçnih varnih aktivih.
Apetit po tveganju in likvidnost
T10Y3M slu≈æi kot oznaƒçevalec tr≈ænih priƒçakovanj glede gospodarskega cikla. Inverzija ka≈æe na premije tveganja, rast negotovosti in potencialno poslab≈°anje tr≈æne likvidnosti.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin tehniƒçno ni vezan na Treasuries, a posredno reagira na globalne signale tveganja/likvidnosti:
Normalna ali ≈°ir≈°a krivulja (pozitivna T10Y3M)
Signal gospodarske rasti in stabilnega trga lahko podpira rast apetita po tveganju, kar je zgodovinsko ugodno za Bitcoin kot tvegav aktiv.
Inverzija T10Y3M
Pogosto predhodno obdobje poveƒçane volatilnosti, padec indeksov in odliv kapitala v varne aktivne. Bitcoin kot visoko-volatilen aktiv v takih pogojih obiƒçajno ka≈æe korelacijo s tveganimi aktivami in do≈æivlja pritisk/korekcije.
Pomembno: korelacija med Bitcoin in T10Y3M posredna prek psihologije tveganja, priƒçakovanj rasti/pada in razpolo≈æljivosti kapitala.

Povezave z drugimi podatki
Monetarna politika
Inverzija T10Y3M pogosto nastane zaradi centralne banke vi≈°anja kratkoroƒçnih mer (Fed), medtem ko dolgoroƒçne mere ne rastejo sorazmerno.
Signalizira tr≈æna priƒçakovanja gospodarske rasti se upoƒçasni, priƒçakovana prihodnja zni≈æanja mer.
BDP in recesija
Zgodovinsko inverzija T10Y3M predhodno recesijam 6‚Äì24 mesecev.
Naredi razliko kljuƒçni makro-kazalnik cikliƒçnih tveganj.
Inflacija in priƒçakovanja
Dolgoroƒçne mere odra≈æajo inflacijska priƒçakovanja. Oslabelost inflacijskih priƒçakovanj zni≈æa dolgoroƒçne mere, kar stisne razliko.
Korelacija z drugimi kazalniki
T10Y3M kombinira z drugimi podatki (BDP, brezposelnost, potro≈°ni≈°ki izdatki) za natanƒçno oceno gospodarskih ciklov.

Uporaba v napovedih in trgovanju
Makro-napovedi
Analitiki uporabljajo T10Y3M kot opozorilni signal gospodarskih prelomnic. Inverzija poveƒça verjetnost padcev/korekcij v tvegavih aktivih.
Alokacija aktivov
Institucionalni vlagatelji prilagajajo izpostavljenost glede na signal razlike:
≈°ir≈°a razlika ‚Üí veƒç tvegavih aktivov,
inverzija ‚Üí poveƒçan dele≈æ varnih aktivov.
Upravljanje tveganj
T10Y3M slu≈æi kot filter makro-tveganja:
pri inverziji zmanj≈°anje pozicij v tvegavih aktivih,
pri normalni krivulji mo≈æno zadr≈æevanje/poveƒçevanje izpostavljenosti.
Trgovanje
T10Y3M neustrezen za kratkoroƒçno trgovanje, zagotavlja kontekst tr≈ænega re≈æima ‚Äî osnovo za strategije dalj≈°ih horizontov, filter tehniƒçne analize signalov in ocene tveganja.

Povzetek
10L‚Äì3M razlika donosnosti zakladnic ‚Äî kljuƒçni makro-kazalnik, ki ka≈æe gospodarska priƒçakovanja in apetit po tveganju.
Pozitivna ali ≈°ir≈°a razlika podpira rast trgov/tvegavih aktivov vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom prek posrednega kanala likvidnosti/razpolo≈æenja.
Inverzija razlike zgodovinsko zanesljivo opozorilo gospodarske upoƒçasnitve in lahko ustvari pritisk na delnice/kripto-aktive.
V trgovanju se indeks uporablja kot makro-filter, ne kratkoroƒçni signal.

extra.en:
Current T10Y3M state
Today 10-year vs 3-month Treasuries spread remains small but positive after earlier inversion periods. Latest data shows short end reflecting higher short-term rates, long end moderately lower long-term rates. Leaves T10Y3M narrow but not inverted signaling recession fears reduction vs previous periods but not indicating sustained confident economic growth.
T10Y3M transition to positive territory after prolonged inversion phases means current market expectations shifted toward moderate economic growth but signal remains cautious.

Trend forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Next weeks T10Y3M may stay narrow positive range or slightly widen if bond market continues pricing Fed soft monetary policy expectations and moderate economic growth. If economic data (GDP growth, employment, inflation) stronger than expected, long rates may rise expanding spread. Alternative ‚Äî data deterioration supports low long-term rates keeping spread narrow.
Forecast: spread stays narrow or slightly widens, no sharp moves.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
Medium-term dynamics depends on:
inflation data,
real economic growth rates,
Fed rate actions.
If inflation/growth stabilize, market may gradually move toward sustained spread expansion reflecting growth conviction and gradual easing tightening role reduction. However if inflation accelerates again and Fed forced to keep high rate levels, long-term Treasuries remain attractive, spread may narrow again.
Forecast: moderate spread expansion with stable data; possible fluctuations with mixed signals.

Long-term (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term T10Y3M trend most sensitive to economic cycles/rates. If global economy slows or recession signs appear, spread may narrow/invert again. If economic growth strengthens and market starts pricing future rate hikes (or moderate level holding), spread may expand to more traditional positive levels.
Forecast: possible cyclical fluctuations with compression/expansion periods depending on macro cycles but no sustained one-sided trend without confirming fundamental data.

Market impacts
Equities and risk assets
T10Y3M important economic cycle marker:
Positive but narrow spread ‚Äî backdrop for moderate growth confidence not aggressive risk.
Expanding spread ‚Äî signal more sustainable growth favorable for equities.
Compression/inversion ‚Äî correction/decline risk signal for equity markets.
Today narrow positive spread supports moderate risk appetite but without strong impulse.

Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin not directly tied to Treasuries but reacts to market risk appetite/liquidity:
‚Ä¢ Positive T10Y3M linked to more favorable economic backdrop strengthening risk asset interest potentially supporting sustained Bitcoin demand combined with other drivers (ETFs, institutional demand).
‚Ä¢ Spread compression/inversion increases uncertainty strengthens investor caution potentially pressuring Bitcoin alongside equities.
Current narrow positive spread creates neutral-supportive BTC macro backdrop not powerful growth/decline driver.

Practical summary
Short-term: spread stays narrow positive; moderate backdrop for markets/Bitcoin.
Medium-term: possible moderate expansion with stable data; backdrop rather supports than suppresses risk appetite.
Long-term: cyclical changes depending on economic cycle; no confident one-sided trend without confirming data.
extra.si:
Trenutno stanje T10Y3M
Danes razlika med 10-letnimi in 3-meseƒçnimi Treasuries ostaja majhna, a pozitivna po prej≈°njih obdobjih inverzije. Zadnji podatki ka≈æejo, da kratki konec trga odra≈æa vi≈°je kratkoroƒçne mere, dolgoroƒçni konec zmerno ni≈æje dolgoroƒçne mere. To pu≈°ƒça T10Y3M ozko, a ne inverzirano, kar ka≈æe na zmanj≈°anje strahov pred recesijo v primerjavi s prej≈°njimi obdobji, ne pa na vzdr≈æno samozavestno gospodarsko rast.
Prehod T10Y3M v pozitivno obmoƒçje po dolgotrajnih fazah inverzije pomeni, da so trenutna tr≈æna priƒçakovanja preusmerjena proti zmerni gospodarski rasti, a signal ostaja previden.

Napoved trenda
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
V prihodnjih tednih lahko T10Y3M ostane v ozkem pozitivnem razponu ali rahlo ≈°iri, ƒçe obvezniƒçni trg nadaljuje fiksiranje priƒçakovanj mehke monetarne politike Fed in zmerne gospodarske rasti. ƒåe bodo ekonomski podatki (rast BDP, zaposlenost, inflacija) moƒçnej≈°i od priƒçakovanih, se lahko dolgoroƒçne mere dvignejo in poveƒçajo razliko. Alternativa ‚Äî poslab≈°anje podatkov podpira nizke dolgoroƒçne mere, kar dr≈æi razliko ozko.
Napoved: razlika ostane ozka ali rahlo ≈°iri, brez ostrih gibov.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Srednjeroƒçna dinamika bo odvisna od kombinacije:
inflacijskih podatkov,
resniƒçnih stopenj gospodarske rasti,
ukrepov Fed glede mer.
ƒåe se inflacija/rast stabilizirata, se trg postopoma lahko premakne k vzdr≈ænemu ≈°irjenju razlike. To bo odra≈æalo prepriƒçanost v rast in postopno zmanj≈°anje vloge zaostrovanja spodbud. Vendar ƒçe se inflacija ponovno pospe≈°i in Fed prisiljen dr≈æati visoke ravni mer, bodo dolgoroƒçne Treasuries ostale privlaƒçne, razlika se lahko ponovno zo≈æi.
Napoved: zmerno ≈°irjenje razlike pri stabilnih podatkih; mo≈æni nihaji pri me≈°anih signalih.

Dolgoroƒçno (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Dolgoroƒçni trend T10Y3M najbolj obƒçutljiv na gospodarske cikle/mere. ƒåe se globalno gospodarstvo upoƒçasni ali pojavijo znaki recesije, se lahko razlika ponovno zo≈æi/invertira. ƒåe se gospodarska rast okrepi in trg zaƒçne upo≈°tevati prihodnja vi≈°anja mer (ali njihovo zadr≈æevanje na zmernih nivojih), se lahko razlika raz≈°iri na bolj tradicionalne pozitivne ravni.
Napoved: mo≈æni cikliƒçni nihaji z obdobji stiskanja/≈°irjenja, odvisno od makro-ciklov, a brez vzdr≈æne enostranske tendence brez potrjujoƒçih temeljnih podatkov.

Vpliv na trge
Delnice in tvegavi aktiv
T10Y3M pomemben oznaƒçevalec gospodarskega cikla:
Pozitivna, a ozka razlika ‚Äî ozadje za zmerno zaupanje v rast, ne agresivnega tveganja.
≈†ir≈°a razlika ‚Äî signal bolj vzdr≈æne rasti, ugoden za delnice.
Stiskanje/inverzija ‚Äî signal tveganja korekcije/ni≈æanja delni≈°kih trgov.
Danes ozka pozitivna razlika podpira zmeren apetit po tveganju, a brez moƒçnega impulza.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin ni neposredno povezan s Treasuries, a reagira na tr≈æni apetit po tveganju/likvidnost:
‚Ä¢ Pozitivna T10Y3M povezana z bolj ugodnim gospodarskim ozadjem, kar krepi interes za tvegave aktivne in lahko podpira vzdr≈æen povpra≈°evni Bitcoin v kombinaciji z drugimi gonilci (ETF, institucionalno povpra≈°evanje).
‚Ä¢ Stiskanje/inverzija razlike poveƒça negotovost in krepi previdnost vlagateljev, kar lahko pritiska na Bitcoin skupaj z delnicami.
Trenutna ozka pozitivna razlika ustvarja nevtralno-podpirajoƒçe makro-ozadje za BTC, ne moƒçnega gonilca rasti/pada.

Praktiƒçni povzetek
Kratkoroƒçno: razlika ostane ozka in pozitivna; zmerno ozadje za trge/Bitcoin.
Srednjeroƒçno: mo≈æno zmerno ≈°irjenje pri stabilnih podatkih; ozadje bolj podpira kot zatira apetit po tveganju.
Dolgoroƒçno: cikliƒçne spremembe glede na gospodarski cikel; brez zanesljive enostranske tendence brez potrjujoƒçih podatkov.

text.en:
KCFSI ‚Äî financial stress index calculated by Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City. Combines multiple variables (credit spreads, yields, volatility, banking indicators) into one integral measure reflecting US financial system tension level.
Positive values indicate elevated financial stress, negative values ‚Äî reduced tension. Index updated weekly making it more sensitive to market shocks than quarterly macro indicators.

Market impacts
KCFSI serves early systemic risk indicator:
If index rises (above historical norms):
bank spreads widen,
credit tightens,
investors reduce risk exposures,
liquidity deteriorates.
Negatively impacts:
equity markets (corrections, elevated volatility),
corporate credit (default growth),
emerging market currencies,
commodity markets sensitive to economic activity.
KCFSI decline:
tension falls,
market conditions improve,
risk appetite grows.
KCFSI often precedes periods of elevated asset correlation as systemic stress reflects broad credit/market conditions.

Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin not traditional financial asset but shows sensitivity to risk capital behavior.
Rising KCFSI:
investors exit risk assets,
capital reallocates to safe instruments (bonds, gold),
Bitcoin correlates with equity declines moving with risk assets.
Declining KCFSI:
risk appetite improves,
capital returns to risk assets,
Bitcoin receives trend recovery support.
Bitcoin reacts not directly to index itself but to risk/liquidity backdrop it reflects. During extreme stress BTC-traditional risk asset correlation strengthens as capital seeks safety.

Interconnections
KCFSI correlates with:
VIX (volatility index) ‚Äî KCFSI rise usually accompanies VIX growth.
credit spreads ‚Äî spread widening reflects deteriorating credit conditions.
quantitative conditions (liquidity) ‚Äî elevated stress + liquidity squeeze amplifies market pressure.
economic cycles ‚Äî sustained KCFSI rises often precede activity slowdowns (leading signals).

Forecasts and trading usage
Macro forecasts
Analysts use KCFSI to assess crisis/correction scenario probability. Sharp index spikes viewed as warning signals before economic data deterioration.
Risk management
Stress backdrop determines portfolio risk asset aggression level. High KCFSI levels ‚Üí position reduction, risk neutralization.
Trading
Limited intraday applicability (infrequent/noisy data) but helps medium-term strategies filter false technical signals:
KCFSI rise + bearish price structure = enhanced downside pressure;
KCFSI decline + price reversal = recovery confirmation.

Practical summary
KCFSI ‚Äî systemic financial stress indicator reflecting liquidity/credit market conditions.
Index rise signals risk elevation, market corrections, risk asset pressure including Bitcoin.
Index decline creates risk appetite expansion backdrop supporting high volatility assets.
Not direct trading signal but contextual market regime filter strengthening/weakening other indicator signals aiding more balanced decisions.
text.si:
KCFSI ‚Äî kazalnik finanƒçnega stresa, ki ga izraƒçunava Federalna rezerva Kansas City. Zdru≈æuje veƒç spremenljivk (kreditne razlike, donosnosti, volatilnost, banƒçne kazalnike) v en integralni kazalnik, ki odra≈æa raven napetosti v finanƒçnem sistemu ZDA.
Pozitivne vrednosti pomenijo povi≈°ano finanƒçno napetost, negativne ‚Äî zmanj≈°ano napetost. Kazalnik se posodablja tedensko, kar ga naredi bolj obƒçutljivega na tr≈æne ≈°oke kot ƒçetrtletni makro-kazalniki.

Vpliv na trge
KCFSI slu≈æi kot zgodnji kazalnik sistemskega tveganja:
ƒåe se kazalnik dviga (nad zgodovinske normale):
banƒçne razlike se ≈°irijo,
kreditiranje se stiska,
vlagatelji zmanj≈°ujejo izpostavljenost tveganju,
likvidnost se poslab≈°a.
Negativno vpliva na:
delni≈°ke trge (korekcije, povi≈°ana volatilnost),
korporativne kredite (rast neplaƒçil),
valute razvijajoƒçih se trgov,
surovinske trge, obƒçutljive na gospodarsko aktivnost.
Padec KCFSI:
napetost pada,
tr≈æna stanja se izbolj≈°ajo,
apetit po tveganju raste.
KCFSI pogosto predhodno obdobja povi≈°ane korelacije med aktivami, saj sistemski stres odra≈æa ≈°iroka stanja kreditnih in tr≈ænih razmer.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin ni tradicionalni finanƒçni aktiv, a ka≈æe obƒçutljivost na vedenje tveganega kapitala.
Povi≈°anje KCFSI:
vlagatelji zapu≈°ƒçajo tvegave aktivne,
kapital se prerazporedi v varne instrumente (obveznice, zlato),
Bitcoin pogosto korelira s padci delnic in pada skupaj s tveganimi aktivami.
Padec KCFSI:
apetit po tveganju se izbolj≈°a,
kapital se vraƒça v tvegave aktivne,
Bitcoin dobi podporo za obnovo trenda.
Bitcoin obiƒçajno ne reagira neposredno na sam kazalnik, temveƒç na ozadje tveganja in likvidnosti, ki ga kazalnik odra≈æa. V obdobjih ekstremne napetosti se korelacija med BTC in tradicionalnimi tveganimi aktivami krepi, saj kapital stremi k varnosti.

Povezave
KCFSI korelira z:
VIX (kazalnik volatilnosti) ‚Äî rast KCFSI obiƒçajno spremlja rast VIX.
kreditne razlike ‚Äî ≈°irjenje razlik odra≈æa poslab≈°anje kreditnih razmer.
kvantitativna stanja (likvidnost) ‚Äî kombinacija povi≈°ane napetosti in stiskanja likvidnosti krepi pritisk na trge.
gospodarski cikli ‚Äî vztrajne rasti KCFSI pogosto predhodno padce aktivnosti (vodilni signali).

Uporaba v napovedih in trgovanju
Makro-napovedi
Analitiki uporabljajo KCFSI za oceno verjetnosti kriznih/korekcijskih scenarijev. Ostri skoki kazalnika se obravnavajo kot opozorilni signali pred poslab≈°anjem ekonomskih podatkov.
Upravljanje tveganj
Ozadje napetosti doloƒça, kako agresivno lahko portfelj izpostavimo tveganim aktivam. Visoke ravni KCFSI ‚Üí zmanj≈°anje pozicij, nevtralizacija tveganja.
Trgovanje
Omejena uporabnost za intradnevno trgovanje (redki/≈°umni podatki), a za srednjeroƒçne strategije pomaga filtrirati la≈æne signale tehniƒçnih kazalnikov:
rast KCFSI + medvedja cenovna struktura = okrepljen pritisk navzdol;
padec KCFSI + preobrat cene = potrditev okrevanja.

Praktiƒçni povzetek
KCFSI ‚Äî kazalnik sistemskega finanƒçnega stresa, ki odra≈æa stanje trgov likvidnosti in kreditiranja.
Rast kazalnika signalizira povi≈°ano tveganje, tr≈æne korekcije, pritisk na tvegave aktivne vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.
Padec kazalnika ustvarja ozadje za ≈°iritev apetita po tveganju in podporo aktivom z visoko volatilnostjo.
Ni neposreden trgovalni signal, temveƒç kontekstni filter tr≈ænega re≈æima, ki krepi/oslabi signale drugih kazalnikov in pomaga pri bolj uravnote≈æenih odloƒçitvah.

extra.en:
Current KCFSI state
Latest data shows KCFSI near zero or slightly positive reflecting moderate systemic stress level. Significantly below crisis peak levels (2008-2009, March 2020, 2023 banking shocks) but above long calm periods. Indicates markets currently in moderate tension state not systemic crisis phase.
Economic data on employment, consumption, corporate profits show no deep stress signs while financial conditions remain relatively stable ‚Äî confirmed by moderate KCFSI values.

Trend direction forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Next weeks KCFSI likely stays moderate stress level or shifts slightly down if current economic data maintains positive dynamics and liquidity pressure doesn't intensify. Elevated credit market resilience and moderate volatility in key segments reduces sharp stress spike risk.
If negative shocks appear (unexpected default growth, negative macro news, banking problems), index may temporarily spike increasing risk market correlation amplifying selloffs. Currently no such triggers.
Short-term forecast: index stable or slightly reduced, no sharp jumps.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
Medium-term KCFSI influenced by:
monetary policy (rates, liquidity),
macroeconomic trends (GDP growth, inflation),
corporate balance sheets, credit spreads.
If inflation doesn't return to target trajectories or economic activity sharply slows, financial stress may intensify again. However analyst consensus forecasts don't assume deep slowdown supporting moderate index level.
Conversely if Fed/other central banks start rate cuts expanding liquidity, reduces financial stress and KCFSI slowly moves down.
Medium-term forecast: tendency toward moderately lower stress level assuming stable macroeconomics.

Long-term (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term KCFSI reflects economic cycles/global financial conditions. Possible stress intensification phases (recessions, financial shocks) and relaxation phases (soft monetary policy, growth recovery). Index historically precedes fundamental economic shifts.
If US/world economy enters more sustainable growth cycle without major credit shocks, KCFSI stays low levels long-term.
Long-term forecast: tendency toward low/moderate stress levels with possible temporary spikes during cyclical corrections.

Market and Bitcoin price impact
Financial markets
Low/moderate KCFSI levels create backdrop for higher risk asset valuations including equities. Means investors less prone to safe asset flight more willing hold long positions.
KCFSI spikes traditionally accompany equity index declines, credit spread widening, elevated volatility.
Current moderate stress supports range-bound or moderately bullish market behavior.

Bitcoin
Bitcoin reacts to financial stress through market sentiment/risk appetite:
KCFSI decline (less stress) risk appetite grows ‚Äî creates favorable Bitcoin growth backdrop especially combined with institutional capital inflows.
KCFSI rise Bitcoin usually faces pressure as investors cut risk exposures exit to safe assets. Seen during major market shock periods.
Current moderate index level means Bitcoin structural drivers more important than macro-stress extremes.

Practical summary
Short-term: moderate stress state, no spikes; markets/Bitcoin in relatively calm phase.
Medium-term: stress reduction tendency with stable economy; risk asset support.
Long-term: cyclical fluctuations with overall moderate levels absent major shocks.
KCFSI serves macro financial risk filter; dynamics help assess market risk appetite understand which asset segments (equities/crypto) more vulnerable during systemic stress periods.
extra.si:
Trenutno stanje KCFSI
Zadnji podatki ka≈æejo KCFSI blizu niƒçle ali rahlo pozitiven, kar odra≈æa zmerno raven sistemskega stresa. Znaten padec pod vrhunci kriz (2008-2009, marec 2020, banƒçni ≈°oki 2023), a nad dolgimi obdobji 'miru'. Ka≈æe, da so trgi trenutno v stanju zmerne napetosti, ne sistemskega kriznega stanja.
Ekonomski podatki o zaposlenosti, porabi, korporativnih dobiƒçkih ne ka≈æejo znakov globokega stresa, finanƒçna stanja ostajajo relativno stabilna ‚Äî potrjeno z zmernimi vrednostmi KCFSI.

Napoved smeri trenda
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
V prihodnjih tednih bo KCFSI verjetno ostal na zmerni ravni stresa ali rahlo padel, ƒçe bodo trenutni ekonomski podatki ohranili pozitivno dinamiko in pritisk na likvidnost se ne bo okrepil. Poveƒçana odpornost na kreditnih trgih in zmerna volatilnost v kljuƒçnih segmentih zmanj≈°uje tveganje ostrih skokov stresa.
ƒåe se pojavijo negativni ≈°oki (nenaden rast neplaƒçil, negativne makro-novice, banƒçni problemi), se lahko kazalnik zaƒçasno dvigne, kar poveƒça korelacijo tvegavih trgov in okrepi prodajo. Trenutno takih spro≈æilcev ni.
Kratkoroƒçna napoved: kazalnik stabilen ali rahlo zni≈æan, brez ostrih skokov.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Srednjeroƒçno na KCFSI vplivajo:
monetarna politika (mere, likvidnost),
makroekonomske tendence (rast BDP, inflacija),
korporativna bilance, kreditne razlike.
ƒåe inflacija ne vrne na ciljne poti ali se gospodarska aktivnost ostro upoƒçasni, se lahko finanƒçni stres ponovno okrepi. Vendar konsenz analitiƒçnih napovedi ne predvideva globokega upoƒçasnitve, kar podpira zmerno raven kazalnika.
Nasprotno, ƒçe Fed/drugi centralni banke zaƒçnejo zni≈æevati mere in ≈°iriti likvidnost, zmanj≈°a finanƒçni stres in KCFSI bo poƒçasi padal.
Srednjeroƒçna napoved: tendenca k zmerno ni≈æji ravni stresa ob stabilni makroekonomiji.

Dolgoroƒçno (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Dolgoroƒçno KCFSI odra≈æa gospodarske cikle/globalna finanƒçna stanja. Mo≈æni so fazi okrevanja stresa (recesije, finanƒçni ≈°oki) in fazi sprostitve (mehka monetarna politika, obnova rasti). Kazalnik zgodovinsko predhodno temeljne ekonomske premike.
ƒåe gospodarstvo ZDA/svetovni sistem vstopi v bolj vzdr≈æen cikel rasti brez veƒçjih kreditnih ≈°okov, bo KCFSI ostal na nizkih nivojih dolgoroƒçno.
Dolgoroƒçna napoved: tendenca k nizki/zmerni ravni stresa z mo≈ænimi zaƒçasnimi skoki med cikliƒçnimi korekcijami.

Vpliv na trge in ceno Bitcoina
Finanƒçni trgi
Nizke/zmerne ravni KCFSI ustvarjajo ozadje za vi≈°je vrednotenje tvegavih aktivov vkljuƒçno z delnicami. To pomeni, da vlagatelji manj nagnjeni k begu v varne aktivne in bolj pripravljeni dr≈æati dolge pozicije.
Skoki KCFSI tradicionalno spremljajo padce indeksov, ≈°irjenje kreditnih razlik, povi≈°ano volatilnost.
Trenutna zmerna raven stresa podpira razponsko ali zmerno bikovsko vedenje trgov.

Bitcoin
Bitcoin reagira na finanƒçni stres prek tr≈ænega sentimenta/apetita po tveganju:
Padec KCFSI (manj stresa) apetit po tveganju raste ‚Äî ustvarja ugodno ozadje za rast Bitcoina ≈°e posebej v kombinaciji z institucionalnimi prilivi.
Povi≈°anje KCFSI Bitcoin obiƒçajno do≈æivlja pritisk, saj vlagatelji skraj≈°ajo izpostavljenost tveganju in gredo v varne aktivne. Videno med veƒçjimi tr≈ænimi ≈°oki.
Trenutna zmerna raven kazalnika pomeni, da so Bitcoinovi strukturni gonilci pomembnej≈°i od makro-stresa ekstremov.

Praktiƒçni povzetek
Kratkoroƒçno: zmerno stanje stresa, brez skokov; trgi/Bitcoin v relativno mirni fazi.
Srednjeroƒçno: tendenca k zmanj≈°anju stresa pri stabilni ekonomiji; podpora tveganim aktivom.
Dolgoroƒçno: cikliƒçne nihanja z splo≈°no zmernimi nivoji brez veƒçjih ≈°okov.
KCFSI slu≈æi kot makro-filter finanƒçnega tveganja; njegova dinamika pomaga oceniti tr≈æni apetit po tveganju in razumeti, kateri segmenti aktivov (delnice/kripto) bolj ranljivi med sistemskim stresom.

text.en:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index. ANALYSIS as of 24.12.2025. Value ‚âà 6.53% (effective yield of high-yield bonds in the US).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
This means that investors in these "junk" bonds currently receive around 6.5% annually, reflecting current risk assessments and market conditions.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
Context:
‚Äî This is below historical average (~7.8‚Äì8% or higher).(gurufocus.com)
‚Äî Not as high as in crisis periods (>10‚Äì15%).(gurufocus.com)
This indicates that credit markets are not currently under extreme stress, but not as calm as in "ideal" conditions.

Medium-term (6‚Äì12 months) market forecast
Possible directions
1) If yields continue to decline:
‚úîÔ∏è Improved investor sentiment and credit risk perception
‚úîÔ∏è Risk appetite grows ‚Äî investments in risky assets intensify
2) If yields start to rise:
Increased concerns about credit conditions and possible economic slowdown
Risk premium growth ‚Üí financial conditions tighten
In 2025 yields remain moderate ‚Äî this may reflect expectations that economy continues growing without major shocks. If investor caution regarding risks intensifies (e.g., due to deteriorating corporate earnings or rising defaults), yields may rise higher. If tightening conditions have already peaked, yields may stabilize or even decline.

Market impact
Stock market
HY yield rise ‚Üí reflects higher credit risk assessments ‚Üí may pressure stocks, especially in risky sectors.
Decline/stabilization ‚Üí risk appetite support ‚Üí stocks may strengthen.
Credit markets
Effective yield rise usually coincides with spread widening (credit becomes more expensive, investors demand compensation), indicating tighter financial conditions.
Decline or stable yield levels indicate comfortable conditions for corporate borrowing.

Bitcoin (BTC) impact
The relationship between high-yield bond yields and Bitcoin is not straightforward, but there are indirect effects through risk appetite and overall financial environment:
When HY yields fall or remain moderately stable:
‚Äî this usually reflects moderate credit risk and calm financial environment, contributing to growth of risk assets including BTC.
Sharp HY yield rise:
‚Äî alarm signal (intensified credit risk) ‚Üí investors exit risky assets ‚Üí BTC may correct more strongly than traditional markets.
Thus, high BAMLH0A0HYM2EY yields often accompany declining risk sentiment ‚Äî which may pressure BTC ‚Äî while declining yields may support more positive sentiment and capital inflows into crypto assets.

How to use BAMLH0A0HYM2EY in trading
1) Credit market conditions assessment
Rising yields ‚Üí market demands greater risk compensation ‚Üí may be early warning of declining risk appetite.
Falling/stable yields ‚Üí softer credit conditions ‚Üí favorable for risk assets.
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è BAMLH0A0HYM2EY ‚Äî effective yield of US high-yield corporate bond index (~6.5% in December 2025).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
‚úîÔ∏è Level moderate, below historical average ‚Äî reflects adequate credit conditions, not extreme.(gurufocus.com)
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term: if yields continue declining or stabilizing ‚Äî positive for risk assets; rising yields may signal growing credit risks.
‚úîÔ∏è Stock markets and BTC: serves as indirect risk appetite marker ‚Äî rising yields may pressure BTC, declining yields support it.
text.si:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index. ANALIZA na 24.12.2025. Vrednost ‚âà 6,53 % (uƒçinkovita donosnost visokodonosnih obveznic v ZDA).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
To pomeni, da vlagatelji v te ‚Äûjunk" obveznice trenutno prejemajo pribli≈æno 6,5 % letno, kar odra≈æa trenutne ocene tveganj in tr≈æne razmere.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
Kontekst:
‚Äî To je pod zgodovinskim povpreƒçjem (~7,8‚Äì8 % ali vi≈°je).(gurufocus.com)
‚Äî Ni tako visoko kot v kriznih obdobjih (>10‚Äì15 %).(gurufocus.com)
To ka≈æe, da kreditni trgi trenutno niso pod ekstremnim pritiskom, a niso niti tako mirni kot v ‚Äûidealnih" pogojih.

Srednjeroƒçna (6‚Äì12 mesecev) napoved trga
Mo≈æne smeri
1) ƒåe donosnost nadaljuje padanje:
‚úîÔ∏è Izbolj≈°anje razpolo≈æenja vlagateljev in percepcije kreditnega tveganja
‚úîÔ∏è Apetit po tveganju raste ‚Äî nalo≈æbe v tvegane aktive se krepijo
2) ƒåe donosnost zaƒçne rasti:
Poveƒçanje skrbi glede kreditnih pogojev in mo≈ænega gospodarskega upoƒçasnitve
Rast premij za tveganje ‚Üí finanƒçni pogoji se zaostrujejo
Leta 2025 donosnost ostaja zmerna ‚Äî to lahko odra≈æa priƒçakovanja, da gospodarstvo nadaljuje rast brez veƒçjih pretresov. ƒåe bo previdnost vlagateljev glede tveganj narasla (npr. zaradi poslab≈°anja korporativnih dobiƒçkov ali rasti neplaƒçil), se lahko donosnost dvigne vi≈°je. ƒåe so pogoji zaostritve obrestnih mer ≈æe prestopili vrh, se lahko donosnost stabilizira ali celo zni≈æa.

Vpliv na trge
Delni≈°ki trg
Rast donosnosti HY ‚Üí odra≈æa vi≈°je ocene kreditnega tveganja ‚Üí lahko pritiska na delnice, ≈°e posebej v tveganih sektorjih.
Padanje/stabilizacija ‚Üí podpora apetitu po tveganju ‚Üí delnice se lahko krepijo.
Kreditni trgi
Rast uƒçinkovite donosnosti obiƒçajno sovpada z raz≈°iritvijo razlik (kredit postane dra≈æji, vlagatelji zahtevajo od≈°kodnino), kar ka≈æe na stro≈æje finanƒçne pogoje.
Padanje ali stabilne ravni donosnosti ka≈æejo na udobne pogoje za korporativno zadol≈æevanje.

Vpliv na bitcoin (BTC)
Povezava med donosnostjo visokodonosnih obveznic in bitcoino ni linearna, a obstajajo posredni uƒçinki prek apetita po tveganju in splo≈°nega finanƒçnega okolja:
Ko donosnost HY pada ali ostaja zmerno stabilna:
‚Äî to obiƒçajno odra≈æa zmerno kreditno tveganje in mirno finanƒçno okolje, kar spodbuja rast tveganih aktivov, vkljuƒçno z BTC.
Oster dvig donosnosti HY:
‚Äî alarmni signal (poveƒçano kreditno tveganje) ‚Üí vlagatelji be≈æijo iz tveganih aktivov ‚Üí BTC se lahko korigira moƒçneje kot tradicionalni trgi.
Torej, visoka donosnost BAMLH0A0HYM2EY pogosto spremlja upad razpolo≈æenja glede tveganja ‚Äî kar lahko pritiska na BTC ‚Äî padanje donosnosti pa lahko podpira bolj pozitivna razpolo≈æenja in priliv kapitala v kriptoaktive.

Kako uporabiti BAMLH0A0HYM2EY v trgovanju
1) Ocena pogojev kreditnega trga
Rast donosnosti (rising yields) ‚Üí trg zahteva veƒçjo od≈°kodnino za tveganje ‚Üí lahko je zgodnje opozorilo pred upadom apetita po tveganju.
Padanje/stabilna donosnost ‚Üí mehkej≈°i kreditni pogoji ‚Üí ugodno za tvegane aktive.
Povzetek
‚úîÔ∏è BAMLH0A0HYM2EY ‚Äî uƒçinkovita donosnost indeksa visokodonosnih korporativnih obveznic ZDA (~6,5 % decembra 2025).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
‚úîÔ∏è Raven zmerna, pod zgodovinskim povpreƒçjem ‚Äî odra≈æa ustrezne kreditne pogoje, ne ekstremne.(gurufocus.com)
‚úîÔ∏è Srednjeroƒçno: ƒçe donosnost nadaljuje padanje ali stabilizacijo ‚Äî pozitivno za tvegane aktive; rast donosnosti lahko signalizira nara≈°ƒçajoƒçe kreditne rizike.
‚úîÔ∏è Trgi delnic in BTC: indikator slu≈æi kot posreden marker apetita po tveganju ‚Äî rast donosnosti lahko pritiska na BTC, padanje ga podpira.

extra.en:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index (BAMLH0A0HYM2EY) is the data series code representing the effective yield of the ICE BofA US High Yield Index (effective yield rate for US high-yield corporate bonds rated below investment grade)
üîπ ICE BofA US High Yield Index is a widely used index tracking yields of high-risk corporate bonds (junk bonds) issued in US dollars.(CION Investments)
üîπ Index includes bonds rated below investment grade (typically BB and lower), which pay higher yields to compensate for increased credit risk.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
What this series shows:
This is the effective yield (%) that investors receive from the basket of all such bonds in the index.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
It depends on both interest rates (Treasuries) and credit risk, reflecting overall credit conditions in the market.(fred.stlouisfed.org) Simply: higher value = more expensive credit risk, investors demand higher yield for default risk.

ICE BofA US High Yield Index (BAMLH0A0HYM2EY) je koda podatkovne serije, ki predstavlja uƒçinkovito donosnost indeksa ICE BofA US High Yield Index (uƒçinkovita stopnja donosnosti za visokodonosne korporativne obveznice ZDA z oceno pod investicijskim razredom)
üîπ ICE BofA US High Yield Index je ≈°iroko uporabljan indeks, ki sledi donosnostim visoko tveganih korporativnih obveznic (junk bonds), izdanih v ameri≈°kih dolarjih.(CION Investments)
üîπ Indeks vkljuƒçuje obveznice z oceno pod investicijskim razredom (obiƒçajno BB in ni≈æje), ki plaƒçujejo vi≈°jo donosnost za nadomestilo poveƒçanega kreditnega tveganja.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
Kaj prikazuje ta serija:
To je uƒçinkovita donosnost (%), ki jo vlagatelji prejemajo iz ko≈°arice vseh takih obveznic v indeksu.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
Zanjo so odvisne tako obrestne mere (Treasuries) kot kreditno tveganje, kar odra≈æa splo≈°ne kreditne razmere na trgu.(fred.stlouisfed.org) Preprosto: vi≈°ja vrednost = dra≈æje kreditno tveganje, vlagatelji zahtevajo vi≈°jo donosnost za tveganje neplaƒçila.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 24.12.2025. Buffett Indicator According to December 2025 data, Buffett Indicator is at extremely high levels:
Approximately ~220%‚Äì226% ‚Äî market capitalization exceeds US economy size by more than double. These are historically record or near-record values, significantly above historical average (~158%). Such position means stocks trade significantly more expensive than usual relative to economy size ‚Äî i.e. market is in strong overvaluation state. Medium-term forecast
Macroeconomic logic
Indicator above 200% historically associated with extreme optimism, market overheating and potential correction risk (Buffett said levels above ~200% mean "playing with fire"). Medium
üìâ However important to remember:
‚úîÔ∏è High values don't guarantee immediate decline ‚Äî markets can stay expensive for long.
‚úîÔ∏è Overvaluation often signals lower long-term expected returns than average, even if short-term movements may continue growing.
Medium-term scenarios (6‚Äì12 months)
1. Bearish/correction scenario
If economy slows or corporate earnings stop growing, high valuations hard to sustain ‚Äî significant stock market corrections possible. 2.Sideways/stagnation
With sustained high valuations but no new growth drivers, market may consolidate. 3.Continued growth, but more moderate
If corporate earnings continue growing faster than GDP and monetary conditions remain soft, market may hold high valuations, but this will be risky position. Market and Bitcoin impact
Stocks
High Buffett Indicator indicates stocks expensively valued, usually associated with higher correction probability or low medium-term future returns.
This may make stocks vulnerable if economic data worsens or volatility rises.
Bonds
Stock overvaluation often drives investors toward bonds or safe assets during pullbacks.
However with low rates corporate bonds may remain attractive by yield.
Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies
Connection between Buffett Indicator and BTC not direct, but important indirect mechanisms exist:
When Buffett Indicator high, stock valuations expensive:
This means increased market greed (risk-on) while markets grow. Interest in Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies often rises alongside stocks during risk expansion. If high valuations lead to correction:
Market may shift to risk-off sentiment ‚Üí capital exits risky assets ‚Üí BTC may sharply correct with stocks. In other words, Buffett Indicator may serve as macro-context signal for risk appetite changes in cryptocurrencies, not as direct BTC trading signal. How to use Buffett Indicator in trading
1) Overall market valuation assessment
Very high Buffett Indicator (>200%) ‚Üí caution signal: markets already expensive ‚Äî shouldn't build unprotected long positions without hedge. Low levels (<100%) ‚Üí potentially more favorable market valuation.
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è What it shows: Buffett Indicator measures US stock market overall valuation relative to economy (GDP). vc.ru
‚úîÔ∏è Current position (December 2025): extremely high values ~220%‚Äì226%, indicating strong overvaluation. longtermtrends.com+1
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term forecast: high overvaluation increases correction risk, but doesn't guarantee immediate reversal.
‚úîÔ∏è Market and BTC impact: may signal increased risk appetite, but also increased vulnerability to declines if conditions worsen.
‚úîÔ∏è In trading: use as macro-valuation indicator combined with other signals for risk management, not as standalone trading signal.
text.si:
ANALIZA na 24.12.2025. Kazalnik Buffetta Po podatkih za december 2025 je kazalnik Buffetta na ekstremno visokih nivojih:
Pribli≈æno ~220 %‚Äì226 % ‚Äî tr≈æna kapitalizacija presega velikost gospodarstva ZDA veƒç kot dvakrat. To so zgodovinsko rekordne ali skoraj rekordne vrednosti, bistveno nad zgodovinskim povpreƒçjem (~158 %). Tak polo≈æaj pomeni, da se delnice trgujejo bistveno dra≈æje kot obiƒçajno glede na velikost gospodarstva ‚Äî tj. trg je v stanju moƒçne precenjenosti. Srednjeroƒçna napoved
Makroekonomska logika
Kazalnik nad 200 % je zgodovinsko povezan z ekstremnim optimizmom, pregrevanjem trga in potencialnim tveganjem korekcije (Buffett je rekel, da nivoji nad ~200 % pomenijo ‚Äûigranje z ognjem"). Medium
üìâ Vendar je pomembno vedeti:
‚úîÔ∏è Visoke vrednosti ne zagotavljajo takoj≈°njega padca ‚Äî trgi lahko ostanejo dragi dolgo ƒçasa.
‚úîÔ∏è Precenjenost pogosto signalizira ni≈æje dolgoroƒçne priƒçakovane donosnosti kot povpreƒçje, ƒçeprav lahko kratkoroƒçna gibanja nadaljujejo rast.
Srednjeroƒçni scenariji (6‚Äì12 mesecev)
1. Medvedji/korektivni scenarij
ƒåe se gospodarstvo upoƒçasni ali korporativni dobiƒçki prenehajo rasti, visokim ocenam te≈æko vzdr≈æevati ‚Äî mo≈æne so znatne korekcije na borznem trgu. 2.Stranski trend/stagnacija
Ob ohranjanju visokih ocen, a brez novih gonilcev rasti, se lahko trg konsolidira. 3.Nadaljevanje rasti, a bolj zmerno
ƒåe korporativni dobiƒçki nadaljujejo rast hitreje kot BDP in monetarni pogoji ostanejo mehki, lahko trg ohrani visoke ocene, a bo to tvegana pozicija. Vpliv na trge in bitcoin
Delnice
Visok kazalnik Buffetta ka≈æe, da so delnice drago ocenjene, kar je obiƒçajno povezano z vi≈°jo verjetnostjo korekcij ali niskimi srednjeroƒçnimi prihodnjimi donosnostmi.
To lahko delnice naredi ranljive v primeru poslab≈°anja ekonomskih podatkov ali rasti nihljivosti.
Obveznice
Precnenost delnic pogosto vodi vlagatelje proti obveznicam ali varnim aktivom v obdobjih padcev.
Vendar pri nizkih obrestnih merah lahko korporativne obveznice ostanejo privlaƒçne po donosnosti.
Bitcoin in kriptovalute
Povezava med kazalnikom Buffetta in BTC ni neposredna, a obstajajo pomembni posredni mehanizmi:
Ko je kazalnik Buffetta visok, so ocene delnic drage:
To pomeni poveƒçano tr≈æno pohlep (risk-on), dokler trgi rastejo. Interes za bitcoin in kriptovalute pogosto nara≈°ƒça skupaj z delnicami v obdobju ≈°iritve tveganja. ƒåe visoke ocene vodijo v korekcijo:
Trg se lahko preusmeri v risk-off razpolo≈æenje ‚Üí kapitali be≈æijo iz tveganih aktivov ‚Üí BTC se lahko moƒçno korigira skupaj z delnicami. Z drugimi besedami, kazalnik Buffetta lahko slu≈æi kot makrokontekstni signal za spremembe apetita po tveganju v kriptovalutah, ne kot neposreden trgovalni signal za BTC. Kako uporabiti kazalnik Buffetta v trgovanju
1) Ocena splo≈°ne tr≈æne ocene
Zelo visok kazalnik Buffetta (>200 %) ‚Üí signal previdnosti: trgi so ≈æe dragi ‚Äî ni smiselno neupraviƒçeno poveƒçevati dolgih pozicij brez za≈°ƒçite. Nizke ravni (<100 %) ‚Üí potencialno ugodnej≈°a tr≈æna ocena.
Povzetek
‚úîÔ∏è Kaj prikazuje: Kazalnik Buffetta meri splo≈°no oceno borznega trga ZDA glede na gospodarstvo (BDP). vc.ru
‚úîÔ∏è Trenutni polo≈æaj (december 2025): ekstremno visoke vrednosti ~220 %‚Äì226 %, ki ka≈æejo na moƒçno precenjenost. longtermtrends.com+1
‚úîÔ∏è Srednjeroƒçna napoved: visoka precenjenost poveƒçuje tveganje korekcije, a ne zagotavlja takoj≈°nje obraƒçanje.
‚úîÔ∏è Vpliv na trge in BTC: lahko signalizira poveƒçan apetit po tveganju, a tudi poveƒçano ranljivost za padce ob poslab≈°anju pogojev.
‚úîÔ∏è V trgovanju: uporabljajte kot makro-ocenovalni kazalnik v kombinaciji z drugimi signali za upravljanje tveganj, ne kot samostojen trgovalni signal.

extra.en:
Buffett Indicator is the ratio of total market capitalization of all publicly traded companies to country's gross domestic product (GDP) (usually US). It shows how "expensive" stock market is relative to economy size. Often called Warren Buffett's "favorite indicator" for overall market valuation. 
Formula:
Buffett Indicator=Market CapTotalGDP‚Äã√ó100%
Where:
Total Market Cap ‚Äî market capitalization of entire stock exchange (often measured via Wilshire 5000).


GDP ‚Äî US gross domestic product for the year. smart-lab.ru


Interpretation (on historical levels):
< ~100%: market may be undervalued.


~100‚Äì135%: normal (near average) valuation.


~160%: market overvaluation (high correction risks).
extra.si:
Kazalnik Buffetta je razmerje med skupno tr≈æno kapitalizacijo vseh javno kotiranih podjetij in bruto domaƒçim proizvodom (BDP) dr≈æave (obiƒçajno ZDA). Prikazuje, kako ‚Äûdrago‚Äú je borzni trg glede na velikost gospodarstva. To pogosto imenujejo ‚Äûljubljeni kazalnik" Warrena Buffetta za splo≈°no tr≈æno oceno. 
Formula:
Kazalnik Buffetta=Skupna tr≈æna kapitalizacijaBDP√ó100%
Kjer:
Skupna tr≈æna kapitalizacija ‚Äî tr≈æna kapitalizacija celotne borze (pogosto merjeno prek Wilshire 5000).


BDP ‚Äî bruto domaƒçi proizvod ZDA za leto. smart-lab.ru


Interpretacija (na zgodovinskih nivojih):
< ~100 %: trg je lahko podcenjen.


~100‚Äì135 %: normalna (blizu povpreƒçne) ocena.


~160 %: precenjenost trga (visoka tveganja korekcije).

text.en:
Coincident Economic Activity Index (USPHCI) ANALYSIS December 2025. Index value ‚âà 148.31 (seasonally adjusted) ‚Äî its historical maximum compared to available series data. Index grew relatively steadily in 2024-2025 years, reflecting sustained employment growth, manufacturing activity and incomes. tradingeconomics.com
This means that at end of 2025 US economy remained in expansion phase, without signs of significant overall activity contraction.
Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months)
Key forecast factors
USPHCI is coincident indicator, reflects current activity, doesn't predict future. However dynamics of its changes (acceleration or slowdown) may signal turns in coming months. fred.stlouisfed.org
Current trend:
‚úîÔ∏è Moderate index growth
‚úîÔ∏è Employment and production support
‚úîÔ∏è Relatively stable economic conditions
Medium-term forecast:
‚Äî Index likely continue growing, but pace may slow if employment growth stalls or manufacturing sector slowdown signs appear.
‚Äî Index growth slowdown may precede economy slowdown or GDP decline in following quarters.
Forecast based on current growth trend, but considers that US economic cycle in 2025 may enter phase of more moderate expansion or even close to plateau, given tightening credit conditions and other macro signals. tradingeconomics.com
How USPHCI affects markets
Stock market
Index growth ‚Üí good sign for stocks, especially cyclical sectors (finance, industry).
Growth slowdown or decline ‚Üí may signal deteriorating business activity and pressure risk assets.
Stocks often react not to index level directly, but to change in its growth pace.
Impact on Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies
USPHCI not direct cryptocurrency indicator, but affects overall risk market sentiment:
Positive signal (index growing, economy strong):
‚Äî investors inclined to take more risk ‚Üí capital may flow to risky assets including BTC.
Growth slowdown or decline:
‚Äî risk appetite may decrease ‚Üí investors move to less risky assets ‚Üí BTC may correct stronger than traditional markets.
In other words, USPHCI helps assess risk setting (risk-on / risk-off), which repeatedly influenced crypto market dynamics.
Summary
USPHCI reflects current US economy state based on employment, unemployment, production and incomes. fred.stlouisfed.org
December 2025 state: index at historically high level (~148.3), indicating expanding economy. tradingeconomics.com
Medium-term forecast: further growth possible, but pace may slow in more moderate economic cycle conditions.
Markets and BTC impact: index serves as risk appetite indicator ‚Äî strengthening supports risk assets, slowdown may reduce sentiment.
Trading: useful as overall economic background indicator and current growth cycle strength check.
text.si:
Indeks soƒçasne ekonomske aktivnosti (USPHCI) ANALIZA december 2025. Vrednost indeksa ‚âà 148,31 (sezonsko prilagojeno) ‚Äî njegov zgodovinski maksimum v primerjavi z razpolo≈æljivimi podatki serije. Indeks je relativno stabilno rasel v letih 2024-2025, odra≈æajoƒç stabilno rast zaposlenosti, proizvodne aktivnosti in dohodkov. tradingeconomics.com
To pomeni, da je konec leta 2025 gospodarstvo ZDA ostalo v fazi ≈°iritve, brez znakov znatnega zmanj≈°anja splo≈°ne aktivnosti.
Srednjeroƒçna napoved (6‚Äì12 mesecev)
Kljuƒçni dejavniki napovedi
USPHCI je soƒçasni kazalnik, odra≈æa trenutno aktivnost, ne napoveduje prihodnosti. Vendar dinamika njegovih sprememb (pospe≈°itev ali upoƒçasnitev) lahko signalizira obraƒçune v prihajajoƒçih mesecih. fred.stlouisfed.org
Trenutni trend:
‚úîÔ∏è Zmerna rast indeksa
‚úîÔ∏è Podpora zaposlenosti in proizvodnje
‚úîÔ∏è Relativno stabilni ekonomski pogoji
Srednjeroƒçna napoved:
‚Äî Indeks bo verjetno nadaljeval rast, a hitrosti se lahko upoƒçasnijo, ƒçe se ustavi rast zaposlenosti ali se zaƒçnejo kazati znaki upoƒçasnitve v proizvodnem sektorju.
‚Äî Upoƒçasnitev rasti indeksa lahko predhoduje upoƒçasnitev gospodarstva ali padec BDP v naslednjih ƒçetrtletjih.
Napoved temelji na trenutnem trendu rasti, a upo≈°teva, da se lahko gospodarski cikel ZDA leta 2025 vstopi v fazo bolj zmerne ≈°iritve ali celo blizu platoja, glede na zo≈æenje kreditnih pogojev in druge makro-signale. tradingeconomics.com
Kako USPHCI vpliva na trge
Trg delnic
Rast indeksa ‚Üí dober znak za delnice, ≈°e posebej cikliƒçne sektorje (finanƒçne storitve, industrija).
Upoƒçasnitev rasti ali padec ‚Üí lahko signalizira poslab≈°anje poslovne aktivnosti in pritiska na tvegane aktive.
Delnice pogosto reagirajo ne na raven indeksa neposredno, temveƒç na spremembo tempa njegove rasti.
Vpliv na Bitcoin in kriptovalute
USPHCI ni neposreden kazalnik kriptovalut, a vpliva na splo≈°no razpolo≈æenje trga tveganja:
Pozitiven signal (indeks raste, gospodarstvo moƒçno):
‚Äî vlagatelji so nagnjeni k veƒçjemu tveganju ‚Üí kapital se lahko pretaka v tvegane aktive, vkljuƒçno z BTC.
Upoƒçasnitev rasti ali padec:
‚Äî apetit po tveganju se lahko zmanj≈°a ‚Üí vlagatelji gredo v manj tvegane aktive ‚Üí BTC se lahko korigira moƒçneje kot tradicionalni trgi.
Z drugimi besedami, USPHCI pomaga oceniti nastavitev tveganja (risk-on / risk-off), ki je veƒçkrat vplivala na dinamiko kripto-trga.
Povzetek
USPHCI odra≈æa trenutno stanje gospodarstva ZDA na podlagi zaposlenosti, brezposelnosti, proizvodnje in dohodkov. fred.stlouisfed.org
Stanja na december 2025: indeks na zgodovinsko visoki ravni (~148,3), kar ka≈æe na ≈°irijoƒçe se gospodarstvo. tradingeconomics.com
Srednjeroƒçna napoved: mo≈æna nadaljnja rast, a tempi se lahko upoƒçasnijo v pogojih bolj zmernega gospodarskega cikla.
Vpliv na trge in BTC: indeks slu≈æi kot kazalnik apetita po tveganju ‚Äî krepitev podpira tvegane aktive, upoƒçasnitev lahko zmanj≈°uje razpolo≈æenja.
V trgovanju: uporaben kot kazalnik splo≈°nega ekonomskega ozadja in preverjanje moƒçi trenutnega cikla rasti.

extra.en:
Coincident Economic Activity Index (USPHCI) is economic index measuring current US economic activity state. Compiled by Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia based on four key macroeconomic indicators:
Nonfarm payroll employment
Unemployment rate


Average weekly hours in manufacturing
Wages and salaries
These components combined into single index reflecting economic activity level closely tied to real economy state ‚Äî essentially "what's happening now", unlike leading or lagging indicators. fred.stlouisfed.org
Interpretation:
Index growth ‚Üí economy expansion (employment growth, increased activity). Decline or growth slowdown ‚Üí economy slowdown or stagnation beginning. fred.stlouisfed.
extra.si:
Indeks soƒçasne ekonomske aktivnosti (USPHCI) je ekonomski indeks, ki meri trenutno stanje ekonomske aktivnosti v ZDA. Sestavlja ga Federalna rezervna banka Philadelphie na podlagi ≈°tirih kljuƒçnih makroekonomskih kazalnikov:
≈†tevilo zaposlenih izven kmetijstva (nonfarm payroll employment)
Stopnja brezposelnosti


Povpreƒçno ≈°tevilo delovnih ur na teden v proizvodnji
Plaƒçe in nadomestila
Te komponente zdru≈æijo v en sam indeks, ki odra≈æa raven ekonomske aktivnosti, tesno povezano z dejanskim stanjem gospodarstva ‚Äî dejansko ‚Äûkaj se dogaja zdaj", v nasprotju z vodilnimi ali zaostrenimi kazalniki. fred.stlouisfed.org
Interpretacija:
Rast indeksa ‚Üí ≈°iritev gospodarstva (rast zaposlenosti, poveƒçana aktivnost). Padec ali upoƒçasnitev rasti ‚Üí upoƒçasnitev gospodarstva ali zaƒçetek stagnacije. fred.stlouisfed.

text.en:
BDI Baltic Dry Index (BDI). ANALYSIS December 2025
As of end December 2025 BDI is in range ~1,877‚Äì2,294 points, and index showed decline over month after higher levels early December (~2,845). tradingeconomics.com+1
Value context:
Over past year BDI grew ~80‚Äì88% (compared to last December). tradingeconomics.com
BDI historical highs significantly higher (e.g. ~11,793 in 2008), but current levels still considered moderately high compared to weak demand years. tradingeconomics.com
What this means now:
üîπ Index remains at levels substantially exceeding recent lows ‚Üí indicates strong global commodity trade in 2025.
üîπ However December decline indicates correction after earlier strong rally and possibly seasonal slowdown (typical for year-end).
Medium-term forecast
Next 6‚Äì12 months:
Fundamental forecast:
If global economy continues growth ‚Äî BDI may stabilize or even moderately rise, reflecting sustained commodity demand (construction, industry).


If commodity demand weakens (e.g. due to slowdown in China or Europe) ‚Äî BDI may continue correction or consolidate at current levels.
Analyst models and expectations suggest approximately ~1,880‚Äì2,220 by quarter end and/or year, indicating moderately stable demand but without sharp rises. ru.tradingeconomics.com
üîπ Conclusion: BDI remains at level that would be positive signal for world trade growth, but correction and volatility persist depending on commodity demand and global economic cycle.
Market impact
Global markets and commodities
BDI growth often associated with:
Increased manufacturing activity and economic growth.
Higher commodity demand ‚Üí supports commodity and industrial sector stocks.
BDI decline may signal:
Global demand slowdown ‚Üí weakness in industry/trade.
Pressure on commodity and cyclical company stocks.
Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrencies impact
BDI to Bitcoin connection not straightforward, but important correlations exist through market risk sentiment:
When BDI rises:
Reflects strengthening global trade ‚Üí market risk appetite increases.
Higher risk appetite may favor risk asset growth including BTC, especially during 'risk-on' market periods.
When BDI falls:
May indicate economy slowdown ‚Üí investors become cautious.
BTC typically considered risky asset, and during risk-off sentiment may correct stronger than major markets.
Summary: BDI can be used as one of global risk appetite markers, indirectly affecting BTC dynamics combined with other economic indicators.
How to use BDI in trading
1. Global activity indicator
Use BDI to assess global commodity and trade demand:
Sustained BDI growth ‚Üí positive context for risk assets (stocks, commodities, BTC).
BDI slowdown or decline ‚Üí caution and capital protection.
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è BDI reflects dry bulk shipping cost ‚Äî leading indicator of world trade activity and commodity demand.
‚úîÔ∏è December 2025 index in ~2,000 points range after correction from highs (~2,845), remaining substantially higher than year ago.
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term forecast: relatively stable levels with possible moderate correction or consolidation, depending on global commodity demand.
‚úîÔ∏è Impact: BDI growth supports risk appetite and cyclical markets; decline may warn of slowdown.
‚úîÔ∏è For trading: BDI useful as leading indicator of global demand and combined with other data may help predict market cycles and risks.
text.si:
BDI Balti suhi indeks (BDI). ANALIZA december 2025
Konec decembra 2025 je BDI v obmoƒçju ~1.877‚Äì2.294 toƒçk, indeks pa je v mesecu dni pokazal padec po vi≈°jih nivojih na zaƒçetku decembra (~2.845). tradingeconomics.com+1
Kontekst vrednosti:
V zadnjem letu se je BDI poveƒçal za ~80‚Äì88 % (v primerjavi z decembrom lani). tradingeconomics.com
Zgodovinski maksimumi BDI so bistveno vi≈°ji (npr. ~11.793 leta 2008), a trenutne ravni ≈°e vedno veljajo za zmerno visoke v primerjavi z leti ≈°ibkega povpra≈°evanja. tradingeconomics.com
Kaj to pomeni zdaj:
üîπ Indeks ostaja na nivojih, ki bistveno presegajo nedavna minima ‚Üí ka≈æe na moƒçno globalno trgovino s surovinami v 2025.
üîπ Vendar padec v decembru ka≈æe na korekcijo po prej moƒçnem raliju in morda sezonsko upoƒçasnitev (znaƒçilno za konec leta).
Srednjeroƒçna napoved
Naslednjih 6‚Äì12 mesecev:
Fundamentalna napoved:
ƒåe globalno gospodarstvo nadaljuje rast ‚Äî se lahko BDI stabilizira ali celo zmerno dvigne, odra≈æajoƒç stabilno povpra≈°evanje po surovinah (gradbeni≈°tvo, industrija).


ƒåe povpra≈°evanje po surovinah oslabi (npr. zaradi upoƒçasnitve na Kitajskem ali v Evropi) ‚Äî se lahko BDI nadaljuje korekcijo ali konsolidira na trenutnih nivojih.
Modeli in priƒçakovanja analitikov nakazujejo pribli≈æno ~1.880‚Äì2.220 do konca ƒçetrtletja in/ali ƒçez leto, kar ka≈æe na zmerno stabilno povpra≈°evanje, a brez ostrih dvigov. ru.tradingeconomics.com
üîπ Zakljuƒçek: BDI ostaja na nivoju, ki bi bil pozitiven signal za rast svetovne trgovine, a korekcija in nihljivost ostajata odvisni od povpra≈°evanja po surovinah in globalnega gospodarskega cikla.
Vpliv na trge
Globalni trgi in surovine
Rast BDI pogosto povezujejo z:
Poveƒçano proizvodno aktivnostjo in gospodarsko rastjo.
Vi≈°jim povpra≈°evanjem po surovinah ‚Üí podpora delnicam surovin in industrijskih sektorjev.
Padec BDI lahko signalizira:
Upoƒçasnitev globalnega povpra≈°evanja ‚Üí ≈°ibkost v industriji/trgovini.
Pritisk na delnice surovin in cikliƒçnih podjetij.
Vpliv na bitcoin (BTC) in kriptovalute
Povezava BDI z bitcoino ni linearna, a obstajajo pomembne korelacije prek tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj tveganja:
Ko BDI raste:
To odra≈æa krepitev globalne trgovine ‚Üí apetit po tveganju na trgih nara≈°ƒça.
Vi≈°ji apetit po tveganju lahko ugodno vpliva na rast tveganih aktivov, vkljuƒçno z BTC, ≈°e posebej v obdobjih trga ‚Äûrisk-on".
Ko BDI pada:
To lahko ka≈æe na gospodarsko upoƒçasnitev ‚Üí vlagatelji postanejo previdni.
BTC velja za tvegani aktiv, v ƒçasu risk-off razpolo≈æenj pa se lahko korigira moƒçneje kot glavni trgi.
Povzetek: BDI lahko slu≈æi kot eden markerjev globalnega apetita po tveganju, ki posredno vpliva na dinamiko BTC v kombinaciji z drugimi ekonomskimi kazalniki.
Kako uporabiti BDI v trgovanju
1. Kazalnik globalne aktivnosti
Uporabljajte BDI za oceno globalnega povpra≈°evanja po surovinah in trgovini:
Stabilna rast BDI ‚Üí pozitiven kontekst za tvegane aktive (delnice, surovine, BTC).
Upoƒçasnitev ali padec BDI ‚Üí previdnost in za≈°ƒçita kapitala.
Povzetek
‚úîÔ∏è BDI odra≈æa stro≈°ke prevoza suhih bulkov ‚Äî vodilni kazalnik aktivnosti svetovne trgovine in povpra≈°evanja po surovinah.
‚úîÔ∏è December 2025 je indeks v obmoƒçju ~2.000 toƒçk po korekciji z maksimumov (~2.845), ostaja bistveno vi≈°ji kot pred letom.
‚úîÔ∏è Srednjeroƒçna napoved: relativno stabilni nivoji z mo≈æno zmerno korekcijo ali konsolidacijo, odvisno od globalnega povpra≈°evanja po surovinah.
‚úîÔ∏è Vpliv: rast BDI podpira apetit po tveganju in cikliƒçne trge; padec lahko opozarja na upoƒçasnitev.
‚úîÔ∏è Za trgovanje: BDI uporaben kot vodilni kazalnik globalnega povpra≈°evanja in v kombinaciji z drugimi podatki pomaga napovedovati tr≈æne cikle in tveganja.

extra.en:
BDI Baltic Dry Index (BDI) is shipping cost index for dry bulk cargoes (coal, ore, grain and other basic raw materials) on major world trade routes. Calculated by Baltic Exchange in London based on freight rates for different vessel classes (Capesize, Panamax, Supramax). 
Why important:
Index reflects raw material shipping demand closely tied to global economic activity and industrial production. 
Since BDI reflects actual freight rates (without speculative influences), often considered leading indicator of economic activity and global commodity demand. 
Key conclusion:
BDI growth ‚Üí signs of strengthening economic activity and commodity demand.
BDI decline ‚Üí possible weakening of global trade and production.
extra.si:
BDI Balti suhi indeks (BDI) je indeks stro≈°kov pomorskih prevozov suhih navljuƒçnih tovorov (premogi, rude, ≈æito in druge osnovne surovine) po glavnih svetovnih trgovskih poteh. Izraƒçunava ga Balti≈°ka borza (Baltic Exchange) v Londonu na podlagi f—Ä–∞—Ötnih tarif za razliƒçne razrede ladij (Capesize, Panamax, Supramax). 
Zakaj je pomemben:
Indeks odra≈æa povpra≈°evanje po prevozih surovin, ki je tesno povezano z globalno gospodarsko aktivnostjo in industrijsko proizvodnjo. 
Ker BDI odra≈æa dejanske f—Ä–∞—Ötne tarife (brez ≈°pekulativnih vplivov), ga pogosto obravnavajo kot vodilni kazalnik gospodarske aktivnosti in globalnega povpra≈°evanja po surovinah. 
Kljuƒçni zakljuƒçek:
Rast BDI ‚Üí znaki krepitve gospodarske aktivnosti in povpra≈°evanja po surovinah.
Padec BDI ‚Üí mo≈æno oslabljanje globalne trgovine in proizvodnje.

text.en:
Copper-to-Gold Ratio. Analysis December 2025
According to market data, copper-to-gold ratio in 2025 is at historically low levels, substantially below recent years' averages. Reuters+1
Why this happens:
Gold grows strongly: due to geopolitical uncertainty, sustained safe-haven demand and expectations of central bank policy easing. incomein.biz+1
Copper behaves less consistently: industrial demand supported but ratio relative to gold remains low. AIMSCAP
Low Copper/Gold Ratio at current stage indicates market leaning toward caution or risk-off sentiment, even if economy not necessarily in recession ‚Äî reflects increased demand for safe assets. Reuters
Medium-term forecast
Macroeconomic context
Medium-term perspective (6‚Äì12 months) can expect following scenarios:
Gold growth trend strengthening ‚Äî possible continuation of slower copper growth relative to gold if geopolitical risks, weak industrial data or investor safe-haven orientation persists. Reuters
Return to higher Copper/Gold Ratio possible if:
industrial activity strengthens (construction, industry, infrastructure); AJ Bell Investcentre
copper demand surges due to large-scale energy projects and electrification; Discovery Alert
gold stabilizes or corrects after prolonged growth. AIMSCAP
Medium-term forecast: ratio may remain low or show moderate recovery if fundamental copper demand strengthens with industrial cycle recovery. Discovery Alert
Market impact
Stocks and economic cycles
High ratio (copper growth vs gold) usually reflects expectations of accelerating economic growth and supports cyclical stocks. AJ Bell Investcentre
Low ratio signals relative fear or uncertainty, typically accompanied by increased market volatility and lower risk appetite. Reuters
Bitcoin (BTC) impact
How indirectly affects
Copper/Gold Ratio itself doesn't directly determine Bitcoin price, but reflects investor sentiment and risk appetite:
Low ratio ‚Üí investors seek refuge ‚Üí risk appetite decline
‚Äî BTC, as risky asset, may correct stronger when demand for risk-free assets grows. Reuters
Ratio growth (if starts increasing) ‚Üí signal of improving economic expectations and risk appetite ‚Üí may support BTC and other risky assets.
In practice Copper/Gold Ratio works as meta-risk marker, not direct Bitcoin trading signal.
How to use Copper/Gold Ratio in trading
1) Overall risk appetite indicator
Copper-to-gold ratio helps understand if markets oriented toward growth or protection:
Ratio growth ‚Üí risk appetite grows ‚Üí favorable for stocks, commodities and crypto. Discovery Alert
Ratio decline ‚Üí risk appetite falls ‚Üí preference for safe assets. Reuters
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è Copper-to-Gold Ratio ‚Äî simple but powerful macro-barometer of market sentiment: industrial growth vs safety. Discovery Alert
‚úîÔ∏è December 2025 ratio near historically low values ‚Äî gold grows stronger than copper, reflecting market risk caution. Reuters
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term: expected either continuation of low levels or possible moderate recovery with strengthening industrial copper demand. Discovery Alert
‚úîÔ∏è Markets and BTC: low ratio usually reflects declining risk appetite, may pressure BTC; ratio growth ‚Äî opposite. AJ Bell Investcentre

Razmerje baker-zlato. Analiza december 2025
Po podatkih trgov je razmerje med bakrom in zlatom leta 2025 na zgodovinsko nizkih nivojih, bistveno pod povpreƒçnimi vrednostmi zadnjih let. Reuters+1
Zakaj se to dogaja:
Zlato moƒçno raste: zaradi geopolitiƒçne negotovosti, stabilnega povpra≈°evanja po zatoƒçi≈°ƒçih in priƒçakovanj omilitve politike centralnih bank. incomein.biz+1
Baker se obna≈°a manj nedvoumno: industrijsko povpra≈°evanje je podprto, a razmerje glede na zlato ostaja nizko. AIMSCAP
Nizko razmerje Copper/Gold v trenutni fazi ka≈æe, da se trg nagiba k previdnosti ali risk-off razpolo≈æenju, ƒçetudi gospodarstvo morda ni v recesiji ‚Äî to odra≈æa poveƒçano povpra≈°evanje po varnih aktivih. Reuters
Srednjeroƒçna napoved
Makroekonomski kontekst
V srednjeroƒçni perspektivi (6‚Äì12 mesecev) lahko priƒçakujemo naslednje scenarije:
Krepitev trenda rasti zlata ‚Äî mo≈æna nadaljevanje poƒçasnej≈°e rasti bakra glede na zlato, ƒçe geopolitiƒçni riziki, ≈°ibki industrijski podatki ali usmerjenost vlagateljev v zatoƒçi≈°ƒça vztrajajo. Reuters
Povratek k vi≈°jemu razmerju Copper/Gold mo≈æen, ƒçe:
industrijska aktivnost se okrepi (gradbeni≈°tvo, industrija, infrastruktura); AJ Bell Investcentre
povpra≈°evanje po bakru naraste zaradi obse≈ænih energetskih projektov in elektrifikacije; Discovery Alert
zlato se stabilizira ali korigira po dolgotrajni rasti. AIMSCAP
Srednjeroƒçna napoved: razmerje lahko ostane nizko ali poka≈æe zmerno okrevanje, ƒçe se fundamentalno povpra≈°evanje po bakru okrepi z okrevanjem industrijskih ciklov. Discovery Alert
Vpliv na trge
Delnice in ekonomski cikli
Visoko razmerje (rast bakra vs zlato) obiƒçajno odra≈æa priƒçakovanja pospe≈°ene gospodarske rasti in podpira cikliƒçne delnice. AJ Bell Investcentre
Nizko razmerje signalizira relativni strah ali negotovost, kar tipiƒçno spremlja poveƒçana nihljivost na trgih in manj≈°i apetit po tveganju. Reuters
Vpliv na bitcoin (BTC)
Kako posredno vpliva
Razmerje Copper/Gold samo po sebi neposredno ne doloƒça cene bitcoina, a odra≈æa razpolo≈æenja vlagateljev in apetit po tveganju:
Nizko razmerje ‚Üí vlagatelji i≈°ƒçejo zatoƒçi≈°ƒçe ‚Üí padec apetita po tveganju
‚Äî BTC, kot tvegani aktiv, se lahko korigira moƒçneje, ko nara≈°ƒça povpra≈°evanje po brezrizikovih aktivih. Reuters
Rast razmerja (ƒçe zaƒçne nara≈°ƒçati) ‚Üí signal izbolj≈°anja gospodarskih priƒçakovanj in apetita po tveganju ‚Üí to lahko podpira BTC in druge tvegane aktive.
V praksi razmerje Copper/Gold deluje kot meta-marker tveganja, ne kot neposreden trgovalni signal bitcoina.
Kako uporabiti razmerje Copper/Gold v trgovanju
1) Splo≈°ni kazalnik apetita po tveganju
Razmerje med bakrom in zlatom pomaga razumeti, ali so trgi usmerjeni v rast ali za≈°ƒçito:
Rast razmerja ‚Üí apetit po tveganju nara≈°ƒça ‚Üí ugodno za delnice, surovine in kripto. Discovery Alert
Padec razmerja ‚Üí apetit po tveganju pada ‚Üí prednost varnim aktivom. Reuters
Povzetek
‚úîÔ∏è Razmerje Copper-to-Gold ‚Äî preprosto, a moƒçno makro-barometer tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj: industrijska rast vs varnost. Discovery Alert
‚úîÔ∏è December 2025 razmerje blizu zgodovinsko nizkim vrednostim ‚Äî zlato raste moƒçneje kot baker, kar odra≈æa tr≈æno previdnost pred tveganjem. Reuters
‚úîÔ∏è Srednjeroƒçno priƒçakovano bodisi nadaljevanje nizkih nivojev bodisi mo≈æno zmerno okrevanje ob krepitvi industrijskega povpra≈°evanja po bakru. Discovery Alert
‚úîÔ∏è Trgi in BTC: nizko razmerje obiƒçajno odra≈æa padec apetita po tveganju, kar lahko pritiska na BTC; rast razmerja ‚Äî nasprotno. AJ Bell Investcentre

extra.en:
Copper-to-Gold Ratio is simple economic indicator calculated as copper price ratio to gold price. Reflects balance between industrial demand (copper) and safety/fear on markets (gold). Discovery Alert
Copper ‚Äî industrial metal whose price closely tied to economic activity, construction and industrial demand. AJ Bell Investcentre
Gold ‚Äî traditional safe-haven investors seek during uncertainty, financial stress or low real rates. AJ Bell Investcentre
Interpretation:
Rising ratio ‚Üí copper appreciates faster than gold ‚Üí markets assess economic growth, high risk appetite (risk-on). Discovery Alert
Falling ratio ‚Üí gold grows faster than copper ‚Üí rising fear/uncertainty, deteriorating economic expectations (risk-off). Makes this indicator useful barometer of economic cycles and investor sentiment.

text.en:
Consumer Price Index. ANALYSIS December 2025
As of end November 2025 inflation (CPI YoY) was approximately ~2.7% ‚Äî lower than previous months and below recent years' average. TradingView
‚Ä¢ Data indicates inflation slowdown compared to early and mid-2025 when it fluctuated around 3% and higher. TradingView
This means inflation has substantially decreased compared to previous periods, approaching Fed target level around 2%. TradingView

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months)
To assess medium-term inflation outlook for USIRYY, need to consider main forces affecting prices:
üîπ If inflation continues declining (or stays stable around 2‚Äì3%):
‚úîÔ∏è Fed may slow or stop policy tightening (rates stop rising).
‚úîÔ∏è Real interest rates may become more neutral or even slightly softer.
‚úîÔ∏è This usually favorable for stocks and cryptocurrencies as stimulates risk appetite.
If inflation accelerates again:
Fed may return to stricter policy (higher reserve rate), which may pressure markets.
Likely medium-term scenario (2026):
‚Äî inflation will remain in ~2%‚Äì3% range, possible moderate fluctuation depending on energy prices, rental rates and supply chains.
‚Äî Core CPI (excluding volatile components) may remain slightly above 2%. TradingView

How USIRYY affects markets
Stocks
Low/moderate inflation (2‚Äì3%) ‚Üí reduces pressure on corporate profits ‚Üí more favorable environment for stocks.
Rising inflation ‚Üí may push Fed toward tightening ‚Üí negative for stock market.
Bonds
Inflation decline usually leads to bond yield decline as market adjusts future rate expectations.
Inflation growth raises yields and lowers bond prices.
Dollar and FX
‚Äî Low inflation and soft policy prospects ‚Üí dollar weakening.
‚Äî Inflation growth ‚Üí dollar strengthening (as inflation risk compensation).

Bitcoin (BTC) impact
USIRYY indicator connection with BTC (and cryptocurrencies) not direct but significant through risk market sentiment and monetary policy mechanism:
When inflation moderate or declining:
‚úîÔ∏è Markets assess soft monetary policy prospects.
‚úîÔ∏è This improves risk appetite, facilitating capital inflow to risk assets including BTC.
When inflation accelerates:
‚Äî Fed may raise rates, typically reducing risk appetite.
‚Äî BTC, as risky asset, may correct stronger than safer markets.
Thus USIRYY helps determine monetary policy context and risk appetite which historically affects cryptocurrency dynamics.

How to use USIRYY in trading
1. Monetary policy cycles assessment
Inflation decline ‚Üí signal Fed may slow rate hikes ‚Üí favorable for risk assets.


Inflation acceleration ‚Üí signal potential tightening ‚Üí caution in risk positions.
Bullish for risk assets (BTC, stocks):
‚Äî inflation stays low or falls ‚Üí soft policy expectations.
Bearish for risk assets:
‚Äî inflation unexpectedly grows or bounces above target levels ‚Üí pressure on interest rates.
USIRYY is annual US inflation level (CPI YoY).
‚Äî reflects actual inflationary pressure in economy. TradingView
December 2025 state:
‚Äî inflation at ~2.7% level, lower than previous levels and close to Fed target. TradingView
Medium-term forecast:
‚Äî inflation likely remain moderate (2-3%) next 6-12 months, absent major shocks.
Market impact:
‚Äî moderate inflation supports risk assets, rate pressure eases.
‚Äî sharp inflation growth may pressure stocks and risk assets.
On BTC:
‚Äî low inflation and soft policy usually contribute to BTC growth through risk appetite increase.
‚Äî inflation growth leads to tightening conditions ‚Äî crypto correction potential.
text.si:
Indeks cen potro≈°nikov. ANALIZA december 2025
Konec novembra 2025 je inflacija (CPI YoY) zna≈°ala pribli≈æno ~2,7 % ‚Äî ni≈æje kot v preteklih mesecih in pod povpreƒçjem zadnjih let. TradingView
‚Ä¢ Podatki ka≈æejo na upoƒçasnitev inflacije v primerjavi z zaƒçetkom in sredi leta 2025, ko je nihala okoli 3 % in vi≈°je. TradingView
To pomeni, da se je inflacija bistveno zmanj≈°ala v primerjavi s preteklimi obdobji, pribli≈æuje se ciljni ravni Fed-a okoli 2 %. TradingView

Srednjeroƒçna napoved (6‚Äì12 mesecev)
Za oceno srednjeroƒçnih perspektiv inflacije USIRYY je treba upo≈°tevati glavne sile, ki vplivajo na cene:
üîπ ƒåe inflacija nadaljuje padanje (ali ostane stabilna okoli 2‚Äì3 %):
‚úîÔ∏è Fed lahko upoƒçasni ali ustavi zaostrovanje politike (obrestne mere prenehajo rasti).
‚úîÔ∏è Realne obrestne mere postanejo bolj nevtralne ali celo rahlo mehkej≈°e.
‚úîÔ∏è To je obiƒçajno ugodno za delnice in kriptovalute, saj spodbuja apetit po tveganju.
ƒåe inflacija spet pospe≈°i:
Fed se lahko vrne k stro≈æji politiki (vi≈°ja rezervna stopnja), kar lahko pritiska na trge.
Verjeten srednjeroƒçni scenarij (2026):
‚Äî inflacija bo ostala v obmoƒçju ~2 %‚Äì3 %, mo≈æna zmerna nihanja glede na cene energentov, najemnin in dobavnih verig.
‚Äî Core CPI (brez nestabilnih komponent) lahko ostane rahlo nad 2 %. TradingView

Kako USIRYY vpliva na trge
Delnice
Nizka/zmerna inflacija (2‚Äì3 %) ‚Üí zmanj≈°uje pritisk na korporativne dobiƒçke ‚Üí bolj ugodno okolje za delnice.
Rastaƒça inflacija ‚Üí lahko potiska Fed k zaostritvi ‚Üí negativno za borzni trg.
Obveznice
Padec inflacije obiƒçajno vodi k padcu donosnosti obveznic, saj trg prilagaja priƒçakovanja glede prihodnjih mer.
Rast inflacije zvi≈°uje donosnosti in zni≈æuje cene obveznic.
Dolar in FX
‚Äî Nizka inflacija in perspektive mehke politike ‚Üí oslabitev dolarja.
‚Äî Rast inflacije ‚Üí krepitev dolarja (kot nadomestilo inflacijskega tveganja).

Vpliv na bitcoin (BTC)
Povezava kazalnika USIRYY z BTC (in kriptovalutami) ni neposredna, a pomembna prek mehanizma razpolo≈æenj na trgih tveganja in monetarne politike:
Ko je inflacija zmerna ali pada:
‚úîÔ∏è Trgi ocenjujejo perspektivo mehke monetarne politike.
‚úîÔ∏è To izbolj≈°uje apetit po tveganju, spodbuja priliv kapitala v tvegane aktive, vkljuƒçno z BTC.
Ko inflacija pospe≈°i:
‚Äî Fed lahko zvi≈°uje mere, kar obiƒçajno zmanj≈°uje apetit po tveganju.
‚Äî BTC, kot tvegani aktiv, se lahko korigira moƒçneje kot varnej≈°i trgi.
Torej USIRYY pomaga doloƒçiti kontekst monetarne politike in apetita po tveganju, ki zgodovinsko vpliva na dinamiko kriptovalut.

Kako uporabiti USIRYY v trgovanju
1. Ocena ciklov monetarne politike
Padec inflacije ‚Üí signal, da lahko Fed upoƒçasni zvi≈°evanje mer ‚Üí ugodno za tvegane aktive.


Pospe≈°ek inflacije ‚Üí signal potencialne zaostritve ‚Üí previdnost pri tveganih pozicijah.
Bullish za tvegane aktive (BTC, delnice):
‚Äî inflacija ostaja nizka ali pada ‚Üí priƒçakovanja mehke politike.
Bearish za tvegane aktive:
‚Äî inflacija nepriƒçakovano raste ali odskoƒçi nad ciljne nivoje ‚Üí pritisk na obrestne mere.
USIRYY je letna raven inflacije v ZDA (CPI YoY).
‚Äî odra≈æa dejansko inflacijsko pritiskanje v gospodarstvu. TradingView
Stanja na december 2025:
‚Äî inflacija na nivoju okoli ~2,7 %, ni≈æje kot prej≈°nje ravni in blizu cilja Fed-a. TradingView
Srednjeroƒçna napoved:
‚Äî inflacija bo verjetno ostala zmerna (2-3 %) naslednjih 6-12 mesecev, ob odsotnosti moƒçnih ≈°okov.
Vpliv na trge:
‚Äî zmerna inflacija podpira tvegane aktive, pritisk na mere oslabi.
‚Äî ostri porast inflacije lahko pritiska na delnice in tvegane aktive.
Na BTC:
‚Äî nizka inflacija in mehka politika obiƒçajno prispevata k rasti BTC prek poveƒçanja apetita po tveganju.
‚Äî rast inflacije vodi k zaostritvi pogojev ‚Äî potencial korekcije kripto.

Consumer Price Index ‚Äî CPI YoY (USIRYY) is ticker denoting annual US inflation level (Consumer Price Index ‚Äî CPI YoY), i.e. percentage change in consumer prices over last 12 months measured by consumer price index (CPI). Main CPI considered key inflation indicator watched by economists, markets and central banks as reflects cost of living change for consumers. TradingView
Simply: USIRYY shows how much prices of goods and services rose in US compared to same period year ago. Main indicator of inflationary pressure in economy.
extra.si:
Indeks cen potro≈°nikov ‚Äî CPI YoY (USIRYY) je ticker, ki oznaƒçuje letno raven inflacije v ZDA (Consumer Price Index ‚Äî CPI YoY), tj. odstotno spremembo cen potro≈°nikov v zadnjih 12 mesecih, merjeno z indeksom cen potro≈°nikov (CPI). Glavni CPI velja za kljuƒçni kazalnik inflacije, ki ga spremljajo ekonomisti, trgi in centralne banke, saj odra≈æa spremembo stro≈°kov ≈æivljenja za potro≈°nike. TradingView
Preprosto: USIRYY prikazuje, za koliko so se v ZDA zvi≈°ale cene blaga in storitev v primerjavi z istim obdobjem lani. Glavni kazalnik inflacijskega pritiska v gospodarstvu.
