text.en:
Current market state (facts as of today)
Price
Current Bitcoin price around $91,000‚Äì$92,000 after attempts to break above $93,000 and a slight correction. Since the beginning of the year, upward movement has been observed with resistance at key levels and market focus on the range.
Trading Volume
Volume remains relatively stable but without extreme spikes, characteristic of consolidation phase after the start of the year. Increase in spot sector volumes was noticeable during attempts to grow above nearby resistances.
Open Interest
Data from aggregators shows that Bitcoin futures open interest is at a high level (around 640,000‚Äì650,000 BTC, equivalent to tens of billions of dollars), but in recent days there has been a slightly moderate reduction (OI decrease), interpreted as "controlled deleveraging" without sharp sell-offs.
On individual exchanges OI remains significant, but recent changes indicate that some traders are moderately reducing risk ‚Äî this is not panic liquidation, but rather partial position closure (de-risking).

Price, Volume, and Open Interest Interaction
Price and Volume
‚Äî Volume supports recent upward movements, indicating that growth is confirmed by trading activity, not weak volume background. This is a positive moment.
Open Interest and Price
‚Äî High OI plus price growth ‚Äî usually a sign that new capital is entering the market.
‚Äî Slight OI reduction in recent days with price movements folded in range indicates partial position closure by traders, which may reduce short-term volatility and price pressure. However, OI level still remains high, meaning interest in derivatives persists.

Movement Forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Current data indicates range movement with upward bias, but without impulsive breakout of levels above $93,000‚Äì$95,000.
If price holds above key supports (approximately $88,000‚Äì$90,000) with stable volume, this could shift balance toward recovery of buyer interest.
Slight OI reduction indicates that part of risky positions is already closed. This may reduce probability of strong correction, but also potential for sharp rise without new capital inflow.
Short-term trend: sideways with potential upward bias, but fluctuations in current levels range possible.

Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months)
If in coming weeks:
OI starts growing again against price growth,
volumes continue supporting movement above local resistance,
then medium-term transition to more sustainable uptrend possible, with repeated attempt to attack levels above $100,000, which previously represented significant psychological and technical levels.
If volume doesn't continue growing and OI keeps declining further, this may indicate momentum fading and longer consolidation in range.
Medium-term trend: neutral-bullish, with volume and OI growth confirmation.

Long-term (6+ months)
Long-term open interest remains high in historical context, indicating preservation of significant interest from derivative traders and institutional participants, even despite correction periods in 2025.
If global macroeconomic liquidity background remains favorable and institutional flows continue into BTC (through spot ETFs and derivative instruments), this creates foundation for sustainable growth in long-term perspective.
Long-term trend: overall bullish, but with correction periods and consolidation phase due to cyclical market nature.

How this reflects on markets
Bitcoin consolidation phase reflects current balance between spot and derivative strategies. OI concentration at high levels with stable volumes indicates that large participants haven't "left the market", but also not forcing risk expansion.
For traditional markets such cryptocurrency risk dynamics often correlates with increased caution in risky assets overall.

Practical analysis summary
Price holds in range above resistances, volume sufficient to maintain current range.
Open interest remains high, OI fluctuations indicate not panic, but controlled partial position closure ‚Äî this stabilizes market short-term.
Short-term consolidation likely with moderate growth potential above current levels with volume confirmation.
Medium-term reversal to more confident upward tendency possible with volume growth and rising OI recovery.
Long-term institutional traders interest and high OI historically correlate with Bitcoin upward dynamics continuation.
text.si:
Trenutno stanje trga ( dejstva za danes)
Cena
Trenutna cena Bitcoina okoli 91.000‚Äì92.000 $, po poskusih preboja nad 93.000 $ in rahli korekciji. Od zaƒçetka leta opazujemo gibanje navzgor z odporom na kljuƒçnih nivojih in osredotoƒçenost trga na obmoƒçju.
Obseg trgovanja
Obseg ostaja relativno stabilen, vendar brez ekstremnih skokov, kar je znaƒçilno za fazo konsolidacije po zaƒçetku leta. Poveƒçanje obsega v spot sektorju je bilo opazno pri poskusih rasti nad bli≈ænje odboje.
Odprti obseg
Podatki z agregatorjev ka≈æejo, da je odprti obseg Bitcoinovih terminskih pogodb na visoki ravni (pribli≈æno 640.000‚Äì650.000 BTC, kar ustreza desetinam milijard dolarjev), vendar v zadnjih dneh opazujemo rahlo zmerno zmanj≈°anje (padec OI), kar se razlaga kot ‚Äûkontrolirano zmanj≈°anje vzvoda‚Äú brez ostrih prodaj.
Na posameznih borzah OI ostaja pomemben, vendar zadnje spremembe ka≈æejo, da del trgovcev zmerno zmanj≈°uje tveganje ‚Äî to ni paniƒçna likvidacija, temveƒç bolj parcialno zapiranje pozicij (zmanj≈°evanje tveganja).

Interakcija cene, obsega in odprtega obsega
Cena in obseg
‚Äî Obseg podpira nedavna gibanja navzgor, kar ka≈æe, da rast potrjuje trgovalna aktivnost, ne ≈°ibek obse≈æni ozadje. To je pozitiven trenutek.
Odprti obseg in cena
‚Äî Visok OI plus rast cene ‚Äî obiƒçajno znak, da v trg vstopa nov kapital.
‚Äî Rahlo zmanj≈°anje OI v zadnjih dneh pri zlo≈ænih gibanjih cene v obmoƒçju ka≈æe na parcialno zapiranje pozicij trgovcev, kar lahko zmanj≈°a kratkoroƒçno nihanje in pritisk na ceno. Vendar raven OI ≈°e vedno ostaja visoka, kar pomeni, da zanimanje za derivate vztraja.

Napoved gibanja
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
Trenutni podatki ka≈æejo na obmoƒçno gibanje z navzgor usmerjeno pristranskostjo, vendar brez impulzivnega preboja nivojev nad 93.000‚Äì95.000 $.
ƒåe se cena zadr≈æi nad kljuƒçnimi podporami (pribli≈æno 88.000‚Äì90.000 $) pri stabilnem obsegu, lahko to premakne ravnote≈æje proti obnovi zanimanja kupcev.
Rahlo zmanj≈°anje OI ka≈æe, da je del tveganih pozicij ≈æe zaprt. To lahko zmanj≈°a verjetnost moƒçne korekcije, hkrati pa tudi potencial za ostri dvig brez novega pretoka kapitala.
Kratkoroƒçni trend: stranski z potencialno navzgor usmerjeno pristranskostjo, mo≈æna nihanja v obmoƒçju trenutnih nivojev.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì3 mesece)
ƒåe v prihajajoƒçih tednih:
OI spet zaƒçne rasti na ozadju rasti cene,
obsegi nadaljujejo podporo gibanja nad lokalnim odporom,
bo srednjeroƒçno mo≈æna prehod v bolj vzdr≈æen vzponi trend, z ponovnim poskusom napada nivojev nad 100.000 $, ki so v preteklosti predstavljali pomembne psiholo≈°ke in tehniƒçne nivoje.
ƒåe obseg ne bo nadaljeval rasti in OI se bo nadalje zmanj≈°eval, to lahko ka≈æe na uga≈°anje impulza in dalj≈°o konsolidacijo v obmoƒçju.
Srednjeroƒçni trend: nevtralno-bikovski, ob potrditvi rasti obsega in OI.

Dolgooroƒçno (6+ mesecev)
Dolgooroƒçno odprti obseg ostaja visok v zgodovinskem kontekstu, kar ka≈æe na ohranjanje pomembnega zanimanja derivatnih trgovcev in institucionalnih udele≈æencev, kljub obdobjem korekcij v letu 2025.
ƒåe bo globalno makroekonomsko ozadje likvidnosti ostalo ugodno in institucionalni tokovi ≈°e naprej vstopajo v BTC (prek spot ETF in derivatnih instrumentov), bo to ustvarilo temelj za vzdr≈æno rast v dolgoroƒçni perspektivi.
Dolgooroƒçni trend: v celoti bikovski, vendar z obdobji korekcij in fazo konsolidacije zaradi cikliƒçne narave trga.

Kako se to odra≈æa na trgih
Faza konsolidacije Bitcoina odra≈æa trenutno ravnote≈æje med spot in derivatnimi strategijami. Koncentracija OI na visokih nivojih pri stabilnih obsegih ka≈æe, da veliki udele≈æenci ‚Äûniso zapustili trga‚Äú, vendar tudi ne prisiljujejo ≈°iritve tveganja.
Za tradicionalne trge tak≈°na dinamika kripto tveganja pogosto korelira z veƒçjo previdnostjo v tveganih sredstvih na splo≈°no.

Praktiƒçni povzetek analize
Cena se zadr≈æuje v obmoƒçju nad odboji, obseg zadostuje za ohranjanje trenutnega obmoƒçja.
Odprti obseg ostaja visok, nihanja OI ka≈æejo ne paniƒçno, temveƒç kontrolirano zapiranje dela pozicij ‚Äî to stabilizira trg kratkoroƒçno.
Kratkoroƒçno verjetna konsolidacija z mo≈ænostjo zmerne rasti nad trenutne nivoje ob potrditvi obsega.
Srednjeroƒçno preobrat k bolj samozavestni nara≈°ƒçajoƒçi tendenci mo≈æen ob rasti obsega in obnovi nara≈°ƒçajoƒçega OI.
Dolgooroƒçno zanimanje institucionalnih trgovcev in visok OI zgodovinsko korelirata z nadaljevanjem nara≈°ƒçajoƒçe dinamike Bitcoina.

extra.en:
1. Bitcoin Price
What it is
Bitcoin price is the last transaction price on spot or derivative market. It reflects demand and supply balance at the given moment.
Fundamental meaning
Price is the ultimate consequence of all factors:
macroeconomics and liquidity,
on-chain activity,
speculative demand,
institutional flows,
market expectations and psychology.
Price itself doesn't explain movement causes, but only records the result.

2. Volume
What it is
Volume is the amount of Bitcoin (or contracts) traded over a period of time:
spot ‚Äî real BTC,
futures ‚Äî contracts.
Fundamental meaning
Volume shows:
capital participation degree,
price movement interest strength,
trend confirmation or weakness.
High volume means price movement supported by real trades, not random volatility.

3. Open Interest
What it is
Open Interest is the total number of open derivative contracts (futures) that haven't been closed or liquidated yet.
Important:
this is not number of trades,
this is volume of "unclosed bets" on future price.
Fundamental meaning
Open Interest reflects:
speculative participation level,
leverage concentration,
potential energy for impulsive movements.
Open Interest growth means new capital entering market or increased leverage usage.

4. Price, Volume, and Open Interest Relationship
Basic logic
These three indicators form market structure:
Price shows direction
Volume confirms strength
Open Interest shows risk and tension
Key combinations
Price up + Volume up + Open Interest up
New capital entering market
Trend considered healthy
Movement support by real participants
Price up + Volume down
Movement losing support
False breakout possible
Higher reversal risk
Price up + Open Interest down
Shorts closing (short squeeze)
Movement may be short-term
Often observed at impulse end
Price down + Open Interest up
Shorts accumulation
Higher short squeeze risk on sharp reversal
Market becomes unstable
Price down + Open Interest down
Capitulation
Position closure
Often local bottom formation

5. How used in forecasts
Market phase definition
OI and volume growth ‚Äî accumulation or distribution phase
OI decline ‚Äî impulse completion
Extreme OI values ‚Äî potential volatility signal
Reversal points search
Sharp Open Interest jumps often precede:
cascading liquidations,
impulse movements,
trend reversals.
Trend confirmation
Any sustainable trend must be accompanied by:
stable or growing volume,
controlled Open Interest growth.

6. Trading usage
Medium-term trading
OI analysis for market overload understanding
False breakouts filtering
Trend sustainability assessment
Short-term trading
Liquidation zones search
Impulse work after sharp OI growth
Squeeze scenarios trading
Risk management
High OI + high volatility = increased risk
Sharp OI decline = speculators exit, impulse reduction

7. Indicator limitations
Open Interest doesn't show position direction
Volume can be distorted by wash-trading
Price reacts faster than metrics.
Summary
Price, volume, and open interest form Bitcoin fundamental market structure.
Price shows result
Volume confirms movement strength
Open Interest reflects risk, leverage, and volatility potential
Their joint analysis allows:
market phase understanding,
trend sustainability assessment,
 high-risk points identification,
forecasts and position management quality improvement.
extra.si:
1. Cena Bitcoina
Kaj je to
Cena Bitcoina je zadnja cena posla na spot ali derivatnem trgu. Odra≈æa ravnote≈æje med povpra≈°evanjem in ponudbo v danem trenutku.
Temeljni pomen
Cena je konƒçni rezultat vseh dejavnikov:
makroekonomike in likvidnosti,
on-chain aktivnosti,
spekulativnega povpra≈°evanja,
institucionalnih tokov,
tr≈ænih priƒçakovanj in psihologije.
Cena sama ne pojasnjuje vzrokov gibanja, temveƒç le bele≈æi rezultat.

2. Obseg (Volume)
Kaj je to
Obseg je koliƒçina Bitcoina (ali pogodb), ki se trgajo v obdobju ƒçasa:
spot ‚Äî resniƒçni BTC,
terminske pogodbe ‚Äî pogodbe.
Temeljni pomen
Obseg ka≈æe:
stopenj udele≈æbe kapitala,
silo zanimanja za gibanje cene,
potrditev ali ≈°ibkost trenda.
Visok obseg pomeni, da gibanje cene podpirajo resniƒçni posli, ne nakljuƒçne nihanja.

3. Odprti obseg (Open Interest)
Kaj je to
Odprti obseg je skupno ≈°tevilo odprtih derivatnih pogodb (terminske pogodbe), ki ≈°e niso zaprte ali likvidirane.
Pomembno:
ni ≈°tevilo poslov,
koliƒçina ‚Äûne zaprtih stav‚Äú na prihodnjo ceno.
Temeljni pomen
Odprti obseg odra≈æa:
raven spekulative udele≈æbe,
koncentracijo vzvoda,
potencialno energijo za impulzivna gibanja.
Rast odprtega obsega pomeni vstop novega kapitala v trg ali poveƒçano uporabo vzvoda.

4. Povezanost cene, obsega in odprtega obsega
Osnovna logika
Ti trije kazalniki tvorijo strukturo trga:
Cena ka≈æe smer
Obseg potrjuje silo
Odprti obseg ka≈æe tveganje in napetost
Kljuƒçne kombinacije
Cena raste + Obseg raste + Odprti obseg raste
V trg vstopa nov kapital
Trend velja za zdrav
Podpora gibanja s strani resniƒçnih udele≈æencev
Cena raste + Obseg pada
Gibanje izgublja podporo
Mo≈æen la≈æen preboj
Poveƒçano tveganje za preobrat
Cena raste + Odprti obseg pada
Zapiranje kratkih pozicij (short squeeze)
Gibanje je lahko kratkoroƒçno
Pogosto opazno na koncu impulza
Cena pada + Odprti obseg raste
Kopihenje kratkih pozicij
Poveƒçano tveganje short squeeze pri ostrem preobratu
Trg postane nestabilen
Cena pada + Odprti obseg pada
Kapitulacija
Zapiranje pozicij
Pogosto tvorba lokalnega dna

5. Kako se uporablja v napovedih
Doloƒçanje faze trga
Rast OI in obsega ‚Äî faza akumulacije ali distribucije
Padec OI ‚Äî zakljuƒçek impulza
Ekstremne vrednosti OI ‚Äî signal potencialne nihljivosti
Iskanje toƒçk preobrata
Ostri skoki odprtega obsega pogosto predhodijo:
kaskadne likvidacije,
impulzivna gibanja,
preobrati trenda.
Potrditev trenda
Vsak vzdr≈æen trend mora biti spremljan z:
stabilnim ali rastoƒçim obsegom,
kontrolirano rastjo odprtega obsega.

6. Uporaba v trgovanju
Srednjeroƒçno trgovanje
Analiza OI za razumevanje preobremenjenosti trga
Filtriranje la≈ænih prebojov
Ocena vzdr≈ænosti trenda
Kratkoroƒçno trgovanje
Iskanje con likvidacije
Delo z impulzi po ostrem porastu OI
Trgovanje squeeze scenarijev
Upravljanje tveganj
Visok OI + visoka nihljivost = poveƒçano tveganje
Oster padec OI = izstop spekulantov, zmanj≈°anje impulza

7. Omejitve kazalnikov
Odprti obseg ne ka≈æe smeri pozicij
Obseg lahko izkrivajo wash-trading
Cena reagira hitreje kot metrike.
Povzetek
Cena, obseg in odprti obseg tvorijo temeljno tr≈æno strukturo Bitcoina.
Cena ka≈æe rezultat
Obseg potrjuje silo gibanja
Odprti obseg odra≈æa tveganje, vzvod in potencial nihljivosti
Njihova skupna analiza omogoƒça:
razumevanje faze trga,
oceno vzdr≈ænosti trendov,
iskanje toƒçk poveƒçanega tveganja,
 izbolj≈°anje kakovosti napovedi in upravljanja pozicij.

text.en:
Bitcoin Funding Rates ‚Äî periodic payments between traders on perpetual futures market reflecting long (long) vs short (short) position balance. When longs pay shorts, funding rate positive; when shorts pay longs ‚Äî negative. Funding rate doesn't directly impact price but shows market sentiment and position tension degree.
Funding Rates used on major exchanges (Binance, Bybit, OKX, FTX Backups) updated every 8 hours. Reflect leverage demand imbalances.

Market and Bitcoin price impact
Funding Rates indicator of speculative sentiment and market overheating:
Positive and rising funding rate means traders actively opening longs (price growth expectation). May accompany price rise but signals elevated correction risk as too many 'leveraged buyers' create mass liquidation potential on reversal.
Negative funding rate reflects short position dominance (price decline expectation). Often appears during correction/downtrend phases. Strong negative funding may signal excess pessimism and potential upward reversal.
Funding rates especially useful during extreme movements when reaching abnormally high absolute values (e.g. >0.1% Funding considered high).

Interconnections
With Bitcoin price
Funding rates almost always lead or confirm price extremes but not movement cause:
Sharp positive funding rate + rapid price growth may precede correction (long capitulation via liquidations).
Deep correction + strongly negative funding rate market may be oversold, upward reversal more probable.
With liquidity and leverage
Funding reflects leverage usage. High funding rates indicate high leverage levels and elevated systemic liquidation risk.
With volume and volatility
Funding rates closely correlate with volumes/volatility. Funding growth often coincides with volume/volatility increase, sharp changes may precede reversals.

Forecasts and trading usage
Funding rates used by traders as market condition signals:
1. Countertrend signals:
Extremely positive funding after strong growth ‚Äî correction signal.
Extremely negative funding after decline ‚Äî recovery signal.
2. Signal filtering:
Funding rates work better combined with other indicators (volume, RSI, macro-sentiment, support/resistance levels).
Example: price rise + positive funding + RSI overbought = strong warning signal.
3. Risk management:
Leverage position management critical when funding rates rise as position holding cost increases (high costs for longs with positive funding).
4. Sentiment analysis:
Funding reflects speculative balance. Different exchanges may show variations helping assess market sentiment breadth (exchanges with more aggressive leverage often have more extreme rates).

Limitations
Funding rates reflect derivative market behavior not spot demand. Don't always predict fundamental Bitcoin demand changes as store of value asset.
Rates may also be distorted across exchanges/time periods requiring balanced analysis.

Summary
‚Ä¢ Funding rates ‚Äî perpetual futures market sentiment/leverage usage indicator.
‚Ä¢ Positive rates indicate long bias (bullish sentiment), negative ‚Äî shorts (bearish/pessimistic sentiment).
‚Ä¢ Extreme values often precede corrections/reversals.
‚Ä¢ Practically used for signal filtering, risk management, leveraged capital assessment in market.
text.si:
Stopnje financiranja Bitcoina ‚Äî periodiƒçni plaƒçili med trgovci na trgu perpetual futures, ki odra≈æajo ravnovesje dolgih (long) in kratkih (short) pozicij. Ko longi plaƒçujejo shortom, je stopnja financiranja pozitivna; ko shorti plaƒçujejo longom ‚Äî negativna. Stopnja financiranja ne vpliva neposredno na ceno, a ka≈æe tr≈æna razpolo≈æenja in stopnjo napetosti pozicij.
Stopnje financiranja se uporabljajo na velikih borzah (Binance, Bybit, OKX, FTX Backups) in se posodobijo vsakih 8 ur. Odra≈æajo neravnovesja v povpra≈°evanju po finanƒçnem vzvodu.

Vpliv na trg in ceno Bitcoina
Stopnje financiranja so kazalnik spekulativnega sentimenta in pregrevanja trga:
Pozitivna in nara≈°ƒçajoƒça stopnja financiranja pomeni, da trgovci aktivno odpirajo long pozicije (priƒçakovana rast cene). To lahko spremlja rast cene, a signalizira povi≈°ano tveganje korekcije, saj preveƒç 'vzvoda kupcev' ustvarja potencial za mno≈æiƒçne likvidacije pri obraƒçunu.
Negativna stopnja financiranja odra≈æa prevlado short pozicij (priƒçakovano padanje). Pogosto se pojavi med fazami korekcije ali padajoƒçega trenda. Moƒçno negativna stopnja financiranja lahko signalizira prese≈æek pesimizma in mo≈æen obraƒçun navzgor.
Stopnje financiranja so ≈°e posebej uporabne med ekstremnimi gibanji, ko dose≈æejo nenormalno visoke absolutne vrednosti (npr. >0.1% financiranja velja za visoko).

Povezave
S ceno Bitcoina
Stopnje financiranja skoraj vedno vodijo ali potrjujejo cenovne ekstreme, a same po sebi niso vzrok gibanja:
Ostra pozitivna stopnja financiranja + hitra rast cene lahko predhodno korekcijo (kapitulacija longov prek likvidacij).
Globoka korekcija + moƒçno negativna stopnja financiranja trg lahko preprodano, obraƒçun navzgor bolj verjeten.
S likvidnostjo in vzvodom
Financiranje odra≈æa uporabo finanƒçnega vzvoda. Visoke stopnje financiranja ka≈æejo visoke nivoje vzvoda in povi≈°ano tveganje sistemskih likvidacij.
Z volumnom in volatilnostjo
Stopnje financiranja tesno korelirajo z volumnom/volatilnostjo. Rast financiranja pogosto sovpada z rastjo volumna/volatilnosti, ostri spremembe lahko predhodno obraƒçune.

Uporaba v napovedih in trgovanju
Stopnje financiranja trgovci uporabljajo kot signale stanja trga:
1. Kontratrendni signali:
Ekstremno pozitivno financiranje po moƒçni rasti ‚Äî signal mo≈æne korekcije.
Ekstremno negativno financiranje po padcu ‚Äî signal mo≈ænega okrevanja.
2. Filtriranje signalov:
Stopnje financiranja bolje delujejo v kombinaciji z drugimi kazalniki (volumen, RSI, makro-sentiment, nivoji podpore/upora).
Primer: rast cene + pozitivno financiranje + RSI prekupljen = moƒçan opozorilni signal.
3. Upravljanje tveganj:
Upravljanje pozicij z vzvodom postane kritiƒçno, ƒçe stopnje financiranja rastejo, saj se stro≈°ki dr≈æanja pozicije poveƒçajo (visoki stro≈°ki za long pozicije pri pozitivnem financiranju).
4. Analiza razpolo≈æenj:
Financiranje odra≈æa spekulativno ravnovesje. Razliƒçne borze lahko ka≈æejo razlike, kar pomaga oceniti ≈°irino tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj (borze z bolj agresivnim vzvodom pogosto imajo ekstremnej≈°e stopnje).

Omejitve
Stopnje financiranja odra≈æajo vedenje derivatnega trga, ne spot povpra≈°evanja. Ne napovedujejo vedno temeljnih sprememb povpra≈°evanja po Bitcoinu kot sredstvu shranjevanja vrednosti.
Stopnje se lahko tudi izkrivijo med razliƒçnimi borzami/ƒçasovnimi obdobji, zato zahteva uravnote≈æeno analizo.

Povzetek
‚Ä¢ Stopnje financiranja ‚Äî kazalnik razpolo≈æenj in uporabe vzvoda na trgu perpetual futures.
‚Ä¢ Pozitivne stopnje ka≈æejo pristranskost longov (bikovsko razpolo≈æenje), negativne ‚Äî shortov (medvedje ali pesimistiƒçno razpolo≈æenje).
‚Ä¢ Ekstremne vrednosti pogosto predhodno korekcijam ali obraƒçunom.
‚Ä¢ Praktiƒçno se uporabljajo za filtriranje signalov, upravljanje tveganj in oceno vzvodnega kapitala na trgu.

extra.en:
Current Funding Rates state
Today average Bitcoin Funding Rates on leading exchanges moderately positive zone but not extremely high. Indicates long positions dominate shorts but not at levels signaling market overheating. Funding Rates above zero show traders willing pay for holding long positions reflecting current bullish sentiment tilt but without peaks characteristic of bull phase tops.
Funding Rates consistently positive but below historical cycle peaks. Indicates market not in excessive speculative overheating stage.

Funding Rates trend forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Short-term Funding Rates likely remain moderately positive or slightly retreat toward zero if Bitcoin price consolidates/corrects downward.
Key drivers:
volatility/volume decline reduces leverage demand,
profit-taking after recent moves.
Forecast: Funding Rates remain moderately positive or slightly decline reflecting cautious market optimism.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
Medium-term Funding Rates largely depend on overall BTC price trend/institutional flows:
If Bitcoin price continues upward dynamics breaks key resistance levels, Funding Rates pulled upward following long leverage demand growth. Mechanism: sustained bullish trend stimulates more leverage usage pressuring Funding upward.
If price enters sideways/moderate correction period, Funding Rates may settle near zero or periodically negative with short strategies dominating.
Forecast: Funding Rates correlate with bullish trend sustainability; BTC growth ‚Äî upward, consolidation/correction ‚Äî toward zero or slightly negative.

Long-term (6‚Äì24+ months)
Long-term Funding Rates reflect structural market cycles:
If crypto market enters new high demand phase (new bull cycle), Funding Rates overall more frequently positive periodically rising toward extreme values at peaks. Accompanies price growth, capital inflows, leverage usage expansion.
If long-term trend neutral/bearish (prolonged consolidation periods), Funding Rates regularly approach zero/negative reflecting market capital protection bias/short position dominance.
Forecast: long-term Funding Rates reflect BTC cycles: sustained growth ‚Äî positive funding; accumulation/correction phases ‚Äî neutral/negative.

Funding Rates impact on markets/Bitcoin price
Funding Rates themselves don't move price but high-frequency market sentiment/leverage usage indicator:
Positive/rising Funding Rates
‚Äî indicate long leverage expansion;
‚Äî accompany elevated risk appetite;
‚Äî often seen early/mid strong uptrends;
‚Äî may signal correction risk at extreme levels.
Negative Funding Rates
‚Äî indicate short position dominance;
‚Äî characteristic of decline/strong correction phases;
‚Äî may signal 'short oversold' potential bounce.
Funding Rates near zero
‚Äî reflect market uncertainty/balance between long/short demand;
‚Äî characteristic of consolidation phases.

Practical conclusion
Short-term Funding Rates remain moderately positive/transition to zero reflecting cautious market. Medium-term correlate with BTC price direction ‚Äî growth strengthens funding, correction lowers. Long-term Funding Rates serve cycle phase indicator: sustained positive values ‚Äî bull cycle; neutral/negative ‚Äî consolidations/corrections.
Funding Rates ‚Äî important market sentiment/leverage usage indicator helping traders assess trend sustainability/large reversal risks especially combined with volume, volatility, open interest levels.
extra.si:
Trenutno stanje stopenj financiranja
Danes povpreƒçne stopnje financiranja Bitcoina na vodilnih borzah v zmerno pozitivnem obmoƒçju, a ne ekstremno visoke. Ka≈æe, da long pozicije prevladujejo nad shorti, a ne na nivojih, ki signalizirajo pregrevanje trga. Stopnje financiranja nad niƒçlo ka≈æejo, da so trgovci pripravljeni plaƒçevati za dr≈æanje dolgih pozicij, kar odra≈æa trenutno bikovsko nagibanje razpolo≈æenj, a brez vrhov, znaƒçilnih za vrhove bikovskih faz.
Stopnje financiranja stabilno pozitivne, a pod zgodovinskimi maksimumi prej≈°njih ciklov. Ka≈æe, da trg ni v fazi prekomernega spekulativnega pregrevanja.

Napoved trenda stopenj financiranja
Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)
Kratkoroƒçno stopnje financiranja verjetno ostanejo zmerno pozitivne ali rahlo padejo proti niƒçli, ƒçe se cena Bitcoina konsolidira/korigira navzdol.
Kljuƒçni gonilci:
padec volatilnosti/volumna zmanj≈°a povpra≈°evanje po vzvodu,
fiksiranje dobiƒçka po nedavnih gibih.
Napoved: stopnje financiranja ostanejo zmerno pozitivne ali rahlo padec, odra≈æajo previdni tr≈æni optimizem.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Srednjeroƒçno stopnje financiranja v veliki meri odvisne od splo≈°nega trenda cene BTC/institucionalnih tokov:
ƒåe cena Bitcoina nadaljuje vzpon in prebije kljuƒçne nivoje upora, bodo stopnje financiranja potegnile navzgor za rastjo povpra≈°evanja po long vzvodu. Mehanizem: vzdr≈æen bikovski trend spodbuja veƒçjo uporabo vzvoda, kar pritiska financiranje navzgor.
ƒåe cena vstopi v obdobje boƒçnosti/zmerne korekcije, se lahko stopnje financiranja ustalijo blizu niƒçle ali periodiƒçno negativne pri prevladovanju short strategij.
Napoved: stopnje financiranja bodo korelirale z vzdr≈ænostjo bikovskega trenda; rast BTC ‚Äî navzgor, konsolidacija/korekcija ‚Äî proti niƒçli ali rahlo negativne.

Dolgoroƒçno (6‚Äì24+ mesecev)
Dolgoroƒçno stopnje financiranja odra≈æajo strukturne tr≈æne cikle:
ƒåe kripto-trg vstopi v novo fazo povi≈°anega povpra≈°evanja (nov bikovski cikel), bodo stopnje financiranja skupno pogosteje pozitivne in periodiƒçno nara≈°ƒçale proti ekstremnim vrednostim na vrhovih. Spremlja rast cen, prilive kapitala, ≈°iritev uporabe vzvoda.
ƒåe dolgoroƒçni trend nevtralen/medvedji (z dolgimi obdobji konsolidacije), bodo stopnje financiranja redno pribli≈æevale niƒçli/negativne, odra≈æajo tr≈æno nagnjenost k za≈°ƒçiti kapitala in prevlado short pozicij.
Napoved: dolgoroƒçno stopnje financiranja bodo odra≈æale BTC cikle: vzdr≈æna rast ‚Äî pozitivno financiranje; faze akumulacije/korekcije ‚Äî nevtralno/negativno.

Vpliv stopenj financiranja na trge/ceno Bitcoina
Stopnje financiranja same ne premikajo cene, a visoko-frekvenƒçni kazalnik tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj/uporabe vzvoda:
Pozitivne/nara≈°ƒçajoƒçe stopnje financiranja
‚Äî ka≈æejo ≈°iritev vzvoda na longih;
‚Äî spremljajo povi≈°an apetit po tveganju;
‚Äî pogosto vidne na zaƒçetku/sredi moƒçnih vzponov;
‚Äî lahko signalizirajo tveganje korekcije pri ekstremnih nivojih.
Negativne stopnje financiranja
‚Äî ka≈æejo prevlado short pozicij;
‚Äî znaƒçilne za faze padca/moƒçne korekcije;
‚Äî lahko signalizirajo 'prekratko prodane' shorte in potencial odboja.
Stopnje financiranja blizu niƒçle
‚Äî odra≈æajo tr≈æno negotovost/ravnovesje med long/short povpra≈°evanjem;
‚Äî znaƒçilne za faze konsolidacije.

Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçek
Kratkoroƒçno stopnje financiranja ostanejo zmerno pozitivne/preidejo k niƒçli, odra≈æajo previden trg. Srednjeroƒçno bodo korelirale s smerjo cene BTC ‚Äî rast okrepi financiranje, korekcija zmanj≈°a. Dolgoroƒçno stopnje financiranja slu≈æijo kot kazalnik cikliƒçnih faz: vzdr≈æne pozitivne vrednosti ‚Äî bikovski cikel; nevtralne/negativne ‚Äî konsolidacije/korekcije.
Stopnje financiranja ‚Äî pomemben kazalnik tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj/uporabe vzvoda, ki trgovcem pomaga oceniti vzdr≈ænost trenda/tveganja velikih obraƒçunov, ≈°e posebej v kombinaciji z volumnom, volatilnostjo in odprtim interesom.

text.en:
BTC ETF AUM Balances (assets under management)
ETF AUM Balances represent total Assets Under Management (AUM), i.e. assets managed by exchange-traded funds (ETFs). In Bitcoin ETF context, this is total money volume (in dollars or BTC) invested through such funds. Higher AUM means greater capitalization and potential Bitcoin demand through established financial products and institutional investors. ETF AUM reflects real institutional and retail interest in BTC through traditional securities market.

How AUM affects Bitcoin price
Supply and demand: when AUM grows, ETFs purchase or hold real BTC, reducing spot market supply and pressuring price upward.
Institutional signal: high or growing AUM balance tells markets that large investors believe in BTC as asset and allocate capital this way.
Correlation linkage: higher BTC share under ETF management strengthens BTC connection with traditional markets, making it less 'alternative asset' and more exposed to global financial trends
text.si:
Bilance AUM BTC ETF (aktivi v upravljanju)
Bilance AUM ETF predstavljajo skupne Aktive v Upravljanju (AUM), tj. aktive, ki jih upravljajo izmenjalni investicijski skladi (ETF). V kontekstu Bitcoin ETF je to skupni obseg denarja (v dolarjih ali BTC), vlo≈æenega prek takih skladov. Veƒçji AUM pomeni veƒçjo kapitalizacijo in potencialni povpra≈°evanje po bitcoinih prek uveljavljenih finanƒçnih produktov in institucionalnih vlagateljev. AUM ETF odra≈æa dejanski institucionalni in maloprodajni interes za BTC prek tradicionalnega trga vrednostnih papirjev.

Kako AUM vpliva na ceno bitcoina
Povpra≈°evanje in ponudba: ko AUM raste, ETF kupujejo ali dr≈æijo dejanski BTC, kar zmanj≈°uje ponudbo na spot trgih in pritiska ceno navzgor.
Institucionalni signal: visoka ali rastoƒça bilanca AUM pove trgom, da veliki vlagatelji verjamejo v BTC kot sredstvo in vanj usmerjajo kapital.
Povezava s korelacijo: veƒçji dele≈æ BTC v upravljanju ETF krepi povezavo BTC s tradicionalnimi trgi, kar ga dela manj 'alternativno sredstvo' in bolj izpostavljenega globalnim finanƒçnim trendom

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 31.12.2025     Current AUM balances:
Total assets under management in US spot Bitcoin ETFs approximately $115‚Äì$120 billion as of end December 2025
BlackRock iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) remains largest fund with assets around $67‚Äì$70 billion.
Some sources estimate broader global BTC ETF market even higher (e.g. up to ~$168 billion AUM)
These figures show ETF AUM reached significant institutional scale, but 2025 also saw fluctuations and significant outflows late year, especially after BTC price drop summer-fall.

What current picture means
üìà AUM growth indicates structural demand: ETF assets grew since spot BTC ETF launch in 2024 and overall reflects scale of institutional interest supporting long-term baseline demand.
üìâ AUM decline amid BTC price drop is typical reaction: second half 2025 AUM declined from autumn peaks, partly due to price correction and profit-taking/liquidity outflows.
AUM volume fluctuating with inflows/outflows and Bitcoin price often serves as institutional investor sentiment indicator.

BTC price impact forecast
Short-term (weeks ‚Äî months)
AUM can change strongly with BTC price:
If BTC price stabilizes or starts growing, ETFs may see new capital inflows supporting price and reducing supply pressure.
If price continues falling or volatility rises, ETF outflows may intensify, pressuring prices following overall market dynamics.(bitbo.io)
Thus next weeks ETF AUM dynamics will correlate with BTC short-term price trend: inflows ‚Äî positive, outflows ‚Äî negative.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months)
If early 2026 BTC market stabilizes and investors return attention to crypto-ETFs:
AUM inflow recovery may strengthen institutional segment confidence.
This creates additional popular demand as capital exits more risky assets into BTC through institutional channels.
In opposite scenario if macro structures remain restrained or risk appetite low, ETF AUM may continue consolidation at current levels, BTC price stays sideways or under pressure.

Long-term (2026 and beyond)
Institutional participation growth:
ETF AUM represents fundamental capital level in BTC through traditional financial mechanisms. With AUM growth BTC gains broader institutional base. This essentially structurally supports price long-term as major financial players view BTC as part of investment strategies.
Volatility reduction:
Large ETFs with stable AUM act as liquidity stabilizer during volatility periods, reducing gaps between spot market and derivatives. Responsible ETFs support market even if inflows come wave-like.
extra.si:
ANALIZA na 31.12.2025     Trenutne bilance AUM:
Skupni obseg aktivov v upravljanju v ameri≈°kih spot Bitcoin ETF pribli≈æno $115‚Äì$120 milijard konec decembra 2025
BlackRock iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) ostaja najveƒçji sklad z aktivi okoli $67‚Äì$70 milijard.
Nekateri viri ocenjujejo ≈°ir≈°i globalni trg BTC ETF celo vi≈°je (npr. do ~$168 milijard AUM)
Ti podatki ka≈æejo, da je AUM ETF dosegel pomemben institucionalni obseg, a je leto 2025 zaznamovalo tudi nihanja in znatne odlive konec leta, ≈°e posebej po padcu cene BTC poleti‚Äìjeseni.

Kaj pomeni trenutna slika
üìà Rast AUM ka≈æe na strukturno povpra≈°evanje: aktivi ETF so rasli od zagona spot BTC ETF leta 2024 in v celoti odra≈æajo obseg institucionalnega interesa, ki podpira dolgoroƒçno osnovno povpra≈°evanje.
üìâ Padec AUM ob padcu cene BTC je tipiƒçen odziv: v drugi polovici 2025 se je AUM zmanj≈°al s jesenskih vrhov, deloma zaradi korekcije cene in realizacije dobiƒçkov/odtekanja likvidnosti.
Obseg AUM, ki nihajo glede na prilive/odlive in ceno bitcoina, pogosto slu≈æi kot indikator razpolo≈æenja institucionalnih vlagateljev.

Napoved vpliva na ceno BTC
 Kratkoroƒçni (tedni ‚Äî meseci)
AUM se lahko moƒçno spreminja skupaj s ceno BTC:
ƒåe se cena BTC stabilizira ali zaƒçne rasti, lahko ETF vidijo nove prilive kapitala, kar podpira ceno in zmanj≈°uje pritisk na ponudbo.
ƒåe cena nadaljuje padanje ali nihljivost nara≈°ƒça, se lahko odlivi iz ETF okrepijo, kar pritiska na cene sledijo splo≈°ni tr≈æni dinamiki.(bitbo.io)
Torej bodo v prihodnjih tednih dinamika AUM ETF korelirala s kratkoroƒçnim trendom cene BTC: prilivi ‚Äî pozitivno, odlivi ‚Äî negativno.

 Srednjeroƒçni (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
ƒåe se na zaƒçetku 2026 stabilizira trg BTC in vlagatelji vrnejo pozornost k kripto-ETF:
Okrevanje prilivov AUM lahko okrepi zaupanje institucionalnega segmenta.
To ustvari dodatno priljubljeno povpra≈°evanje, ko kapital odteka iz bolj tveganih aktivov v BTC prek institucionalnih kanalov.
V nasprotnem scenariju, ƒçe makrostrukture ostanejo zadr≈æane ali apetit po tveganju nizek, se lahko AUM ETF nadaljuje konsolidacija na trenutnih nivojih, cena BTC pa ostane v stranskem gibanju ali pod pritiskom.

 Dolgoroƒçni (2026 in naprej)
Rast institucionalnega sodelovanja:
AUM ETF predstavlja temeljni nivo kapitala v BTC prek tradicionalnih finanƒçnih mehanizmov. Z rastjo AUM BTC pridobi ≈°ir≈°o institucionalno bazo. To v bistvu strukturno podpira ceno dolgoroƒçno, saj veliki finanƒçni igralci obravnavajo BTC kot del investicijskih strategij.
Zmanj≈°anje nihljivosti:
Veliki ETF z stabilnim AUM delujejo kot stabilizator likvidnosti v obdobjih nihljivosti, zmanj≈°ujejo razlike med spot trgom in derivati. Odgovorni ETF podpirajo trg, tudi ƒçe prilivi prihajajo valovito.

text.en: Bitcoin Active Addresses is an on-chain metric that measures the number of unique addresses in the Bitcoin network that were active (sent or received transactions) over a specific period (usually a day or 7-day moving average ‚Äî MA). This is an indicator of real network usage: high level = growth in activity (demand for blockspace, new users), low = cooling (decline in interest, high fees deter users). The metric correlates with BTC price ~0.6‚Äì0.7 (growth in addresses = bull, decline = bearish).
text.si: Bitcoin Active Addresses je on-chain metrika, ki meri ≈°tevilo edinstvenih naslovov v omre≈æju Bitcoin, ki so bili aktivni (po≈°iljali ali prejemali transakcije) v doloƒçenem obdobju (obiƒçajno za dan ali 7-dnevno drseƒçe povpreƒçje ‚Äî MA). To je indikator resniƒçne uporabe omre≈æja: visoka raven = rast aktivnosti (povpra≈°evanje po blokovnem prostoru, novi uporabniki), nizka = hlajenje (padec zanimanja, visoke provizije odganjajo uporabnike). Metrika je korelirana s ceno BTC ~0.6‚Äì0.7 (rast naslovov = bikovski trend, padec = medvedji).

extra.en:
Analysis of the current state (as of December 2025)
- *Current value*: 7-day MA has fallen to ~660,000 active addresses ‚Äî a level from December 2024. Daily values ~114,597‚Äì430,364 (in combo with other chains, BTC ~26.6%).
- *Trend*: Decline from the peak >900,000 in 2024 (Ordinals/Runes hype) ‚Äî indicates cooling demand for blockspace (high fees, retail user outflow). Correlation with miner revenue: drop in addresses = decline in miner revenues ‚Üí potential pressure to sell BTC.
- *Context*: In 2025 BTC +120% ($40K ‚Üí $88K), but addresses are low ‚Äî signal of "speculative" growth (ETFs/institutions, not retail). This is a bearish divergence: price rises, activity falls.

Forecast
- *Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)*: If addresses continue to fall (<600K) ‚Äî BTC correction ‚Äì5‚Äì10% ($80K‚Äì$85K), due to weak demand. Growth >800K (new hype) = breakout to $90K‚Äì$95K (probability 40‚Äì50%).
- *Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months)*: Low addresses + recession risks (Sahm Rule 0.43) = pressure to $70K‚Äì$80K. If growth (ETF inflows + Fed liquidity) = $100K+ (probability 60%).
- *Long-term (2026)*: If addresses return to 900K+ (new protocols) = bull to $120K. If decline continues = stagnation ~$74K.

Impact on markets and Bitcoin price
- *On markets*: Low addresses = weak network = pressure on crypto sector (market ‚Äì1‚Äì3%, ETH/SOL ‚Üì). But stocks stable (S&P 500 +0.2%). Growth in addresses = crypto bull (+2‚Äì5%, market +1‚Äì2%). In 2025, addresses decline coincided with BTC correction ‚Äì30% from ATH.
- *On Bitcoin price*: Correlation ~0.6‚Äì0.7: decrease in addresses = bearish (‚Äì1‚Äì5%, weak demand). Growth = bull (+2‚Äì5%, activity = demand). Current low level = risk of correction to $85K (pressure from miner revenue ‚Üì).
extra.si:
Analiza trenutnega stanja (december 2025)
- *Trenutna vrednost*: 7-dnevno MA je padlo na ~660.000 aktivnih naslovov ‚Äî raven iz decembra 2024. Dnevne vrednosti ~114.597‚Äì430.364 (v kombinaciji z drugimi verigami, BTC ~26.6%).
- *Trend*: Padec s vrha >900.000 v 2024 (hype Ordinals/Runes) ‚Äî ka≈æe na hlajenje povpra≈°evanja po blokovnem prostoru (visoke provizije, odliv maloprodajnih uporabnikov). Korelacija z miner revenue: padec naslovov = zmanj≈°anje prihodkov rudarjev ‚Üí potencialni pritisk na prodajo BTC.
- *Kontekst*: Leta 2025 BTC +120% ($40K ‚Üí $88K), vendar naslovi nizki ‚Äî signal "spekulativne" rasti (ETF/institucije, ne maloprodaja). To je medvedja divergenca: cena raste, aktivnost pada.

Napoved
- *Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne)*: ƒåe naslovi nadaljujejo padec (<600K) ‚Äî korekcija BTC ‚Äì5‚Äì10% ($80K‚Äì$85K), zaradi ≈°ibkega povpra≈°evanja. Rast >800K (nov hype) = preboj na $90K‚Äì$95K (verjetnost 40‚Äì50%).
- *Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì3 mesece)*: Nizki naslovi + tveganja recesije (Sahm Rule 0.43) = pritisk na $70K‚Äì$80K. ƒåe rast (priviok ETF + likvidnost Fed) = $100K+ (verjetnost 60%).
- *Dolgooroƒçno (2026)*: ƒåe naslovi vrnejo na 900K+ (novi protokoli) = bikovski trend do $120K. ƒåe padec nadaljuje = stagnacija ~$74K.

Vpliv na trge in ceno bitcoina
- *Na trge*: Nizki naslovi = ≈°ibko omre≈æje = pritisk na kripto sektor (trg ‚Äì1‚Äì3%, ETH/SOL ‚Üì). Toda delnice stabilne (S&P 500 +0.2%). Rast naslovov = bikovski kripto (+2‚Äì5%, trg +1‚Äì2%). Leta 2025 je padec naslovov sovpadal s korekcijo BTC ‚Äì30% od ATH.
- *Na ceno bitcoina*: Korelacija ~0.6‚Äì0.7: zmanj≈°anje naslovov = medvedji (‚Äì1‚Äì5%, ≈°ibko povpra≈°evanje). Rast = bikovski (+2‚Äì5%, aktivnost = povpra≈°evanje). Trenutna nizka raven = tveganje korekcije na $85K (pritisk od miner revenue ‚Üì).

ANALYSIS AS OF 31.12.2025.      Exact NVT/RVT values on specific date vary by sources, but end 2025 data indicate following observed metrics behavior:
NVT situation:
As of end December 2025 NVT remains moderate and not extremely high (~85‚Äì90 depending on source). This indicates BTC market cap not overly heated relative to current transaction volume to be clearly overbought. 
NVT context:
Historically, when NVT rises sharply above historical average levels ‚Äî sign of potential correction or price risk accumulation. When NVT moderate or low ‚Äî price support signal based on network activity. 
RVT status:
Public RVT data less available in 'market' charts, but conceptually RVT less exposed to short-term noise and closer tied to long-term investors/real value transfer demand realities. High RVT roughly coincides with periods when network valuation significantly exceeds real transaction demand, signaling potential market discharge.
December 2025 RVT data from different providers indicate RVT holding in ranges characteristic of correction completion and accumulation beginning (not extreme highs, not extreme lows). 

What this means for Bitcoin price
Short-term perspective (weeks‚Äìmonths)
Moderate NVT suggests current price levels not 'detached' from real network usage. This reduces likelihood of strong correction based solely on network valuation.
RVT not showing new local highs confirms fundamental demand though not exploding still doesn't indicate bubble about to burst.
Thus short-term NVT/RVT metrics support price stability or moderate up/sideways movement, but don't give strong reversal signal up (when network value sharply grows) or down (when price extremely overvalued). 
These metrics effective for assessing 'market health': if Bitcoin grows but NVT falls ‚Äî reflects sustainable organic demand; if Bitcoin grows and NVT grows stronger ‚Äî overbought sign.

Bitcoin market impact forecast
Short-term perspective (1‚Äì3 months)
If transaction activity continues growing (e.g. new apps, users or large transfer volumes):
NVT will decline.
RVT will show more stable 'real demand'.
This creates bullish context supporting BTC price at current or higher levels.
If transactions decline (seasonally, due to activity drop or economic slowdown):
NVT/RVT may rise ‚Üí overbought signal ‚Üí relative BTC price weakness vs activity.
In other words current moderate coefficient values don't give strong short-term correction signal but indicate healthy network demand structure supporting baseline price levels.

Medium-term perspective (3‚Äì12 months)
Over medium period NVT/RVT changes may indicate cycles:
Coefficient decline (NVT/RVT falling) amid transaction activity growth ‚Äî strong fundamental signal for sustainable price growth.
Coefficient growth with activity stagnation ‚Äî warning of potential consolidation or correction.
If for example in 2026 user/transaction activity grows (Lightning adoption, institutional usage, high ETF-flows), NVT/RVT may decline supporting medium-term BTC bullish trend. Otherwise possible sideways price consolidation.

Long-term perspective (1 year and beyond)
Long horizon NVT and RVT give macro signals of market cycle phases:
Long-term downtrend (NVT/RVT decline) historically accompanied sustainable growth phases ‚Äî when network actively used and prices grow on fundamental demand base. 
Historical NVT/RVT peaks often occur before reversals or corrections when price grows too fast while transaction activity lags.
Since current values without extreme peaks, this indicates long-term BTC trend may remain sustainable if blockchain transaction/institutional interest growth continues.
NVT and RVT are on-chain coefficients, P/E analogies for bitcoin reflecting market cap connection with actual transaction activity. 
As of 31.12.25 values moderate, no signals of extreme overvaluation or oversold. This indicates healthy network supporting BTC price but without powerful reversal signal.
Short-term help assess network activity and potential correction risk.
Medium-term may signal fundamental demand deterioration or improvement.
Long-term NVT/RVT trend remained positive for sustainable price growth especially if network transactions continue growing.

ANALIZA NA 31.12.2025.      Natanƒçne vrednosti NVT/RVT na specifiƒçen datum se med viri razlikujejo, a podatki na koncu 2025 ka≈æejo na naslednje opa≈æeno vedenje metrik:
Situacija z NVT:
Konec decembra 2025 NVT ostaja zmeren in ne ekstremno visok (~85‚Äì90 glede na vir). To ka≈æe, da tr≈æna kapitalizacija BTC ni pretirano pregreta glede na trenutni volumen transakcij, da bi bila nedvoumno pregreta. 
Kontekst NVT:
Zgodovinsko, ko NVT nenadoma naraste nad zgodovinska povpreƒçja ‚Äî znak potencialne korekcije ali kopiƒçenja cenovnega tveganja. Ko je NVT zmeren ali nizek ‚Äî signal podpore ceni na osnovi mre≈æne aktivnosti. 
Kaj z RVT:
Javni podatki RVT so manj dostopni v 'tr≈ænih' grafikonih, a konceptualno je RVT manj izpostavljen kratkoroƒçnemu ≈°umu in tesneje povezan z realnostmi povpra≈°evanja dolgoroƒçnih vlagateljev/pravih zahtev po prenosu vrednosti. Visok RVT se pribli≈æno ujema z obdobji, ko vrednotenje mre≈æe bistveno presega dejansko povpra≈°evanje po transakcijah, kar signalizira potencialno praznjenje trga.
Podatki RVT za december 2025 razliƒçnih ponudnikov ka≈æejo, da RVT dr≈æi v obmoƒçjih, znaƒçilnih za dokonƒçanje korekcije in zaƒçetek kopiƒçenja (ni ekstremnih vi≈°in, ni ekstremnih ni≈æinskih vrednosti). 

Kaj to pomeni za ceno bitcoina
V kratkoroƒçni perspektivi (tedni‚Äìmeseci)
Zmeren NVT nakazuje, da trenutne ravni cen niso 'odtrgane' od dejanske uporabe mre≈æe. To zmanj≈°uje verjetnost moƒçne korekcije samo na osnovi mre≈æne vrednosti.
RVT, ki ne ka≈æe novih lokalnih maksimumov, potrjuje, da fundamentalno povpra≈°evanje ƒçeprav ne eksplodira ≈°e ne ka≈æe mehurƒçka, ki bi bil tik pred pokom.
Torej v kratkem obdobju metrike NVT/RVT podpirajo stabilnost cene ali zmerno gibanje navzgor/stransko, a ne dajejo moƒçnega signala obraƒçuna navzgor (ko mre≈æna vrednost nenadoma raste) ali navzdol (ko je cena ekstremno previsoka). 
Te metrike so uƒçinkovite za oceno 'zdravja' trga: ƒçe bitcoin raste, a NVT pada ‚Äî odra≈æa trajnostno organsko povpra≈°evanje; ƒçe bitcoin raste in NVT raste moƒçneje ‚Äî znak pregrevanja.

Napoved vpliva na trge bitcoina
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì3 mesece)
ƒåe transakcijska aktivnost nadaljuje rast (npr. pojav novih aplikacij, uporabnikov ali velikih volumnov prenosov):
NVT bo padal.
RVT bo kazal bolj stabilno 'dejansko povpra≈°evanje'.
To ustvari bikovsko ozadje in podpira ceno BTC na trenutnih ali vi≈°jih nivojih.
ƒåe transakcije padajo (sezonsko, zaradi upada aktivnosti ali gospodarske upoƒçasnitve):
NVT/RVT lahko rasteta ‚Üí signal pregrevanja ‚Üí relativna ≈°ibkost cene BTC glede na aktivnost.
Z drugimi besedami trenutne zmerne vrednosti teh koeficientov ne dajejo moƒçnega kratkoroƒçnega signala korekcije, a ka≈æejo na zdravo strukturo mre≈ænega povpra≈°evanja, ki podpira osnovne ravni cen.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (3‚Äì12 mesecev)
V srednjem obdobju spremembe NVT/RVT lahko ka≈æejo na cikle:
Padec koeficientov (padec NVT/RVT) ob rasti transakcijske aktivnosti ‚Äî moƒçan fundamentalni signal za trajnostno rast cene.
Rast koeficientov pri stagnaciji aktivnosti ‚Äî opozorilo pred mo≈ænostjo konsolidacije ali korekcije.
ƒåe npr. leta 2026 aktivnost uporabnikov in transakcij naraste (sprejetje Lightning, institucionalna uporaba, visoki ETF-prilivi), se lahko NVT/RVT zni≈æata, kar bo podpiralo srednjeroƒçni bikovski trend BTC. Sicer mo≈æna stranska konsolidacija cenovne dinamike.

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (1 leto in veƒç)
Na dolgem obzorju NVT in RVT dajejo makro-signale cikliƒçnih faz trga:
Dolgoroƒçni padajoƒçi trend (padec NVT/RVT) je zgodovinsko spremljal trajnostne rastne faze ‚Äî ko je mre≈æa aktivno uporabljena in cene rastejo na osnovi fundamentalnega povpra≈°evanja. 
Zgodovinski vrhovi NVT/RVT pogosto nastopijo pred obraƒçuni ali korekcijami, ko cena raste prehitro, transakcijska aktivnost pa zaostaja.
Ker trenutne vrednosti brez ekstremnih vrhov, to ka≈æe, da lahko dolgoroƒçni trend BTC ostane trajnosten, ƒçe se bo nadaljevala rast transakcij in institucionalnega interesa na blockchainu.
NVT in RVT sta on-chain koeficienta, analognosti P/E za bitcoin, ki odra≈æata povezavo tr≈æne kapitalizacije z dejansko transakcijsko aktivnostjo. 
Na 31.12.25 vrednosti zmerne, brez signalov ekstremnega previsokega vrednotenja ali prepodanjene prodaje. To ka≈æe na zdravo mre≈æo in podpira ceno BTC, a brez moƒçnega signala obraƒçuna.
Kratkoroƒçno pomagata oceniti mre≈æno aktivnost in potencialno tveganje korekcije.
Srednjeroƒçno lahko signalizirata poslab≈°anje ali izbolj≈°anje fundamentalnega povpra≈°evanja.
Dolgoroƒçno je trend NVT/RVT ostal pozitiven za trajnostno rast cene, ≈°e posebej ƒçe transakcije mre≈æe nadaljujejo rast.

extra.en:
NVT Ratio (Network Value to Transactions) is on-chain metric showing Bitcoin market cap ratio to network transaction volume. P/E coefficient analogue for cryptocurrencies where transaction volume acts as 'revenue'. When market expensive relative to real network usage, NVT grows; when network actively used and price relatively low ‚Äî NVT declines. 
RVT Ratio (Realised Value to Transactions) ‚Äî similar coefficient but uses realised cap instead of market cap (realised cap ‚Äî total coin value at prices they last moved). Considered more 'resistant' to market speculation giving deeper fundamental demand view. 
Conditionally:
High NVT/RVT ‚Äî network 'insufficiently active' vs its value ‚Üí possible overvaluation.
Low NVT/RVT ‚Äî network actively used and valuation may be sustainable or undervalued. 
How NVT and RVT affect Bitcoin price
Why important
Since Bitcoin not company, no earnings ‚Üí traditional multiples inapplicable. NVT and RVT provide way to assess price relative to real value transfer demand through network:
Low values often accompany accumulation phases or sustainable growth.
High values signal price relatively too large vs activity typical for peaks, bubbles or correction zones.
Brief comparison
NVT reacts faster to market price and short-term trader sentiment.
RVT ‚Äî slower, 'weighted' signal smoothing noise reflecting basic blockchain value transfers
extra.si:
Razmerje NVT (Mre≈æna vrednost na transakcije) je on-chain metrika, ki prikazuje razmerje tr≈æne kapitalizacije bitcoina do volumna transakcij v mre≈æi. Analogna razmerja P/E za kriptovalute, kjer transakcijski volumen nastopa kot 'prihodek'. Ko je trg drag glede na dejansko uporabo mre≈æe, NVT raste; ko je mre≈æa aktivno uporabljena in cena relativno nizka ‚Äî NVT pada. 
Razmerje RVT (Realizirana vrednost na transakcije) ‚Äî podoben koeficient, a namesto tr≈æne kapitalizacije upo≈°teva realizirano kapitalizacijo (realised cap ‚Äî skupna vrednost kovancev po cenah, pri katerih so se nazadnje gibali). ≈†teje se za bolj 'odpornega' na tr≈æno ≈°pekulacijo in daje globlji pogled na fundamentalno povpra≈°evanje. 
Pogojno:
Visoka NVT/RVT ‚Äî mre≈æa 'nezadostno aktivna' glede na svojo vrednost ‚Üí mo≈æna previsoka vrednost.
Nizka NVT/RVT ‚Äî mre≈æa aktivno uporabljena in vrednotenje lahko trajnostno ali podcenjeno. 
Kako NVT in RVT vplivata na ceno bitcoina
Zakaj pomembni
Ker bitcoin ni podjetje, nima dobiƒçka ‚Üí tradicionalni multiplikatorji ne veljajo. NVT in RVT nudita naƒçin ocenjevanja cene glede na dejansko povpra≈°evanje po prenosu vrednosti prek mre≈æe:
Nizke vrednosti pogosto spremljajo faze kopiƒçenja ali trajnostne rasti.
Visoke vrednosti signalizirajo, da je cena glede na aktivnost prevelika, znaƒçilno za vrhove, mehurƒçke ali cone korekcij.
Kratek primerjava
NVT hitreje reagira na tr≈æno ceno in kratkoroƒçna razpolo≈æenja trgovcev.
RVT ‚Äî poƒçasnej≈°i, 'ute≈æen' signal, ki gladi ≈°um in odra≈æa osnovne prenose vrednosti na blockchainu

ANALYSIS AS OF 31.12.2025.       Direct data for 01.01.2025 specifically hard to find now (on-chain metrics published by platforms), but based on end 2025 analytics can reconstruct general trends:
üîπ End 2025 data shows MVRV noticeably dropped to ~1.8‚Äì2.0 range after price correction, historically associated with overvaluation transitioning to potential bottom zone or start of upward phase. 
üîπ 2025 MVRV values significantly below past cycle peaks (>3.5), even during growth above $100,000, indicating structural undervaluation compared to previous market tops. 
üîπ Analysts also noted 2025 MVRV stayed in neutral or slightly bullish zone, not extreme overbought ‚Äî coincided with moderate BTC price consolidation. 
Early 2025 conclusion:
On 01.01.2025 BTC still in post-peak or resuming trend with MVRV above 1 but far from extreme oversold/overvaluation. Reflected balance between profitable holders and sustainable accumulation zone. 

How MVRV affects Bitcoin price
Direct effect
MVRV doesn't move price directly but well reflects market psychology and participants' readiness to take profit or hold positions:
High MVRV (2.5‚Äì4+) ‚Üí nerves/overheating signal, often coincides with local peaks followed by corrections. 
Low MVRV (~1‚Äì2) ‚Üí market less overbought; often coincides with accumulation zones and upward reversal potential. 
MVRV < 1 ‚Üí historically corresponded to capitulation and strong market bottoms. 
MVRV-Z Score shows how extreme current state relative to market history. When Z-Score high (‚â•7), cycle maximum; when Z-Score low (‚â§0), potential capitulation/bottom point. 
Relative holder profit/loss
MVRV explains unrealized profit sitting with holders: greater difference between market and realized value ‚Äî higher psychological selling pressure. Key behavioral explanation why corrections follow peaks. 

MVRV forecasts and BTC impact
Short-term (weeks ‚Äî months)
If MVRV stays in ~1.8‚Äì2.5 range:
Neutral-bullish or accumulation signal ‚Äî market has room for growth without obvious extreme overbought. 
Strong upward price movement without MVRV exceeding past cyclical peaks (>3.5) may indicate weakness in driving force. 
Short-term impact:
‚Äî MVRV rising above historical norms ‚Üí possible corrections.
‚Äî Decline or stabilization around 1.8‚Äì2.2 ‚Üí may serve as support and accumulation signal. 
Medium-term (months ‚Äî year)
If economic context improves and BTC starts growing:
üîπ MVRV will gradually rise. Historically before major rallies MVRV transitioned through neutral zones to higher levels (past cycles >3). 
üîπ If MVRV reaches >3 zone ‚Äî historically overbought market signal potentially preceding correction. 
Medium-term forecast: MVRV growth with strong BTC rally alongside expanding investor profits.
Long-term (year and beyond)
Long horizon MVRV helps assess fundamental market cycle:
‚Ä¢ If BTC valued significantly above aggregate realized value, usually coincides with cycle peak periods and correction risks.
‚Ä¢ If MVRV returns to ~1 or below, usually correlates with long accumulation phases and fundamental growth.
Long-term forecast:
If Bitcoin receives sustained capital inflow (e.g. via ETF, institutional demand, supply reduction), MVRV may rise reflecting network total value and holder profit growth.

Market and BTC price impact
Short-term impact
MVRV in neutral zone reflects absence of extreme sentiment supporting calm but potential BTC growth. May help market hold support levels without panic selling stage.
Medium-term impact
MVRV transition above average levels may:
Increase selling pressure from traders with large unrealized profit.
Serve as warning of approaching local cycle tops.
Long-term impact
Slow MVRV rise long-term confirms long-term investor position growth and may contribute to sustainable BTC price rise ‚Äî until extreme emotion levels reached (overheated market). Historically major cycle ends correlated with extremely high MVRV.
Short summary
‚úî MVRV shows BTC market value ratio to realized value ‚Äî assesses if market profitable/loss-making and if current price extreme.
‚úî On 01.01.2025 MVRV in neutral zone reflecting balance between price and fundamental value.
‚úî Short-term: neutral MVRV supports movement without hard overbought conditions.
‚úî Medium-term: MVRV growth with BTC indicates market strengthening. 
‚úî Long-term: extreme MVRV values signal cycle peaks/corrections, moderate values indicate market health.

ANALIZA NA 31.12.2025.       Neposrednih podatkov za 01.01.2025 specifiƒçno zdaj te≈æko najti (on-chain metrike objavljajo platforme), a na osnovi analitik konca 2025 lahko rekonstruiramo splo≈°ne trende:
üîπ Podatki konca 2025 ka≈æejo, da se je MVRV opazno spustil v obmoƒçje ~1,8‚Äì2,0 po korekciji cene, kar se zgodovinsko povezuje s previsoko vrednostjo v prehod do cone mo≈ænega dna ali zaƒçetka vzpona. 
üîπ Vrednosti MVRV leta 2025 so bile bistveno ni≈æje od vrhov preteklih ciklov (>3,5), celo med rastjo nad $100.000, kar ka≈æe na strukturno podcenjenost v primerjavi s prej≈°njimi tr≈ænimi vrhovi. 
üîπ Analitiki so tudi opazili, da je MVRV leta 2025 ostal v nevtralni ali rahlo bikovski coni, ne v coni ekstremnega pregrevanja ‚Äî to se je ujemalo z zmerno konsolidacijo cene BTC. 
Zakljuƒçek za zaƒçetek 2025:
Na 01.01.2025 je bil BTC ≈°e vedno v post-vrhovski ali obnovljivi trendu, z metrike MVRV nad 1, a daleƒç od ekstremnih podcenjenosti/previsokih vrednosti. To je odra≈æalo ravnovesje med dobiƒçkonosnimi imetniki in cono trajnostnega kopiƒçenja. 

Kako MVRV vpliva na ceno bitcoina
Neposreden uƒçinek
MVRV ne premika cene neposredno, a dobro odra≈æa tr≈æno psihologijo in pripravljenost udele≈æencev za fiksiranje dobiƒçka ali dr≈æanje pozicij:
Visok MVRV (2,5‚Äì4+) ‚Üí signal ≈æivƒçnosti/pregrevanja, pogosto sovpada z lokalnimi vrhovi, za katerimi sledijo korekcije. 
Nizek MVRV (~1‚Äì2) ‚Üí trg manj pregret; pogosto sovpada z conami kopiƒçenja in potencialom obraƒçuna navzgor. 
MVRV < 1 ‚Üí zgodovinsko je ustrezalo kapitulaciji in moƒçnim tr≈ænim dnom. 
MVRV-Z Score ka≈æe, kako ekstremno je trenutno stanje glede na zgodovino trga. Ko je Z-Score visok (‚â•7), cikliƒçni maksimum; ko je Z-Score nizek (‚â§0), potencialna toƒçka kapitulacije/dno. 
Relativni dobiƒçek/izguba imetnikov
MVRV pojasnjuje nere–∞–ª–∏–∑iran dobiƒçek pri imetnikih: veƒçja razlika med tr≈æno in realizirano vrednostjo ‚Äî vi≈°ji psiholo≈°ki pritisk na prodajo. Kljuƒçno vedenjsko pojasnilo, zakaj korekcije sledijo vrhom. 

Napovedi MVRV in vpliv na BTC
Kratkoroƒçni (tedni ‚Äî meseci)
ƒåe MVRV ostane v obmoƒçju ~1,8‚Äì2,5:
Nevtralno-bikovski ali kopiƒçni signal ‚Äî trg ima prostor za rast brez oƒçitne ekstremne pregretosti. 
Moƒçno navzgor gibanje cene brez MVRV nad pretekle cikliƒçne vrhove (>3,5) lahko ka≈æe na ≈°ibkost gonilne sile. 
Kratkoroƒçni vpliv:
‚Äî Povi≈°anje MVRV nad zgodovinska normanja ‚Üí mo≈æne korekcije.
‚Äî Padec ali stabilizacija okoli 1,8‚Äì2,2 ‚Üí lahko slu≈æi kot podpora in signal kopiƒçenja. 
Srednjeroƒçni (meseci ‚Äî leto)
ƒåe se ekonomski kontekst izbolj≈°a in BTC zaƒçne rasti:
üîπ MVRV se bo postopoma zvi≈°eval. Zgodovinsko pred velikimi raliji je MVRV pre≈°el skozi nevralne cone na vi≈°je nivoje (pretekli cikli >3). 
üîπ ƒåe MVRV dose≈æe cono >3 ‚Äî zgodovinsko pregret trg signal, ki lahko predhodno korekciji. 
Srednjeroƒçna napoved: rast MVRV ob moƒçnem BTC raliju skupaj z raz≈°irjanjem dobiƒçkov vlagateljev.
Dolgoroƒçni (leto in veƒç)
Na dolgem obzorju MVRV pomaga oceniti fundamentalni tr≈æni cikel:
‚Ä¢ ƒåe je BTC bistveno dra≈æji od svoje skupne realizirane vrednosti, obiƒçajno sovpada s cikliƒçnimi vrhovi in tveganji korekcij.
‚Ä¢ ƒåe se MVRV vrne k ~1 ali ni≈æje, obiƒçajno sovpada z dolgimi fazami kopiƒçenja in fundamentalne rasti.
Dolgoroƒçna napoved:
ƒåe bo bitcoin prejel trajnosten priliv kapitala (npr. prek ETF, institucionalnega povpra≈°evanja, zmanj≈°anja ponudbe), se lahko MVRV zvi≈°uje, odra≈æajoƒç rast skupne vrednosti mre≈æe in dobiƒçkov imetnikov.

Vpliv na trge in ceno BTC
Kratkoroƒçni vpliv
MVRV v nevtralni coni odra≈æa odsotnost ekstremnih razpolo≈æenj, kar podpira umirjeno, a potencialno rast BTC. To lahko pomaga trgu dr≈æati nivoje podpore brez paniƒçne faze prodaje.
Srednjeroƒçni vpliv
Prehod MVRV nad povpreƒçne nivoje lahko:
Poveƒça prodajni pritisk trgovcev z velikim nere–∞–ª–∏–∑iranimi dobiƒçki.
Slu≈æi kot opozorilo pred pribli≈æevanjem lokalnih cikliƒçnih vrhov.
Dolgoroƒçni vpliv
Poƒçasno zvi≈°evanje MVRV dolgoroƒçno potrjuje rast pozicij dolgoroƒçnih vlagateljev in lahko prispeva k trajnostnemu dvigu cene BTC ‚Äî dokler ne dose≈æe ekstremnih ƒçustvenih nivojev (pregret trg). Zgodovinsko so veliki cikli konƒçali s korelacijo z ekstremno visokimi MVRV.
Kratek povzetek
‚úî MVRV prikazuje razmerje tr≈æne vrednosti BTC do njegove realizirane vrednosti ‚Äî oceni, ali je trg dobiƒçkonosen/izgubel in ali je trenutna cena ekstremna.
‚úî Na 01.01.2025 je bil MVRV v nevtralni coni, odra≈æajoƒç ravnovesje med ceno in fundamentalno vrednostjo.
‚úî Kratkoroƒçno: nevtralni MVRV podpira gibanje brez trdih pregretih stanj.
‚úî Srednjeroƒçno: rast MVRV z BTC nakazuje krepitev trga. 
‚úî Dolgoroƒçno: ekstremne vrednosti MVRV signalizirajo cikle vrhov in korekcij, zmerne vrednosti pa zdravje trga.

extra.en:
MVRV (Market Value to Realized Value)
MVRV Ratio is on-chain metric showing how much current BTC market capitalization exceeds Realized Cap.
Market Value ‚Äî current BTC price √ó circulating coins.
Realized Value ‚Äî sum of prices at which coins last actually moved on blockchain (i.e. their 'cost basis').
Thus:
MVRV = Market Cap/Realized Cap
Metric essence: shows aggregate BTC holders' unrealized profit/loss and helps assess if market overvalued, undervalued or neutral.
Intuitive interpretation
MVRV > 1 ‚Äî most holders profitable, may signal overvaluation (historically significant peaks often >~3.5).
MVRV ‚âà 1 ‚Äî current price close to 'fundamental' network average cost (balanced market).
MVRV < 1 ‚Äî most holders losing ‚Üí potential bottom/capitulation zone.
Metric similar to P/E for cryptocurrencies serving market 'nerves' level assessment. (IFCCI)
Market also uses MVRV-Z Score ‚Äî standard deviation between market value and realized giving extreme market condition view
extra.si:
MVRV (Tr≈æna vrednost na realizirano vrednost)
Razmerje MVRV je on-chain metrika, ki prikazuje, koliko trenutna tr≈æna kapitalizacija BTC presega realizirano kapitalizacijo (Realized Cap).
Tr≈æna vrednost (Market Value) ‚Äî trenutna cena BTC √ó ≈°tevilo kovancev v obtoku.
Realizirana vrednost (Realized Value) ‚Äî vsota cen, pri katerih so se kovanci nazadnje dejansko gibali na blockchainu (tj. njihova 'osnovna cena').
Torej:
MVRV = Market Cap/Realized Cap
Bistvo metrike: prikazuje nere–∞–ª–∏–∑iran dobiƒçek/izgubo imetnikov BTC v celoti in pomaga oceniti, ali je trg previsoko, podcenjen ali nevtralen.
Intuitivna interpretacija
MVRV > 1 ‚Äî veƒçina imetnikov v dobiƒçku, lahko signalizira previsoko vrednost (zgodovinsko pomembni vrhovi pogosto >~3,5).
MVRV ‚âà 1 ‚Äî trenutna cena blizu 'fundamentalni' povpreƒçni stro≈°ki mre≈æe (uravnote≈æen trg).
MVRV < 1 ‚Äî veƒçina imetnikov v izgubi ‚Üí potencialna cona dna/kapitulacije.
Metrika podobna P/E za kriptovalute slu≈æi ocenjevanju nivoja 'nervoznosti' trga. (IFCCI)
Trg uporablja tudi MVRV-Z Score ‚Äî standardni odklon med tr≈æno vrednostjo in realizirano za pogled na ekstremne tr≈æne pogoje

ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2025.      NUPL data for early 2025 available only in historical charts, but historical patterns allow reconstructing picture:
Early 2025 NUPL in moderately positive zone, likely 0.3‚Äì0.6 range, indicating most participants held BTC with unrealized profit but not at extreme 'euphoric peaks'. Reflects continuation of bullish cycle without 'crowd madness'. 
Such NUPL range means:
majority participants profitable but not enough for mass profit-taking;
market likely in accumulation or moderate trend phase, not at peak.
Typical for early or middle phases of rising cycle.

Forecast and BTC price impact
Short-term perspective (weeks ‚Äî months)
If end of cycle NUPL stays moderately positive (e.g. 0.3‚Äì0.6):
Sentiment still predominantly positive ‚Äî many holders profitable but not at extreme.
Price may continue range-bound or moderate bullish movements since excessive profit-taking pressure absent.
If NUPL starts rising sharply above 0.75, may indicate psychological market overheating and increased correction probability.
If NUPL starts declining (toward 0 or negative values), may indicate growing fear and capitulation typically accompanying corrections. 
Price impact:
Moderate NUPL supports sustainable trend, absence of extremes reduces sudden correction risk.
If NUPL shows overheating signs, may exacerbate profit-taking and short-term price pressure.

Medium-term perspective (3‚Äì12 months)
Medium-term NUPL serves as market cycle and profit/loss distribution indicator:
NUPL growth trend followed by decline may indicate reversal from euphoria to profit-taking.
If NUPL low after correction period, may correspond to accumulation zone where experienced holders don't sell, market prepares for next rise.
Stable moderate or rising NUPL supports positive participant sentiment contributing to gradual trend expansion.
Medium-term BTC impact:
Positive NUPL dynamics may reinforce participant confidence and capital inflow.
If NUPL declining, can interpret as growing fear and rally slowdown risk. 

Long-term perspective (year and beyond)
Long-term NUPL reflects **market health and accumulation/distribution cycles**:
High values may precede market peaks when significant capital sits on unrealized profit.
Low or negative values often correspond to cycle bottoms when capital redistributes, new entries occur at lower levels.
Moderate values may indicate stable trend without extremes. 
Such analysis helps assess if investors in accumulation state (long-term hold) or inclined toward profit-taking.

Final conclusion
What NUPL is: metric reflects BTC participants' net unrealized profit/loss helping assess market psychology and reversal potential. 
How affects price: NUPL itself doesn't move price but reflects holders' readiness to take profit or endure losses, indirectly correlating with market cycles. 
01.01.2025 analysis: moderately positive NUPL ‚Äî not extreme, consistent with sustainable BTC trend without final euphoria. 
Short-term: moderate values support price stability, sharp NUPL rise above 0.75 may signal correction risks.
Medium-term: positive NUPL reinforces ongoing trend; metric decline warns of potential corrections.
Long-term: extreme values signal cycle peaks/bottoms, moderate values indicate balanced market.

ANALIZA na 01.01.2025.      Podatki NUPL za zaƒçetek 2025 na voljo le v zgodovinskih grafikonih, a zgodovinski vzorci omogoƒçajo rekonstrukcijo:
Na zaƒçetek 2025 je bil NUPL v zmerno pozitivni coni, verjetno v obmoƒçju 0,3‚Äì0,6, kar je kazalo, da je veƒçina udele≈æencev dr≈æala BTC z nerealiziranim dobiƒçkom, a ne na nivoju ekstremnih 'evforiƒçnih vrhov'. To odra≈æa nadaljevanje bikovskega cikla, brez 'norosti mno≈æice'. 
Tak obseg NUPL pomeni:
veƒçina udele≈æencev v dobiƒçku, a ne toliko, da bi mno≈æiƒçno fiksirali dobiƒçek;
trg verjetno v fazi kopiƒçenja ali zmernega trenda, ne na vrhu.
Tipiƒçno za zgodnje ali srednje faze nara≈°ƒçajoƒçega cikla.

Napoved in vpliv na ceno BTC
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (tedni ‚Äî meseci)
ƒåe na koncu cikla NUPL ostane zmerno pozitiven (npr. 0,3‚Äì0,6):
Razpolo≈æenja ≈°e vedno prete≈æno pozitivna ‚Äî mnogi imetniki v dobiƒçku, a ne v ekstremu.
Cena lahko nadaljuje obmoƒçne ali zmerno bikovske gibe, saj pritisk mno≈æiƒçnega fiksiranja dobiƒçka odsoten.
ƒåe NUPL nenadoma naraste nad 0,75, lahko ka≈æe na psiholo≈°ko pregreto tr≈æno stanje in poveƒçano verjetnost korekcije.
ƒåe NUPL zaƒçne padati (proti 0 ali negativnim vrednostim), lahko ka≈æe na nara≈°ƒçajoƒçi strah in kapitulacijo, kar obiƒçajno spremlja korekcije. 
Vpliv na ceno:
Zmeren NUPL podpira trajnostni trend, odsotnost ekstremov zmanj≈°uje tveganje nenadnih korekcij.
ƒåe NUPL poka≈æe znake pregrevanja, lahko poslab≈°a fiksiranje dobiƒçka in kratkoroƒçno pritiska na ceno.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (3‚Äì12 mesecev)
V srednjermu NUPL slu≈æi kot indikator, ki sledi tr≈ænemu ciklu in razporeditvi dobiƒçka/izgube:
Trend rasti NUPL s kasnej≈°im padcem lahko ka≈æe na obraƒçun od evforije k fiksiranju dobiƒçka.
ƒåe je NUPL nizek po obdobju korekcije, lahko ustreza coni kopiƒçenja, kjer izku≈°eni imetniki ne prodajajo, trg pa se pripravlja na naslednji vzpon.
Stabilno zmeren ali nara≈°ƒçajoƒç NUPL podpira pozitivno razpolo≈æenje udele≈æencev, kar prispeva k postopni ≈°iritvi trenda.
Srednjeroƒçni vpliv na BTC:
Pozitivna dinamika NUPL lahko okrepi zaupanje udele≈æencev in priliv kapitala.
ƒåe NUPL pada, lahko razumemo kot nara≈°ƒçajoƒçi strah in tveganje upoƒçasnitve BTC ralija. 

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (leto in veƒç)
Dolgoroƒçno NUPL odra≈æa **zdravje trga in cikle kopiƒçenja/distribucije**:
Visoke vrednosti lahko predhodijo tr≈æne vrhove, ko znaten del kapitala sedi na nerealiziranem dobiƒçku.
Nizke ali negativne vrednosti pogosto ustrezajo cikliƒçnim dnom, ko se kapital prerazdeli, novi vnosi pa se zgodijo na ni≈æjih nivojih.
Zmerne vrednosti lahko ka≈æejo na stabilen trend brez ekstremov. 
Tak≈°na analiza pomaga oceniti, ali so vlagatelji v stanju kopiƒçenja (dolgoroƒçno dr≈æanje) ali nagnjeni k fiksiranju dobiƒçka.

Konƒçni zakljuƒçek
Kaj je NUPL: metrika odra≈æa ƒçisto nerealizirano dobiƒçek/izgubo udele≈æencev BTC, kar pomaga oceniti tr≈æno psihologijo in potencial obraƒçunov. 
Kako vpliva na ceno: NUPL sam ne premika cene, a odra≈æa pripravljenost imetnikov za fiksiranje dobiƒçka ali prena≈°anje izgub, kar posredno korelira s tr≈ænimi cikli. 
Analiza na 01.01.2025: zmerno pozitiven NUPL ‚Äî ne ekstremen, skladen z trajnostnim trendom BTC brez konƒçne evforije. 
Kratkoroƒçno: zmerne vrednosti podpirajo stabilnost cene, nenaden skok NUPL nad 0,75 lahko signalizira tveganja korekcije.
Srednjeroƒçno: pozitiven NUPL krepi nadaljevanje trenda; padec metrike opozarja na mo≈æne korekcije.
Dolgoroƒçno: ekstremne vrednosti signalizirajo vrhove ali dno ciklov, zmerne vrednosti pa uravnote≈æen trg.

extra.en:
NUPL (Net Unrealized Profit/Loss) is on-chain indicator showing Bitcoin market participants' net unrealized profit or loss. Assesses total profit/loss holders would have theoretically if sold BTC at current market price. Calculated as difference between market capitalization (Market Cap) and realized capitalization (Realized Cap), divided by market capitalization:
NUPL = (Market Cap‚àíRealized Cap)‚Äã/Market Cap
where:
Market Cap ‚Äî current price √ó circulating coins.
Realized Cap ‚Äî sum of prices at which coins last moved on network (accounts for holders' actual entry prices). 
Metric shows market psychology: how much holders profitable or losing, used to judge potential reversal points or trend continuation.

How NUPL affects Bitcoin price
NUPL reflects sentiment and market pressure through holder profit/loss:
High positive values (e.g. >0.75) usually show most holders in significant profit ‚Üí may indicate overheated market and growing profit-taking risk.
Moderate positive values indicate most holders profitable but without extremes ‚Äî often correlates with trend continuation or 'optimism' stage.
Values near zero or negative mean many holders losing ‚Üí possible capitulation, historically linked to accumulation zones and price minimums.
NUPL helps interpret average holder expectations and emotions: higher unrealized profit, greater participant incentives to take profit, thus potential selling pressure.
Not direct price movement trigger but metric often precedes market cycle changes
extra.si:
NUPL (ƒåista nerealizirana dobiƒçek/izguba) je on-chain indikator, ki prikazuje ƒçisto nerealizirano dobiƒçek ali izgubo udele≈æencev trga Bitcoin. Oceni, koliko dobiƒçka ali izgube bi imetniki imeli teoretiƒçno v celoti, ƒçe bi prodali svoje BTC po trenutni tr≈æni ceni. Metrika se izraƒçuna kot razlika med tr≈æno kapitalizacijo (Market Cap) in realizirano kapitalizacijo (Realized Cap), deljena z tr≈æno kapitalizacijo:
NUPL = (Market Cap‚àíRealized Cap)‚Äã/Market Cap
kjer:
Market Cap ‚Äî trenutna cena √ó ≈°tevilo kovancev v obtoku.
Realized Cap ‚Äî vsota cen, pri katerih so se kovanci nazadnje gibali po mre≈æi (upo≈°teva dejanske vstopne cene imetnikov). 
Metrika prikazuje tr≈æno psihologijo: koliko so imetniki v dobiƒçku ali izgubi, kar se uporablja za presojo potencialnih toƒçk obraƒçuna ali nadaljevanja trenda.

Kako NUPL vpliva na ceno Bitcoina
NUPL odra≈æa razpolo≈æenja in pritisk na trg prek dobiƒçka/izgube imetnikov:
Visoke pozitivne vrednosti (npr. >0,75) obiƒçajno ka≈æejo, da je veƒçina imetnikov v znatni dobiƒçku ‚Üí lahko ka≈æe na pregret trg in nara≈°ƒçajoƒçe tveganje fiksiranja dobiƒçka.
Zmerne pozitivne vrednosti ka≈æejo, da je veƒçina imetnikov v dobiƒçku, a brez ekstremov ‚Äî pogosto korelira z nadaljevanjem trenda ali fazo 'optimizma'.
Vrednosti blizu niƒçle ali negativne pomenijo, da mnogi imetniki v izgubi ‚Üí mo≈æna kapitulacija, zgodovinsko povezana z zoni kopiƒçenja in minimalnimi cenami.
NUPL pomaga interpretirati povpreƒçna priƒçakovanja in ƒçustva imetnikov BTC: vi≈°ji nerealiziran dobiƒçek pomeni veƒçje spodbude udele≈æencev za fiksiranje dobiƒçka, torej potencialni prodajni pritisk.
Ni neposreden spro≈æilec gibanja cene, a metrika pogosto predhodno spremembam tr≈ænih ciklov
