ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2025.     Exact SOPR values for early 2025 easily found on on-chain platforms (e.g. Bitbo, Glassnode, TradingView), but based on historical metric behavior can give qualitative picture:
üìç Early 2025 SOPR above 1, meaning significant portion of moved Bitcoin sold at profit. Typical for recovery/bull markets after corrections when holders take profit but buyers ready to enter further.
Such SOPR position consistent with early 2025 BTC exiting capitulation phases of previous corrections, market transitioning to moderate growth/accumulation stage

SOPR Bitcoin price impact forecast
Short-term perspective (days ‚Äî weeks)
What SOPR shows now:
If SOPR steadily above 1, indicates market participants taking profit without extreme magnitudes.
When SOPR slowly approaches 1 after higher value period, may indicate profit-taking slowdown and potential consolidation zone. 
BTC short-term price impact:
SOPR > 1 without extreme growth ‚Üí market may continue upward movement or maintain range as most participants no selling loss pressure.
SOPR returns to ~1 after correction ‚Üí signal profit-taking slowing, possible local correction bottom.
Sharp SOPR drops < 1 ‚Üí may appear only in panic selloffs, no clear such signals yet. 
Short-term summary: SOPR supports range consolidation or moderate uptrend if stays above 1 without sharp spikes.

Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì6 months)
SOPR may indicate distribution and capital reallocation phases:
If indicator steadily stays above 1 with new local peaks, signals sellers continue taking profit potentially pressuring price short-term.
Subsequent SOPR decline to 1 without sharp drops below shows traders stopped actively taking profit ‚Äî often coincides with accumulation stage before next growth phase.
BTC medium-term impact:
Moderate profit-taking (SOPR > 1) ‚Üí sideways or minor corrections.
If SOPR doesn't drop below 1 ‚Äî fundamental signal for trend continuation.
If SOPR falls below 1 and stays ‚Äî more bearish signal reducing medium-term prospects. 

Long-term perspective (6‚Äì12+ months)
Long cycles SOPR helps identify market stages:
High SOPR (with sustained peaks) traditionally accompanies macro-local tops when many holders take profit.
SOPR return to ~1 after corrections in long trend may indicate 'profit sellers gone' creating base for next bull cycle.
Long-term price impact:
SOPR staying above 1 slowly approaching average may signal sustainable trend extension.
If long-term SOPR drops below 1 and stays ‚Äî sign of deeper capitulation phases and potential minimum price. 

Key SOPR levels to monitor
SOPR Level
Meaning
Potential Signal
>1.0
Average transaction profit
Possible selling pressure, normal trend
‚âà1.0
Break-even
Transition phases, consolidation
<1.0
Loss selling
Capitulation, market bottom

SOPR doesn't give exact entry/exit levels but very useful for overall participant sentiment assessment.
Summary
SOPR ‚Äî metric showing if BTC participants sell at profit or loss, reflecting market sentiment.
01.01.2025 SOPR > 1 corresponds to many sellers taking profit ‚Äî characteristic for growth/consolidation stages. 
Short-term: SOPR above 1 supports no panic and moderate trend.
Medium-term: stable SOPR above 1 gradually approaching 1 may indicate accumulation/profit-taking reduction phase.
Long-term: sustained SOPR above 1 without extreme spikes helps determine market cycle position (accumulation ‚Üí distribution).
text.si:
ANALIZA na 01.01.2025.     Natanƒçne vrednosti SOPR za zaƒçetek 2025 lahko enostavno najde≈° na on-chain platformah (npr. Bitbo, Glassnode, TradingView), a na osnovi zgodovinskega vedenja metrike lahko damo kvalitativno sliko:
üìç Na zaƒçetku 2025 je bil SOPR nad 1, kar pomeni, da je znaten del premaknjenih Bitcoinov prodajal z dobiƒçkom. Tipiƒçno za faze okrevanja/bikovski trg po korekcijah, ko imetniki fiksirajo dobiƒçek, kupci pa so pripravljeni vstopati naprej.
Tak polo≈æaj SOPR je skladen z dejstvom, da je na zaƒçetku 2025 BTC ≈æe izstopil iz kapitulacijskih faz preteklih korekcij, trg pa pre≈°el v zmerno rastno/kopiƒçni stadij

Napoved vpliva SOPR na ceno Bitcoina
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (dni ‚Äî tedni)
Kaj SOPR ka≈æe zdaj:
ƒåe SOPR stabilno nad 1, ka≈æe, da udele≈æenci trga fiksirajo dobiƒçek, a brez ekstremnih vrednosti.
Ko SOPR poƒçasi pribli≈æuje 1 po obdobju vi≈°jih vrednosti, lahko ka≈æe na ustavitev fiksiranja dobiƒçka in potencialno cono konsolidacije. 
Kratkoroƒçni vpliv na ceno BTC:
SOPR > 1 brez ekstremne rasti ‚Üí trg lahko nadaljuje gibanje navzgor ali ohranja obmoƒçje, saj veƒçina udele≈æencev nima pritiska prodaje v izgubo.
SOPR se vraƒça k ~1 po korekciji ‚Üí signal, da se fiksiranje dobiƒçka upoƒçasni, mo≈æen lokalni spodnji meja korekcije.
Ostri padci SOPR < 1 ‚Üí pojavljajo se le pri paniƒçnih razprodajah, takih jasnih signalov ≈°e ni. 
Kratkoroƒçni povzetek: SOPR podpira obmoƒçno konsolidacijo ali zmeren vzponi trend, ƒçe ostane nad 1 brez ostrih skokov.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
SOPR lahko ka≈æe na faze distribucije in prerazporeditve kapitala:
ƒåe indikator stabilno ostane nad 1 z novimi lokalnimi vrhovi, bo signal, da prodajalci nadaljujejo fiksiranje dobiƒçka, kar lahko kratkoroƒçno pritiska na ceno.
Nadaljnji padec SOPR k 1 brez ostrih padcev pod njega bo pokazal, da trgovci prenehali aktivno fiksirati dobiƒçek ‚Äî to pogosto sovpada z kopiƒçno fazo pred naslednjo rastno fazo.
Vpliv na BTC:
Zmerno fiksiranje dobiƒçka (SOPR > 1) ‚Üí stransko gibanje ali manj≈°e korekcije.
ƒåe SOPR ne pade pod 1 ‚Äî fundamentalni signal za nadaljevanje trenda rasti.
ƒåe SOPR pade pod 1 in tam ostane ‚Äî bolj medvedji signal, ki zmanj≈°uje srednjeroƒçne perspektive. 

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (6‚Äì12+ mesecev)
Na dolgih ciklih SOPR pogosto pomaga identificirati tr≈æne stadije:
Visok SOPR (z vzdr≈æljivimi vrhovi) tradicionalno spremlja makro-lokalne vrhove, ko veliko imetnikov fiksira dobiƒçek.
Vrnitev SOPR k ~1 po korekcijah v dolgem trendu lahko ka≈æe, da so 'prodajalci dobiƒçka od≈°li', kar ustvarja osnovo za naslednji bikovski cikel.
Dolgoroƒçni vpliv na ceno:
SOPR, ki ostaja nad 1 in poƒçasi pribli≈æuje povpreƒçje, lahko signalizira podalj≈°anje trajnostnega trenda.
ƒåe dolgoroƒçno SOPR pade pod 1 in tam ostane ‚Äî znak globljih faz kapitulacije in potencialne minimalne cene. 

Kljuƒçne nivoje SOPR za spremljanje
SOPR nivo
Pomen
Potencialni signal
>1.0
Povpreƒçen dobiƒçek po transakcijah
Mo≈æni prodajni pritisk, normalen trend
‚âà1.0
Break-even
Prehodne faze, konsolidacija
<1.0
Prodaja v izgubo
Kapitulacija, tr≈æno dno

SOPR ne daje natanƒçnih nivojev vstopa/izhoda, a je zelo uporaben za oceno splo≈°nega razpolo≈æenja udele≈æencev.
Povzetek
SOPR ‚Äî metrika, ki ka≈æe, ali udele≈æenci prodajajo BTC z dobiƒçkom ali izgubo, kar odra≈æa tr≈æno razpolo≈æenje.
Na 01.01.2025 SOPR > 1, kar ustreza dejstvu, da so mnogi prodajalci fiksirali dobiƒçek ‚Äî znaƒçilno za stadije rasti/konsolidacije. 
Kratkoroƒçno: SOPR nad 1 podpira odsotnost panike in zmeren trend.
Srednjeroƒçno: stabilen SOPR nad 1 s postopnim pribli≈æevanjem k 1 lahko ka≈æe na kopiƒçno fazo/zmanj≈°anje fiksiranja dobiƒçka.
Dolgoroƒçno: vzdr≈æljiv SOPR nad 1 brez ekstremnih skokov pomaga doloƒçiti, kje se trg nahaja v ciklu (kopiƒçenje ‚Üí distribucija).

extra.en:
SOPR (Spent Output Profit Ratio) is on-chain indicator measuring if Bitcoin market participants sell coins at profit or loss. Compares price at which BTC spent (sold) with price at which acquired (created). Simply: when Bitcoin transferred/sold, SOPR shows average profit/loss sellers realize. 
Formula:
SOPR= sale price / purchase price
Interpretation:
SOPR > 1 ‚Äî average BTC sold at profit;
SOPR ‚âà 1 ‚Äî sellers average break-even;
SOPR < 1 ‚Äî BTC sold at loss.
1.0 level often key psychological threshold. 

Why SOPR important
SOPR reflects real participant behavior (not just price), showing when sellers take profit or losses. Helps understand if market dominated by optimism/profit-taking or fear/capitulation. SOPR not direct market driver but sentiment indicator often preceding price reversals
extra.si:
SOPR (Razmerje dobiƒçka porabljenih izhodov) je on-chain indikator, ki meri, ali udele≈æenci trga Bitcoin prodajajo kovance z dobiƒçkom ali izgubo. Primerja ceno, po kateri je bil BTC porabljen (prodan), s ceno, po kateri je bil pridobljen (ustvarjen). Preprosto: ko se Bitcoin prenese/prodaja, SOPR poka≈æe povpreƒçen dobiƒçek/izgubo, ki jo realizirajo prodajalci. 
Formula:
SOPR= cena pri prodaji / cena nakupa
Interpretacija:
SOPR > 1 ‚Äî povpreƒçno BTC prodan z dobiƒçkom;
SOPR ‚âà 1 ‚Äî prodajalci povpreƒçno na breakeven;
SOPR < 1 ‚Äî BTC prodan z izgubo.
Nivo 1.0 pogosto kljuƒçni psiholo≈°ki prag. 

Zakaj je SOPR pomemben
SOPR odra≈æa dejansko vedenje udele≈æencev (ne le ceno), ka≈æe, kdaj prodajalci fiksirajo dobiƒçek ali izgubo. Pomaga razumeti, ali trg dominira optimizem/fiksiranje dobiƒçka ali strah/kapitulacija. SOPR ni neposreden gonilec trga, ampak indikator razpolo≈æenja, ki pogosto predhodno cenovnim obraƒçunom

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2025.      Early 2025 Realized Price value estimated indirectly from historical data and metric charts:
üìç Early 2025 Realized Price significantly below market price since Bitcoin experienced substantial growth in 2024‚Äì2025 and many coins bought at lower prices before/during uptrend. Means most holders profitable.
This market price vs Realized Price gap typical for post-correction recovery and growth continuation stages:
many old coins held, not moved;
average holder cost basis remains below current levels;
provides fundamental participant expectation support. 

Forecast and BTC price impact
Short-term perspective (weeks ‚Äî months)
If market price stays above Realized Price:
Dominance of profit among most participants may reduce emotional selling.
‚Äî Corrections often limited as many holders unwilling to sell at loss.
‚Äî BTC price typically finds support around or above Realized Price.
However if market price sharply approaches Realized Price, breaking below may intensify fear wave and panic selling before support found. 
Short-term summary: BTC price range likely supported above Realized Price level, corrections less deep if price doesn't go significantly below this metric.

Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì6 months)
Realized Price moves slowly as reflects historical entry distribution (cost basis).
Means:
Smooth Realized Price growth indicates holders generally buying/moving BTC at higher prices signaling accumulation and long-term confidence.
Realized price growth slowdown ‚Äî market consolidation sign and participant readiness to wait for higher profit.
üìà Bull phases Realized Price usually grows with market but slower than market price. If market price stays above Realized for months, sustainable trend and long-term participant accumulation signal. 
Medium-term conclusion: BTC support maintained while participant risk appetite high and market-Realized price gap significant.

Long-term perspective (6 months and beyond)
Realized Price often serves dynamic fundamental base:
‚úîÔ∏è If BTC price significantly above Realized long period, many holders profitable position strengthening aggregate market asset confidence.
‚úîÔ∏è If Realized price grows long-term, average 'buyer' updating cost basis toward higher levels historically correlates with new bull market phases transition.
If BTC price descends crossing Realized Price downward, may signal market phase change and potential long-term decline (new participants taking losses, capital redistribution). Bitcoin Magazine Pro

Practical impact conclusions
Scenario
Interpretation
Price Impact
Price > Realized Price
Market leaders profitable
Support, less deep corrections
Price ‚âà Realized Price
Entry-exit balance
Potential support/reversal zone
Price < Realized Price
Holders losing
Fear intensification, possible capitulations

üìå Important: Realized Price itself doesn't generate entry/exit signals, fundamental benchmark helping assess overall market state and likely support/resistance areas.
Summary
Realized Price ‚Äî average price at which BTC last moved between wallets; network average entry indicator. Bitbo Charts
Price impact: if market price above, most holders profitable ‚Üí corrections softened; if below, fear intensified and possible capitulations. Bitcoin Magazine Pro
01.01.2025: Realized price significantly below current market signaling broad holder profit margin and fundamental trend support. Bitbo Charts
Short-term: serves support area indicator; Realized-market price gap helps assess correction risk.
Medium-term: sustained price above Realized signals trend continuation; downward crossover may warn phase change.
Long-term: Realized price growth with market indicates accumulation and BTC foundation strengthening in current cycle phase.

ANALIZA na 01.01.2025.      Natanƒçno vrednost Realized Price na zaƒçetku 2025 lahko posredno ocenimo iz zgodovinskih podatkov in grafov metrike:
üìç Realized Price na zaƒçetku 2025 je bil bistveno ni≈æji od tr≈æne cene, saj je bitcoin do≈æivel znatno rast v letih 2024‚Äì2025 in so mnogi kovanci kupljeni po ni≈æjih cenah pred/duriranja vzpona. To pomeni, da je bila veƒçina imetnikov v dobiƒçku.
Ta razmik med tr≈æno ceno in Realized Price je tipiƒçen za tr≈æne stadije izhoda iz korekcije in nadaljevanja rasti:
veliko starih kovancev se zadr≈æuje, ne premika;
povpreƒçna osnovna cena imetnikov ostaja pod trenutnimi nivoji;
 zagotavlja podporo fundamentalnim priƒçakovanjem udele≈æencev. 

Napoved in vpliv na ceno BTC
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (tedni ‚Äî meseci)
ƒåe tr≈æna cena ostane nad Realized Price:
 Dominacija dobiƒçka med veƒçino udele≈æencev lahko zmanj≈°a ƒçustveno razprodajo.
‚Äî V takih trenutkih so korekcije pogosto omejene, saj mnogi imetniki noƒçejo prodajati z izgubo.
‚Äî Cena BTC obiƒçajno i≈°ƒçe nivoje podpore okoli ali nad Realized Price.
Vendar ƒçe se tr≈æna cena hitro pribli≈æa realizirani, preboj pod njo lahko okrepi val strahu in paniƒçnih prodaj, preden se najde podpora. 
Kratkoroƒçni povzetek: cenovni obseg BTC bo verjetno imel podporo nad nivoom Realized Price, korekcije bodo manj globoke, ƒçe cena ne pade bistveno pod to metrike.

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
Realized Price se giblje poƒçasi, saj odra≈æa zgodovinsko porazdelitev vstopov (osnovnih cen).
To pomeni:
Gladka rast Realized Price ka≈æe, da imetniki na splo≈°no kupujejo/premika BTC po vi≈°jih cenah, kar signalizira kopiƒçenje in dolgoroƒçno zaupanje.
Upoƒçasnitev rasti realizirane cene ‚Äî znak tr≈æne konsolidacije in pripravljenosti udele≈æencev ƒçakati na vi≈°ji dobiƒçek.
üìà V bikovskih fazah Realized Price obiƒçajno raste skupaj s trgom, a poƒçasneje kot tr≈æna cena. ƒåe tr≈æna cena ostane nad realizirano veƒç mesecev, je signal trajnostnega trenda in kopiƒçenja s strani dolgoroƒçnih udele≈æencev. 
Srednjeroƒçni zakljuƒçek: podpora za BTC se ohranja, dokler apetit za tveganje udele≈æencev ostaja visok in je razmik med trgom in realizirano ceno pomemben.

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (6 mesecev in veƒç)
Realized Price pogosto slu≈æi kot dinamiƒçna osnova fundamentalnega nivoja:
‚úîÔ∏è ƒåe je cena BTC bistveno vi≈°ja od realizirane v dolgem obdobju, to pomeni, da so mnogi imetniki v dobiƒçkonosnem polo≈æaju, kar krepi skupno tr≈æno zaupanje v sredstvo.
‚úîÔ∏è ƒåe realizirana cena raste dolgoroƒçno, to pomeni, da povpreƒçni 'kupci' trga posodabljajo svojo osnovno ceno proti vi≈°jim nivojem, kar zgodovinsko korelira s prehodom v nove faze bikovskega trga.
 ƒåe pa se cena BTC spusti in preƒçka Realized Price navzdol, lahko signalizira spremembo tr≈æne faze in potencialno dolgoroƒçno padanje (kjer novi udele≈æenci fiksirajo izgube in prerazporedijo kapital). Bitcoin Magazine Pro

Praktiƒçni zakljuƒçki vpliva
Scenarij
Interpretacija
Vpliv na ceno
Cena > Realized Price
Tr≈æni voditelji v dobiƒçku
Podpora, manj globoke korekcije
Cena ‚âà Realized Price
Ravnovesje vstopov in izstopov
Potencialna cona podpore/obraƒçuna
Cena < Realized Price
Imetniki v izgubi
Okrepitev strahu, mo≈æne kapitulacije

üìå Pomembno: Realized Price sam ne generira signalov vstopa/izhoda, je fundamentalni orientir, ki pomaga oceniti splo≈°no stanje trga in verjetna obmoƒçja podpore/upora.
Povzetek
Realized Price ‚Äî povpreƒçna cena, po kateri so se BTC nazadnje gibali med denarnicami; indikator povpreƒçnega vstopa mre≈æe. Bitbo Charts
Vpliv na ceno: ƒçe je tr≈æna cena vi≈°ja, je veƒçina imetnikov v dobiƒçku ‚Üí korekcije omiljene; ƒçe ni≈æja, se strah okrepi in mo≈æne kapitulacije. Bitcoin Magazine Pro
Na 01.01.2025: realizirana cena je bila bistveno ni≈æja od trenutne tr≈æne, kar je kazalo na ≈°iroko mar≈æo dobiƒçka imetnikov in podporo fundamentalnemu trendu. Bitbo Charts
Kratkoroƒçno: slu≈æi kot indikator obmoƒçja podpore; razmik med realizirano in tr≈æno ceno pomaga oceniti tveganje korekcije.
Srednjeroƒçno: vzdr≈æana cena nad realizirano signalizira nadaljevanje trenda; prekrivanje navzdol lahko opozarja na spremembo faze.
Dolgoroƒçno: rast realizirane cene skupaj s trgom ka≈æe na kopiƒçenje in krepitev temelja BTC v trenutni fazi cikla.

extra.en:
Realized Price is on-chain metric showing average price at which all existing BTC last moved (bought/sold) on blockchain. Simply put, average acquisition cost of all circulating coins based on prices at which last transferred between wallets. Differs from current market price reflecting BTC exchange trading price now. 
Formula:
Realized Price=Realized Market Cap / Circulating Supply
where Realized Market Cap ‚Äî total value of each BTC at last movement price. BGeometrics

How Realized Price affects Bitcoin price
Why important:
If market price above realized, most holders theoretically profitable ‚Äî may reduce selling pressure and indicate more sustainable trend. 
If market price drops below realized, means average holders carry unrealized losses potentially intensifying fear, capitulations serving market minimum level signals. 
Realized Price also reflects long-term holder behavior: if growing during correction may indicate older coins moving (often accumulation/capital redistribution) potentially serving price support.
extra.si:
Realized Price je on-chain metrika, ki prikazuje povpreƒçno ceno, po kateri so se vsi obstojeƒçi BTC nazadnje gibali (kupljeni/prodani) na blockchainu. Preprosto reƒçeno, povpreƒçni nabavni stro≈°ek vseh kovancev v obtoku, ki temelji na cenah, po katerih so se nazadnje prena≈°ali med denarnicami. Razlikuje se od trenutne tr≈æne cene, ki odra≈æa ceno, po kateri se BTC trenutno trguje na borzah. 
Formula:
Realized Price=Realized Market Cap / Circulating Supply
kjer Realized Market Cap ‚Äî skupna vrednost vsakega BTC po ceni zadnjega gibanja. BGeometrics

Kako Realized Price vpliva na ceno bitcoina
Zakaj je pomembno:
ƒåe je tr≈æna cena vi≈°ja od realizirane, je veƒçina imetnikov teoretiƒçno v dobiƒçku ‚Äî to lahko zmanj≈°a prodajni pritisk in ka≈æe na bolj trajnostni trend. 
ƒåe tr≈æna cena pade pod realizirano, to pomeni, da imetniki v povpreƒçju nosijo nerealizirane izgube, kar lahko okrepi strah, kapitulacije in slu≈æi kot signal minimalnih tr≈ænih nivojev. 
Realized Price tudi odra≈æa vedenje dolgoroƒçnih imetnikov: ƒçe raste med korekcijo, lahko ka≈æe, da se premikajo starej≈°i kovanci (pogosto kopiƒçenje/prerazporeditev kapitala), kar lahko slu≈æi kot podpora ceni.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2026  CDD (Coin Days Destroyed) Current CDD situation:
Recent analysis showed 60-day moving CDD sharply increased reaching levels close to 6-year highs ‚Äî indicating old coins actively moving. 
Such CDD growth typically coincides when long-term holders start selling part of their accumulation ‚Äî for example after significant BTC price growth. This may reflect confidence decline or profit-taking by major players often accompanying market tops. 

 CDD forecast and BTC price impact
Short-term perspective (1‚Äì14 days)
High CDD values ‚Üí possible short-term corrections as old coins move and potentially sold increasing market supply.
This coincides with increased volatility potentially leading to temporary BTC price pressure.
 Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì3 months)
If CDD remains elevated long ‚Äî sign long-term holders continue selling potentially contributing to prolonged correction or sideways movement.
If CDD falls back to low values ‚Üí signal holders slowed selling potentially preceding bullish trend resumption.
Long-term perspective (6 months and beyond)
Consistently low CDD long-term means major investors prefer holding BTC leaning toward accumulation historically correlating with more stable price growth.
Historically CDD peaks sometimes appeared at cycle tops followed by market strengthening period.
Important: CDD ‚Äî participant behavior indicator not direct price source. Price also affected by institutional demand, macroeconomic factors, regulations and market sentiment.
Summary ‚Äî what CDD shows
CDD Behavior
Meaning
Possible BTC Impact
High CDD
Long-term BTC moving
Possible reversal or correction
Low CDD
Holders holding BTC
Potential stability/growth
Prolonged CDD growth
Intense old coin movement
Market instability
CDD decline after peaks
Reduced old coin activity
Trend stabilization
text.si:
ANALIZA na 01.01.2026  CDD (Uniƒçenih kovancih dni) Trenutna situacija CDD:
Nedavna analiza je pokazala, da se je 60-dnevno drseƒçe CDD moƒçno poveƒçalo in doseglo nivoje blizu 6-letnih maksimumov ‚Äî kar ka≈æe, da se stare kovance aktivno premikajo. 
Tak≈°na rast CDD obiƒçajno sovpada s trenutki, ko dolgoroƒçni imetniki zaƒçnejo prodajati del svojih kopiƒçenj ‚Äî na primer po znatni rasti cene BTC. To lahko odra≈æa upad zaupanja ali fiksiranje dobiƒçka s strani velikih igralcev, kar pogosto spremlja tr≈æne vrhove. 

 Napoved CDD in vpliv na ceno BTC
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì14 dni)
Visoke vrednosti CDD ‚Üí mo≈æne kratkoroƒçne korekcije, saj se stari kovanci premikajo in verjetno prodajajo, kar poveƒçuje ponudbo na trgu.
To sovpada z veƒçjo nihajoƒçnostjo in lahko vodi v zaƒçasni pritisk na ceno BTC.
 Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì3 mesece)
ƒåe CDD ostane visok dlje ƒçasa ‚Äî znak, da dolgoroƒçni imetniki nadaljujejo prodajo, kar lahko prispeva k dalj≈°i korekciji ali stranskemu gibanju.
ƒåe CDD pade nazaj na nizke vrednosti ‚Üí signal, da so imetniki upoƒçasnili prodajo, kar lahko predhodno obnovitvi bikovskega trenda.
Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (6 mesecev in veƒç)
Vzdr≈æno nizek CDD dolgoroƒçno pomeni, da veliki vlagatelji raje dr≈æijo BTC in se nagibajo k kopiƒçenju, kar zgodovinsko korelira z bolj stabilno rastjo cene.
Zgodovinsko so vrhovi CDD vƒçasih nastali na cikliƒçnih vrhovih, nato pa sledilo obdobje krepitev trga.
Pomembno: CDD ‚Äî indikator vedenja udele≈æencev, ne neposreden vir cene. Na ceno vplivajo tudi institucionalno povpra≈°evanje, makroekonomske dejavnike, regulative in tr≈æna razpolo≈æenja.
Povzetek ‚Äî kaj ka≈æe CDD
Vedenje CDD
Pomen
Mo≈æni vpliv na BTC
Visok CDD
Dolgoroƒçni BTC se premikajo
Mo≈æen obraƒçun ali korekcija
Nizek CDD
Imetniki dr≈æijo BTC
Potencialna stabilnost/rast
Dolgotrajna rast CDD
Intenzivni gibi starih kovancev
Tr≈æna nestabilnost
Padec CDD po vrhovih
Zmanj≈°ana aktivnost starih kovancev
Stabilizacija trenda

extra.en:
What is CDD (Coin Days Destroyed)?
CDD ‚Äî on-chain metric measuring BTC movement accounting how long coins were 'dormant' in wallets before transaction.
Each bitcoin on blockchain accumulates so-called 'coin days' ‚Äî one coinday per day coin remains unmoved. When coin finally spent, these accumulated days 'destroyed' ‚Äî this value accounted by CDD metric.
Example:
1 BTC dormant 100 days ‚Üí 100 coindays
5 BTC dormant 10 days ‚Üí 50 coindays
Both 'destroyed' when these coins spent. 
Why important: CDD considers not just moved coins quantity but how long unused ‚Äî reflects long-term holders (HODLers) activity. 

 How CDD affects Bitcoin price
CDD doesn't directly affect price but reflects behavior of major experienced investors significantly influencing market dynamics.
 High CDD
Appears when long-untouched coins start moving meaning:
‚úî long-term holders start selling or rebalancing positions;
‚úî possible approaching market peak or correction signal;
‚úî increases market activity and volatility.
 Low CDD
Occurs when few old coins spent ‚Äî means:
‚úî long-term holders holding assets;
‚úî confidence and gradual accumulation signal;
‚úî often correlates with bull phases or consolidation periods.
Essentially CDD complements metrics like on-chain volume but emphasizes transaction age showing how active 'smart money' (experienced major investors).
extra.si:
Kaj je CDD (Uniƒçenih kovancih dni)?
CDD ‚Äî on-chain metrika, ki meri gibanje BTC ob upo≈°tevanju, kako dolgo so kovanci 'spani' v denarnicah pred transakcijo.
Vsak bitcoin na blockchainu kopiƒçi t.i. 'kovanƒçne dneve' ‚Äî en kovanƒçni dan na dan, ko kovanec ostane negiben. Ko se kovanec konƒçno porabi, se ti nakopiƒçeni dnevi 'uniƒçijo' ‚Äî ta vrednost se upo≈°teva v metrike CDD.
Primer:
1 BTC negiben 100 dni ‚Üí 100 kovanƒçnih dni
5 BTC negibnih 10 dni ‚Üí 50 kovanƒçnih dni
Oba se 'uniƒçita', ko se ti kovanci porabijo. 
Zakaj je pomembno: CDD upo≈°teva ne le koliƒçino premaknjenih kovancev, ampak kako dolgo niso bili uporabljeni ‚Äî odra≈æa aktivnost dolgoroƒçnih imetnikov (HODLerjev). 

 Kako CDD vpliva na ceno Bitcoina
CDD ne vpliva neposredno na ceno, a odra≈æa vedenje velikih izku≈°enih vlagateljev, ki lahko znatno vplivajo na tr≈æno dinamiko.
 Visok CDD
Pojavi se, ko se zaƒçnejo premikati dolgo netaknjeni kovanci, kar pomeni:
‚úî dolgoroƒçni imetniki zaƒçnejo prodajati ali preurejati pozicije;
‚úî mo≈æen signal pribli≈æevajoƒçega se tr≈ænega vrha ali korekcije;
‚úî poveƒça tr≈æno aktivnost in nihajoƒçnost.
 Nizek CDD
Nastane, ko se malo starih kovancev porabi ‚Äî pomeni:
‚úî dolgoroƒçni imetniki dr≈æijo sredstva;
‚úî signal zaupanja in postopnega kopiƒçenja;
‚úî pogosto korelira z bikovskimi fazami ali obdobji konsolidacije.
Bistveno CDD dopolnjuje metrike kot on-chain volumen, a poudarek daje starosti transakcij, kar ka≈æe, kako aktivni so 'pametni denar' (izku≈°eni veliki vlagatelji).

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2025.      On January 1, 2025 Bitcoin already had significant portion of possible supply in circulation (‚âà 19.5‚Äì19.8 million BTC), and by end 2025 this figure stabilized around ~19.96‚Äì19.97 million BTC. 
This means early 2025 market already in nearly mature supply phase when new coins appear less actively compared to earlier years (due to halvings) and most coins already distributed. This strengthens BTC perception as scarce asset competing under growing demand conditions.

Forecast: market and BTC price impact
Short-term perspective (weeks ‚Äî months)
Short horizon Bitcoin price determined more by demand and market sentiment than Circulating Supply changes, as this quantity changes very slowly (less than 900 BTC added daily post-halvings). 
Factors with greater short-term effect:
overall market risk sentiment (correlation with stocks and ETP/ETF flows),
news, regulation and liquidity,
derivatives (funding rates, open interest),
‚Äî these factors can temporarily push BTC up or down regardless of stable supply. 
Thus:
BTC remains demand-sensitive: if demand high (e.g. institutional buying), price can rise even with nearly fixed supply;
During demand decline or ETF/market risk outflows ‚Äî price may fall though supply remains nearly unchanged. 

Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì6 months)
Medium-term supply remains fundamental price anchor:
Near-term supply growth moderate as new BTC mining occurs slowly and gradually;
Depletion of liquid supply (coins withdrawn from liquid exchanges to cold storage or held by long-term holders) reduces available coins for trading, increasing price pressure with sustained demand. 
Such effective market supply limitation can support price at higher levels even if overall market sentiment fluctuates. 

Long-term perspective (year and beyond)
Long-term Bitcoin Circulating Supply will approach 21 million maximum but never exceed it, with emission speed declining due to periodic halvings. This structural limitation ‚Äî foundation of 'scarcity' concept which combined with growing demand (e.g. institutional investors, payment networks, ETF) creates fundamental price growth driver. c
As new coin supply diminishes and available-for-trading BTC may actually decrease (coins lost or held long-term), supply impact on price becomes increasingly pronounced: fewer coins on market with stable/growing demand ‚Üí higher price.

Key summary points
‚úîÔ∏è Circulating Supply ‚Äî number of BTC available in circulation and for trading; nearly all possible supply already issued (~19.96‚Äì19.97 million out of 21 million).
‚úîÔ∏è Supply itself changes slowly so short-term price impact limited; price more dependent on demand and market signals. 
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term supply scarcity supports price with sustained demand, especially if coins withdrawn from liquidity (storage, cold wallets). 
‚úîÔ∏è Long-term limited supply fundamental part of Bitcoin monetary economics and potential price growth factor as new BTC appear slower with each halving reaching total 21 million by 2140.
text.si:
ANALIZA na 01.01.2025.      Na 1. januar 2025 je Bitcoin ≈æe imel znaten del mo≈æne zaloge v obtoku (‚âà 19,5‚Äì19,8 milijona BTC), do konca 2025 pa se je ta ≈°tevilka stabilizirala okoli ~19,96‚Äì19,97 milijona BTC. 
To pomeni, da je trg na zaƒçetku 2025 ≈æe bil v fazi praktiƒçno zrele zaloge, ko se nove kovance pojavljajo manj aktivno v primerjavi z zgodnej≈°imi leti (zar halvinge) in je veƒçina kovancev ≈æe porazdeljena. To krepi dojemanje BTC kot redkega sredstva, za katerega je treba tekmovati v pogojih nara≈°ƒçajoƒçega povpra≈°evanja.

Napoved: vpliv na trge in ceno BTC
Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (tedni ‚Äî meseci)
V kratkem obzorju ceno Bitcoina doloƒçajo bolj povpra≈°evanje in tr≈æno razpolo≈æenje kot spremembe kro≈æeƒçe zaloge, saj se ta koliƒçina zelo poƒçasi spreminja (dnevno se doda manj kot 900 BTC po halvingih). 
Faktorji z veƒçjim kratkoroƒçnim uƒçinkom:
splo≈°no tr≈æno razpolo≈æenje tveganja (korelacija z delnicami in ETP/ETF tokovi),
vesti, regulativa in likvidnost,
derivati (funding rates, open interest),
‚Äî ti faktorji lahko zaƒçasno potiskajo BTC navzgor ali navzdol ne glede na stabilno zalogo. 
Torej:
BTC ostaja obƒçutljiv na povpra≈°evanje: ƒçe je povpra≈°evanje visoko (npr. institucionalne nakupe), se lahko cena zvi≈°uje tudi pri skoraj fiksni zalogi;
V obdobjih padca povpra≈°evanja ali odlivov iz ETF/tr≈ænih tveganj ‚Äî se lahko cena zni≈æuje, ƒçeprav zaloga ostaja skoraj nespremenjena. 

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì6 mesecev)
V srednjermu obzorju zaloga ostaja eden temeljnih sidri≈°ƒç cene:
Blizu-term rast zaloge zmerna, saj rudarjenje novih BTC poteka poƒçasi in postopoma;
Izƒçrpanost likvidne zaloge (del kovancev umaknjenih iz likvidnih borz v hladno shranjevanje ali zadr≈æanih pri dolgoroƒçnih imetnikih) zmanj≈°uje razpolo≈æljive kovance za trgovanje, kar poveƒçuje cenovni pritisk pri vzdr≈ænem povpra≈°evanju. 
Tak≈°na omejitev uƒçinkovite tr≈æne zaloge lahko podpira ceno na vi≈°jih nivojih, tudi ƒçe se splo≈°no tr≈æno razpolo≈æenje nihajo. 

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva (leto in veƒç)
Dolgoroƒçno se bo kro≈æeƒça zaloga Bitcoina pribli≈æevala maksimumu 21 milijonov, a ga nikoli ne bo presegla, hitrost emisije pa se bo zmanj≈°evala zaradi periodiƒçne halvingov. Ta strukturna omejitev ‚Äî temelj koncepta 'redkosti', ki v kombinaciji z nara≈°ƒçajoƒçim povpra≈°evanjem (npr. institucionalni vlagatelji, plaƒçilna omre≈æja, ETF) ustvarja temeljni gonilec rasti cene. c
Kakor se bo zaloga novih kovancev zmanj≈°evala in koliƒçina BTC, na voljo za trgovanje, se lahko dejansko zmanj≈°uje (kovanci izgubljeni ali dolgoroƒçno zadr≈æani), bo vpliv zaloge na ceno vse bolj izrazit: manj kovancev na trgu pri stabilnem/rastnem povpra≈°evanju ‚Üí vi≈°ja cena.

Kljuƒçne povzetne toƒçke
‚úîÔ∏è Kro≈æeƒça zaloga ‚Äî ≈°tevilo BTC, na voljo v obtoku in za trgovanje; skoraj vsa mo≈æna zaloga ≈æe izdana (~19,96‚Äì19,97 milijona od 21 milijonov).
‚úîÔ∏è Zaloga se sama poƒçasi spreminja, zato je kratkoroƒçni vpliv na ceno omejen; cena bolj odvisna od povpra≈°evanja in tr≈ænih signalov. 
‚úîÔ∏è V srednjermu obzorju omejenost zaloge podpira ceno pri vzdr≈ænem povpra≈°evanju, ≈°e posebej ƒçe del kovancev umaknjen iz likvidnosti (shranjevanje, hladne denarnice). 
‚úîÔ∏è Dolgoroƒçno omejena zaloga temeljni del monetarne ekonomije Bitcoina in potencialni faktor rasti cene, saj se novi BTC pojavljajo vse poƒçasneje z vsakim halvingom in bo do leta 2140 skupaj 21 milijonov.

extra.en:
Circulating Supply ‚Äî number of Bitcoin coins already mined and in free circulation on market, available for trading, storage or use by users and investors. Includes all BTC in wallets, exchanges and circulation, but excludes coins locked, lost (e.g. permanently lost keys) or designated only for special purposes. 
Bitcoin maximum possible supply protocol-fixed at 21,000,000 coins; by end 2025 approximately 19.96‚Äì19.97 million BTC already in circulation (~95% of total possible volume).
Simple formula role of Circulating Supply
BTC Market Capitalization=Circulating Supply √ó BTC Price
Higher price with same circulating coins amount means higher capitalization; fewer coins remaining to mine means stronger supply limitation impact on price under growing demand conditions. 

How Circulating Supply affects Bitcoin price
Bitcoin price affected by balance between limited supply and demand:
Limited supply: BTC programmed for maximum 21 million coins release; makes scarce asset similar to digital gold. When demand grows while supply limited, price tends upward. 
Demand > supply: especially if institutional and retail investors accumulate BTC, available coins become 'hard resource' enhancing price potential. 
Emission reduction: miner rewards decrease every four years via halving reducing new supply inflow to market potentially raising prices with stable/increased demand. 
Circulating coins volume itself doesn't move price but determines available supply limit within which price dynamics form combined with demand.
extra.si:
Kro≈æeƒça zaloga ‚Äî ≈°tevilo kovancev Bitcoin, ki so ≈æe rudarjeni in v prostem obtoku na trgu, torej na voljo za trgovanje, shranjevanje ali uporabo s strani uporabnikov in vlagateljev. Vkljuƒçuje vse BTC v denarnicah, borzah in obtoku, a izkljuƒçuje kovance, ki so zaklenjeni, izgubljeni (npr. trajno izgubljeni kljuƒçi) ali namenjeni le za posebne namene. 
Maksimalna mo≈æna zaloga Bitcoina je protokolno fiksirana na 21.000.000 kovancev; do konca 2025 pribli≈æno 19,96‚Äì19,97 milijona BTC ≈æe v obtoku (~95 % celotnega mo≈ænega obsega).
Preprosta formula vloge kro≈æeƒçe zaloge
Tr≈æna kapitalizacija BTC=Kro≈æeƒça zaloga √ó Cena BTC
Vi≈°ja cena pri enaki koliƒçini kovancev v obtoku pomeni veƒçjo kapitalizacijo; manj kovancev, ki jih je ≈°e treba rudariti, pomeni moƒçnej≈°i vpliv omejitve zaloge na ceno v pogojih nara≈°ƒçajoƒçega povpra≈°evanja. 

Kako kro≈æeƒça zaloga vpliva na ceno bitcoina
Na ceno Bitcoina vpliva ravnovesje med omejeno zalogo in povpra≈°evanjem:
Omejena zaloga: BTC je programiran za izdajo najveƒç 21 milijonov kovancev; to ga naredi redek sredstvo, podoben digitalnemu zlatu. Ko povpra≈°evanje raste, zaloga pa je omejena, ima cena nagnjenost k rasti. 
Povpra≈°evanje > zaloga: ≈°e posebej ƒçe institucionalni in maloprodajni vlagatelji kopiƒçijo BTC, postanejo razpolo≈æljivi kovanci 'trdi vir', kar krepi cenovni potencial. 
Zmanj≈°anje emisije: nagrade rudarjem se zmanj≈°ujejo vsakih ≈°tiri leta zaradi halvinga, kar zmanj≈°uje priliv nove zaloge na trg in potencialno dviguje cene pri stabilnem/poveƒçanem povpra≈°evanju. 
Volumen kro≈æeƒçih kovancev sam po sebi ne premika cene, a doloƒça mejo razpolo≈æljive zaloge, znotraj katere se oblikuje cenovna dinamika v kombinaciji s povpra≈°evanjem.

text.en:
Hashrate and Hashrate Ribbons analysis as of Dec 25, 2025.
Hashrate ‚Äî total computational power of the Bitcoin network, measured in exahashes per second (EH/s). It indicates network security (high hashrate = hard to attack) and miner confidence (growth = expected mining profits). Current hashrate ~1,094‚Äì1,171 EH/s, 4% below December peak (~1,239 EH/s on Nov 30). December decline (‚Äì1% MoM) signals miner capitulation ‚Äî weak miners exit, profitability drops (mining cost ~$101K/BTC, price $88K).
Hashrate Ribbons ‚Äî indicator using 30-day and 60-day moving averages. Buy signal occurs when 30d MA crosses 60d MA upwards. Currently in buy phase (5th in 2025), but compression indicates potential reversal.
Summary: high hashrate = stable network, 4% decline = capitulation, Ribbons buy = bullish divergence.
Medium-term forecast (1‚Äì3 months): hashrate stabilizes ~1,100 EH/s, ribbons remain bullish ‚Üí BTC $90K‚Äì$95K (60%). Risk of >10% drop = correction $80K‚Äì$85K (40%). In 2026, expected hashrate growth +20‚Äì30%, ribbons buy ‚Üí $100K+.
Market impact: high hashrate = crypto sector stability, decline = volatility. Ribbons buy = bullish for altcoins.
Trading: crossover = buy signal, reversal = sell. Combine with NVT Ratio. TradingView indicator "Hashrate Ribbons" ‚Äî buy on blue/red crossover.
BTC price: correlation ~0.6‚Äì0.7. Hashrate decline = bearish (‚Äì1‚Äì5%), Ribbons buy = bullish (+2‚Äì5%), growth potential to $90K, compression = risk ‚Äì5‚Äì10% ($80K‚Äì$85K).

extra.en: Commentary: current Hashrate Ribbons phase indicates potential bullish reversal amid miner capitulation.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 01.01.2026.     Network tracker data shows:
Early year mempool in moderately low state, size under ~1-2 MB with small number of pending transactions (~2,000+ per some nodes). 
This means low network load, fast confirmations and low fees. 

Market impact analysis
Short perspective
1‚Äì7 days
If mempool grows:
‚Üí Fees may increase
‚Üí Confirmations slow
‚Üí Short-term price volatility increase possible
This may correspond to high market activity moments.
If mempool stable/low (as now)
‚Üí network 'hard', transactions process fast
‚Üí typical for calm market conditions
Current: mempool low ‚Äî no clear signaling of major activity or large fund movement. 

Medium-term perspective
1‚Äì3 months
Any prolonged mempool increase may mean:
on-chain activity growth
more people/funds moving bitcoin
rising demand or preparation for major movements
This may lead to temporary price growth due to increased interest and activity (or speculation).
But also:
low fees + low mempool may indicate calm network without buying/selling pressure.

Long-term perspective
6 months ‚Äî several years
Consistently high mempool may signal sustained network usage increase ‚Üí broader adoption potentially positively impacting price over time.
Low mempool activity ‚Äî may reflect network activity stagnation but not necessarily price decline ‚Äî market may focus on derivatives, institutional products (ETF) and off-chain instruments.
However long-term Bitcoin price determined by observed economy, institutional demand, geopolitics, ETF and regulatory environment, not just mempool.
Perspective
What mempool shows
Price impact
Short-term
Growth ‚Üí congested network
Possible ‚Üë volatility
Medium-term
Prolonged growth
Increased market activity
Long-term
Long-term high mempool
Network usage indicator ‚Äî positive
Summary
‚úî Mempool size ‚Äî network activity indicator, not direct BTC price driver. bl
‚úî Mempool growth may precede volatility and market activity increase.
‚úî On 01.01.2026 mempool low ‚Üí calm network and low load signal.
‚úî BTC price usually determined by larger fundamental factors (demand, ETF, institutional flows, regulation).

ANALIZA na 01.01.2026.     Podatki mre≈ænih sledilnikov ka≈æejo:
Na zaƒçetku leta je mempool v zmerno nizkem stanju, z velikostjo pod ~1-2 MB in majhnim ≈°tevilom ƒçakajoƒçih transakcij (~2.000+ po podatkih nekaterih vozli≈°ƒç). 
To pomeni nizko mre≈æno obremenitev, hitre potrditve in nizke provizije. 

Analiza vpliva na trge
Kratka perspektiva
1‚Äì7 dni
ƒåe mempool raste:
‚Üí Provizije se lahko zvi≈°ajo
‚Üí Potrditve se upoƒçasnijo
‚Üí Kratkoroƒçno mo≈æen porast nihajoƒçnosti cene
To se lahko ujema z momenti visoke tr≈æne aktivnosti.
ƒåe mempool stabilen/nizek (kot zdaj)
‚Üí mre≈æa 'trda', transakcije potekajo hitro
‚Üí tipiƒçno za mirne tr≈æne razmere
Trenutno: mempool nizek ‚Äî brez jasnega signaliziranja velike aktivnosti ali gibanja skladov. 

Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva
1‚Äì3 mesece
Vsako dolgotrajno poveƒçanje mempoola lahko pomeni:
rast on-chain aktivnosti
veƒç ljudi/skladov premika bitcoine
poveƒçano povpra≈°evanje ali priprava na velika gibanja
To lahko vodi v zaƒçasno rast cen zaradi poveƒçanega interesa in aktivnosti (ali ≈°pekulacij).
Vendar tudi:
nizke provizije + nizek mempool lahko ka≈æejo na mirno mre≈æo brez pritiska kupovanja/prodaje.

Dolgoroƒçna perspektiva
6 mesecev ‚Äî veƒç let
Stalno visok mempool lahko signalizira vzdr≈æno poveƒçanje uporabe mre≈æe ‚Üí ≈°ir≈°a adaptacija, kar lahko dolgoroƒçno pozitivno vpliva na ceno.
Nizka aktivnost mempoola ‚Äî lahko odra≈æa stagnacijo mre≈æne aktivnosti, a ne nujno padec cene ‚Äî trg se lahko osredotoƒçi na derivate, institucionalne produkte (ETF) in zunajveri≈æne instrumente.
Vendar dolgoroƒçno ceno Bitcoina doloƒçajo opazovana ekonomija, institucionalno povpra≈°evanje, geopolitika, ETF in regulativno okolje, ne le mempool.
Perspektiva
Kaj ka≈æe mempool
Vpliv na ceno
Kratkoroƒçna
Rast ‚Üí zama≈°ena mre≈æa
Mo≈æna ‚Üë nihajoƒçnosti
Srednjeroƒçna
Dolgotrajna rast
Poveƒçana tr≈æna aktivnost
Dolgoroƒçna
Dolgoroƒçno visok mempool
Indikator uporabe mre≈æe ‚Äî pozitivno
Povzetek
‚úî Velikost mempoola ‚Äî indikator mre≈æne aktivnosti, ne neposreden gonilec cene BTC. bl
‚úî Rast mempoola lahko predhodno poveƒçanju nihajoƒçnosti in tr≈æne aktivnosti.
‚úî Na 01.01.2026 mempool nizek ‚Üí signal mirne mre≈æe in nizke obremenitve.
‚úî Cena BTC obiƒçajno doloƒçena z veƒçjimi fundamentalnimi dejavniki (povpra≈°evanje, ETF, institucionalni tokovi, regulativa).

extra.en:
Mempool (memory pool) ‚Äî queue of all unconfirmed BTC transactions waiting for inclusion in block by miners.
When people send bitcoins, transactions don't enter blockchain immediately ‚Äî first temporarily stored here until miners select for processing. 
Each node maintains own mempool updating as transactions propagate through network.
Mempool size measured in bytes or megabytes showing network load with pending transactions.
When mempool grows ‚Üí sign many transactions waiting processing ‚Äî network loaded, fees grow, confirmation time increases. 

How mempool affects BTC price?
Direct impact
Mempool itself doesn't determine BTC price but reflects network activity closely tied to market sentiment:
‚úî When mempool grows sharply usually means:
high user activity
possible large fund movements (transfers to/from exchanges)
network interest growth
‚Üí may coincide with periods of increased BTC price volatility.
In academic models mempool showed size growth may precede trading volume and price volatility increase with ~1-2 day lag.
extra.si:
Mempool (memory pool) ‚Äî vrsta vseh nepotrjenih BTC transakcij, ki ƒçakajo na vkljuƒçitev v blok s strani rudarjev.
Ko ljudje po≈°iljajo bitcoine, se transakcije ne vpi≈°ejo takoj v blockchain ‚Äî najprej se zaƒçasno shranijo tukaj, dokler rudarji ne izberejo za obdelavo. 
Vsako vozli≈°ƒçe hrani svoj mempool in ga posodablja z raz≈°irjanjem transakcij po mre≈æi.
Velikost mempoola se meri v bajtih ali megabajtih in ka≈æe obremenitev mre≈æe s ƒçakajoƒçimi transakcijami.
Ko mempool raste ‚Üí znak, da veliko transakcij ƒçaka obdelavo ‚Äî mre≈æa obremenjena, provizije rastejo, ƒças potrditve se poveƒça. 

Kako mempool vpliva na ceno BTC?
Neposreden vpliv
Mempool sam ne doloƒça cene BTC, a odra≈æa mre≈æno aktivnost, ki je tesno povezana z tr≈ænimi razpolo≈æenji:
‚úî Ko mempool moƒçno raste, to obiƒçajno pomeni:
visoka aktivnost uporabnikov
mo≈æna velika gibanja sredstev (prenos na/z borz)
rast zanimanja za mre≈æo
‚Üí se lahko ujema z obdobji poveƒçane nihajoƒçnosti cene BTC.
V akademskih modelih je mempool pokazal, da rast njegove velikosti lahko predhodno poveƒçanju trgovalnih volumnov in nihajoƒçnosti cene z zakasnitvijo ~1-2 dni.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 02.01.2026.    Current BTC mining difficulty approximately 148.26 trillion (Trillion), network expects next adjustment around January 8, 2026 when difficulty may slightly decrease (~0.99% forecast) due to slower average block time. 
In 2025 difficulty grew by tens of percent ‚Äî reflecting hashrate growth and miner activity. 
Next weeks possible minor decrease or moderate growth depending on network power changes. 

How difficulty affects Bitcoin price
Important to understand: difficulty not direct BTC price driver but correlates with fundamental factors affecting price.
 1) Difficulty ‚Üî Hashrate ‚Üî Price
Difficulty growth often follows BTC price growth when miners connect more equipment to earn on higher rewards raising hashrate.
Conversely sharp price drop may force less efficient miners out ‚Üí hashrate and difficulty decline. 
But difficulty itself doesn't dictate price ‚Äî price trend far more dependent on demand/supply, institutional factors, regulation and macroeconomics.
 In other words: difficulty reflects network health but price determined by market forces not mining computational difficulty directly.

 Difficulty impact analysis on markets and BTC price across perspectives
Short-term perspective (1‚Äì14 days)
 What difficulty may show:
Unexpected difficulty decrease (hashrate drop) may signal temporary miner exit from network historically sometimes accompanied by increased volatility.
Difficulty growth signals high miner activity and interest but without direct price impact.
 Price impact:
Possible instability and short-term fluctuations but price action typically determined by market sentiment not difficulty directly.

 Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì3 months)
‚úî Difficulty growth ‚Üí may signal network participation growth and more sustained miner interest. Often coincides with price uptrend or consolidation around key levels. 
‚úî Difficulty decline/stagnation ‚Üí may indicate mining profitability pressure (due to costs or BTC price) sometimes accompanied by correction periods. 
 But even medium-term difficulty works more as confirming metric not leading price indicator.

 Long-term perspective (6 months and beyond)
 Difficulty reflects long-term network resilience:
High difficulty ‚Äî more secure network with more miners ‚Üí raises investor confidence in BTC stability. 
Consistent hashrate and difficulty growth historically often correlated with institutional interest increase and multi-year price growth though not always consistently. 
Long-term key price factors remain:
Demand and adoption
Regulatory environment
Macroeconomic conditions
Institutional positioning
Difficulty reflects only network structural strength.
Summary
Perspective
What difficulty shows
BTC Price Impact
 Short-term
Miner activity growth/decline
Indirect. May generate volatility but doesn't drive price directly
 Medium-term
Network activity trend
Confirms market movements, may accompany growth/correction phases
 Long-term
Network health signal
Reflects resilience strengthening fundamental expectations

extra.en:
Difficulty ‚Äî Bitcoin network mining difficulty indicator. Shows how hard for miners to find correct hash to include new block in blockchain. Automatic mechanism designed to maintain stable block time (~10 minutes) despite changing total network computational power (hashrate). 
 If hashrate grows, blocks found faster ‚Üí network increases difficulty to maintain target block time.
 If hashrate falls, blocks found slower ‚Üí network decreases difficulty. 
Thus difficulty ‚Äî not direct price measure but emission speed and network security regulator.
extra.si:
Difficulty ‚Äî indikator te≈æavnosti rudarjenja omre≈æja Bitcoin. Prikazuje, kako te≈æko je rudarjem najti pravilen hash za vkljuƒçitev novega bloka v blockchain. Samodejni mehanizem, namenjen ohranjanju stabilnega ƒçasa med bloki (~10 minut) kljub spremembam skupne raƒçunske moƒçi omre≈æja (hashrate). 
 ƒåe hashrate raste, bloki najdeni hitreje ‚Üí omre≈æje poveƒça te≈æavnost za ohranitev ciljnega ƒçasa bloka.
 ƒåe hashrate pada, bloki najdeni poƒçasneje ‚Üí omre≈æje zmanj≈°a te≈æavnost. 
Torej te≈æavnost ‚Äî ne neposredna mera cene, temveƒç regulator hitrosti emisije in varnosti omre≈æja.
